original_en: (The handwriting of the biography of Flying Pigeon is trembling, as if you can feel fear and anxiety)\\n\\nYu Wenru's body was a black bird's death, and this matter was not small, he might have affected the pond fish.\\nYu Qing was meager, cowardly, difficult to support, and more frightened.\\nThinking again and again, Yu decided to break the bronze mirror, and since then the water surface no longer meets.\\nYu Pingyong is difficult to match the heroes of Ru.\\nMay you escape this robbery, and will be in the future and will not be disturbed.\\nWhere there is no grasses in the world, why bother to love a flower alone. May Ruzhen take a serious, after this, each of them is well.\\n\\n{0}\\n(At the end of the letter, the handwriting is becoming more and more messy, and it seems to be in a hurry.
context: （飞鸽传书的字迹颤抖不定，仿佛能感受到恐惧与不安）\\n\\n余闻汝身背黑雀死讯，此事非同小可，恐将殃及池鱼。\\n余情愫微薄，怯懦不堪，力难扶持，心更悚惧。\\n思量再三，余决断铜镜，自此水面清波不再相见。\\n余平庸难配汝之英雄勇武。\\n愿汝躲过此劫，后会无期，不复相扰。\\n天涯何处无芳草，何必单恋一枝花。愿汝珍重，此别后，各自安好。\\n\\n{0}\\n（信末，笔迹越发凌乱，似是匆匆草就，可见写信之人心境之慌张。）

original_en: Letter from {0}
context: 来自{0}的信

original_en: You took down my enemy, and I've got to thank you for it, no doubt! !
context: 你杀了我的仇人，无论如何我都要感谢你！！

original_en: We're family, it's the least I can do! !
context: 我们是血亲关系，这本就是我应该做的！！

original_en: Even so, I really appreciate it. Please take this.
context: 即使这样，我也感激万分，这件东西你拿去吧。

original_en: Their attitude has changed, and I received a treasure.
context: 对方的态度产生变化，赠送我一件珍品

original_en: I helped {0}{1} settle a score. {0}{1} grew closer to me and gifted me a treasure.
context: 我帮{0}{1}报了仇，{0}{1}不但对我的态度更加亲密，还送了我一件珍品。

original_en: Bye!
context: 告辞

original_en: We're from the same sect, it was no big deal.
context: 我们同属一个门派，举手之劳。

original_en: Well, since you've lent a hand, rest assured, I shall not forget!
context: 同门一场，你既然出手相助，这份恩情，我绝不敢忘！

original_en: We're good friends, there's no need for such a big fuss.
context: 你我相交莫逆何必行如此大礼

original_en: My brother, you've helped me let off some steam today. I won't forget your kindness!
context: 你我义结金兰，今日又帮我出了这口恶气，感激之情铭记于心！

original_en: I just did what made sense.
context: 我不过是顺手而为

original_en: I never thought you'd set aside our past conflicts and seek revenge for me. I respect you and am ready to bond, leaving our conflicts behind.
context: 昔日结下仇怨，您竟然不计前嫌替我报仇。我对您刮目相看，愿悬剑为盟，重新来过，往日仇怨一笔勾销！

original_en: Our bond is unyielding, anyone who dares harm you will face my wrath.
context: 你我情比金坚，谁胆敢惹你不快我都会出手

original_en: I understand our encounter drained my luck, but I'll stand by you, no matter what.
context: 我心里明白，遇见你是我多世修来的福分，哪怕海枯石烂，也要与你相知相伴。

original_en: You are my loyal retainer. Of course, I will watch over you.
context: 你是我的麾下，我当然会罩着你

original_en: It's a small favor, hardly worth mentioning.
context: 举手之劳，不足挂齿

original_en: Young master, please, help me! !
context: 公子，快救救我！！

original_en: Ask about the reason
context: 询问缘由

original_en: It's none of your business! Leave, or I won't be polite with you! !
context: 这是我们之间的私事，你最好少多管闲事，否则连你一起收拾！！

original_en: Ask the girl about what happened
context: 询问姑娘事情前因后果

original_en: This scoundrel has been harassing me, and he even killed my father! Now, he's even forcing me to be with him. I'd rather die!
context: 这个恶贼一直纠缠我，我父亲不许，竟被他活活打死！！此恶贼还要逼迫我从了他，小女子宁愿去死！

original_en: Help the girl
context: 果断帮助姑娘

original_en: You little rascal, it appears you're testing your luck!
context: 小子我看你是活得不耐烦了！

original_en: Encountered a girl named {0}{1} being harassed by a scoundrel, I helped her without hesitation. Her gratitude towards me grew.
context: 遇到恶人欺负一个叫{0}{1}的姑娘，她向我求救，我果断出手，她对我产生了感激之情。

original_en: {0}{1} came to my rescue just when I had almost lost hope. I won't forget his kindness.
context: 被仇人追杀，绝望之际，遇到公子{0}{1}出手相救，无助之心产生波澜。

original_en: Both of them now have a different attitude towards you.
context: 两个人对你的态度发生了变化

original_en: Enough talk! !
context: 废话少说！！

original_en: I'm afraid I can't help. . .
context: 在下爱莫能助。。。

original_en: Consider yourself lucky! Beauty, where do you think you're running to?
context: 算你识相！姑娘，看你还往哪里跑！

original_en: Encountered {0}{1}, who asked for my help, but I refused.
context: 遇到{0}{1}向我求救，我拒绝了。

original_en: While being pursued by enemies, I encountered {0}{1}, but they paid me no heed.
context: 被仇人追杀，绝望之际，遇到{0}{1}，可惜对方竟然置之不理，感叹江湖人心冷漠。

original_en: I can judge by his tone that he's up to no good. I should help the girl.
context: 此人如此语气，定不是好人！我选择帮助姑娘。

original_en: Why invite trouble for the sake of a stranger?
context: 多一事不如少一事

original_en: Have you heard? There is a bandit force nearby and they are doing evil. I hope there are heroes who can destroy them, otherwise life will be really difficult.
context: 听说了吗？附近有个盗匪势力，为非作歹。希望能有大侠能剿灭他们，否则日子真的不好过啊。

original_en: It is our duty as chivalrous men to do so.
context: 我辈侠士，义不容辞。

original_en: It has nothing to do with me, I just want to be alone.
context: 与我无关，我只想独善其身。

original_en: Okay ... people have their own aspirations, I don't want you.
context: 好吧...人各有志，我不强求你。

original_en: Who threw a banana peel here! Darn it!! Wait, I found some coins, haha.
context: 谁扔的香蕉皮！！该死！！不过捡到了钱，哈哈哈

original_en: Phew! Lucky me! Good stuff seems to find me even when I'm chopping a tree! <TDName>(Obtained Crafting Insight)</>
context: 我真是太幸运了，砍个树都能带个好东西！<TDName>（获得制作心得)</>

original_en: Phew! Lucky me! Good stuff seems to find me even when I'm chopping a tree! <TDName>(Obtained Coins)</>
context: 我真是太幸运了，砍个树都能带个好东西！<TDName>（获得铜钱)</>

original_en: Such bad luck! <TDName>(Obtained Poo)</>
context: 真倒霉！<TDName>（获得粑粑)</>

original_en: How lucky! <TDName>(Obtained Astringent)</>
context: 真幸运！<TDName>（获得金疮药)</>

original_en: Such bad luck! <TDName>(Obtained Chi Refill Plaster)</>
context: 真倒霉！<TDName>（获得续气膏)</>

original_en: How lucky! <TDName>(Obtained Wine Jar)</>
context: 真幸运！<TDName>（获得酒坛)</>

original_en: How lucky! <TDName>(Obtained Medicine Insight)</>
context: 真幸运！<TDName>（获得制药心得)</>

original_en: You must work hard, and in the future, I'll hand over this position to you.
context: 你要好好努力，以后就把这位置传给你了！

original_en: You're the master, feel free to sit wherever you please.
context: 我的就是主人的，您随便坐。

original_en: How does it feel! This is what I've got for you! ! !
context: 感觉如何！？这是我为你打下的江山！！！

original_en: Is this seat comfortable? <TDName>(Dislike +50)</>
context: 这位子坐得舒服不！?<TDName>（增加厌恶50）</>

original_en: Don't you see whose seat this is? <TDName>(Dislike +20)</>
context: 你不看看这是谁的位子！<TDName>（增加厌恶20）</>

original_en: That's impressive! You've already passed the beginner stage. Keep practicing more.
context: 你真行！这么快就武技入门了，多多练习吧。

original_en: You're already Expert in Techniques. Keep up the good work!
context: 武技已经熟练了，再接再厉，练至小成！

original_en: Hello, Champion!
context: 盟主好！

original_en: Greetings, Champion!
context: 盟主万安

original_en: Hello, Champion!
context: 盟主您好~

original_en: Hail to the Champion!
context: 见过盟主！

original_en: Someone is doing evil, everyone help me!!
context: 有人作恶，大家快来帮帮我！！！

original_en: Let me help you!
context: 我来帮你！

original_en: Stop it!! Let's go together!
context: 住手！！大家一起上！

original_en: The next target!  Haha
context: 又一只肥羊！哈哈

original_en: Stop right there! Hand over your money!
context: 站住！留下买路钱！

original_en: Wretched bandits! !
context: 可恨的盗匪！！

original_en: We must rid ourselves of these bandits! !
context: 盗匪人人得而诛之！！

original_en: Dreaded bandits! I'll face you! !
context: 该死的盗匪！！我和你拼了！！

original_en: Everyone, let's fight back together! Protect the village!
context: 大家一起上！保护村子！

original_en: Dreaded bandits! !
context: 盗匪真该死！！

original_en: This scoundrel here! I saved him, and now he's trying to rob me! He's truly heartless!
context: 就是这个恶贼，我救了他，他竟然还要强夺我的财物！真是丧尽天良！

original_en: Treating my dad like this, he's a complete bad guy!
context: 竟然这样对待爹爹，真是大坏蛋！

original_en: He doesn't appear to be a good person at all!
context: 看上去就不是个好人！

original_en: This scoundrel here! I saved him, and now he's trying to rob me! He took my house! What a heartless beast!
context: 就是这个恶贼，我救了他，他竟然还要强夺我的财物！抢了我的房字，真是丧尽天良，禽兽不如呀！

original_en: Easy money, haha.
context: 这买卖太好干了哈哈。

original_en: I became incapacitated, and {0}{1} tried to imprison me.
context: 我失去行为能力，{0}{1}趁机要把我关入牢笼。

original_en: Restricted area! No unauthorized entry allowed!
context: 门派重地！不得擅闯！

original_en: You cannot proceed any further! Please leave! !
context: 你不能进入此地，立刻离开！！

original_en: Sect's territory! Please refrain from advancing!
context: 这里是门派领地，不得靠近！

original_en: I've already given you two warnings. Leave right now.
context: 我已经警告过你两次了！立刻离开！

original_en: If you don't leave, I'll be forced to take action! !
context: 再不走我要出手了！！

original_en: Why haven't you left yet? This is your last warning!
context: 你怎么还没离开？？最后警告一次！

original_en: I've already warned you. Now, we need to detain you as a minor punishment, and we'll release you later.
context: 我已经警告过你了！！现在将你收监，小惩大诫，过段时间自会放你出来。

original_en: Okay, you're free to go. Leave now, or we might still have to arrest you!
context: 行了，你可以走了，赶快离开这里，否则还会抓你！

original_en: How dare you destroy the banner of my sect!!
context: 竟敢破坏我门派大旗！！

original_en: stop!!!
context: 住手！！！

original_en: Where did you come from, a thief!! Stop!
context: 哪里来的小贼！！住手！

original_en: Let's go together! Guard the sect!!
context: 大家一起上！守护门派！！

original_en: Good day, master!
context: 参见掌门~

original_en: Hello, master!
context: 掌门好~

original_en: Greetings master!
context: 掌门万安~

original_en: Greetings, master!
context: 见过掌门！

original_en: Don't splash water on me!
context: 别泼到我了！

original_en: Why are you so naughty? My clothes are soaked now, forget it.
context: 你怎么这么调皮！衣服都湿了，不要了。

original_en: Oh bollocks! I won't take my clothes off no matter how wet they are!!
context: 讨厌！衣服再湿我也不会脱掉的！！

original_en: Well, it's a good time for a bath, haha.
context: 不错，正好洗个澡，哈哈

original_en: Don't spill!! It's freezing
context: 别泼了！！冷死了

original_en: Life is short, Carpe diem! A pot of sake, a relaxed!
context: 人生苦短，及时行乐!一壶清酒，一身轻松!

original_en: The world is cold, only this pot alone to drink, the true solution is all worldly troubles!
context: 世态炎凉，唯有这一壶独饮，真真解却万般世俗烦恼!

original_en: Things change, carpe diem, and I'll drink this one!
context: 世事无常，及时行乐，这杯酒我自斟自饮!

original_en: Life is geometric, carpe diem, don't lose your happiness!
context: 人生几何，及时行乐，莫失己乐!

original_en: It's not me who lives or dies. Enjoy in time and live in time.
context: 生死定数，富贵非我。及时享乐，不负韶华。

original_en: It would be great if you could save him.
context: 你若能救他，是再好不过了。

original_en: This man has committed many evils and cannot be saved.
context: 此人作恶多端，万不可救。

original_en: Stop! Where are you taking people?!
context: 站住！你要带人去哪里？！

original_en: If you do too much unrighteousness, you will die yourself. Oh, it's better to die.
context: 多行不义必自毙，呵，死了才好。

original_en: Xianggong, what are you doing squatting there?
context: 相公，你在蹲在那里做什么？

original_en: Madam, what are you squatting there for?
context: 娘子，你蹲在那里作甚？

original_en: What are you hiding there for, kid?
context: 孩子你躲在那里干什么？

original_en: Child, it's not good for you to be seen like this.
context: 孩子，你这样被人看到不好。

original_en: Father, what are you squatting there for?
context: 父亲，你蹲在那里做什么？

original_en: Father, it's not good for you to be seen like this!
context: 父亲，你这样被别人看到不好！

original_en: Mom, what are you squatting there for?
context: 娘亲，你蹲在那里做什么？

original_en: Mother, don't squat there anymore.
context: 娘亲，莫要在那里蹲着了。

original_en: Hurry up and don't be seen by others.
context: 赶紧起来，莫要被他人看到了。

original_en: Master, have you found the enemy?
context: 主上，发现敌人了吗？

original_en: Master, what is this about?
context: 主上这是要做什么？

original_en: Hmm? Are you practicing hidden martial arts?
context: 恩？你在练习隐匿的武学吗？

original_en: What are you hiding there for.
context: 躲在那里干什么。

original_en: Sneaky! What are you doing??
context: 鬼鬼祟祟！在干什么？？

original_en: Strange, why is there no one when there is clearly movement?
context: 奇怪，明明有动静，为什么没有人？

original_en: What do you mean!! Let me go!!
context: 你这是什么意思！！！放了我！！

original_en: Is there something wrong with you? What do you want to do to me?! ?
context: 你是不是有什么毛病？？还想对我怎么样！！？

original_en: Let me out of here!
context: 放我出去吧~~~我服了！！

original_en: Leave me alone... I dare not do it again.
context: 放过我吧...我再也不敢了

original_en: Hoo ho, it's so hot, so hot, water, where's the water! Where's the water!
context: 呼呼，好烫好烫，水，哪有水！哪有水！

original_en: Hoo ho, it's so cold, so cold, I need to find a place to warm up.
context: 呼呼，好冷，好冷，得找个地方暖和暖和。

original_en: Why do you feel so unlucky lately?
context: 怎么感觉最近这么倒霉呢？

original_en: Lords, have mercy. I've gone three days without anything to eat.
context: 各位大爷行行好吧，我已经三天没吃东西了。

original_en: In the capital lives Huang Biaosan,\\nWho eats and dresses most fine. \\nA loan shark he is all his life,\\nIn months your principal's thrice. \\nIn his den he preys on borrowers,\\nWhile I manage his tills. \\nCollecting debts he's most brutal,\\nWhile I do the dirty work. \\nTo the North Star his gold glares,\\nBut at death's door, nobody cares. \\nThe lotus falls, the lotus falls.
context: 东京有个黄表三，\\n也会吃来也会穿。\\n一生好放官例债，\\n不消半年连本三。\\n巢窝里放债现过手，\\n他管接客俺使钱。\\n线上放债没赊账，\\n他管杀人俺管担。\\n积的黄金拄北斗，\\n临了没个大黄边。\\n莲花落，莲花落。

original_en: Look how parents aren't truly kin,\\nMoney all gifted to others. \\nThree years nursing, yet what's the use,\\nOnce married the son leaves. \\nFine wine and meat for the wife to enjoy,\\nWhile the parents starve to bones. \\nNo rice to spare when they're alive,\\nWho'll tend their grave in death? \\nThe lotus falls, the lotus falls.
context: 看看爷娘不是亲，\\n有钱且去敬别人。\\n三年乳哺成何用，\\n娶了媳妇就要分。\\n好酒好肉老婆吃，\\n不怕爷娘饿断筋。\\n生前不曾见碗米，\\n死后谁人来上坟？\\n莲花落，莲花落。

original_en: Look how brothers aren't truly kin,\\nArguing over scraps not fairly split. \\nSiblings fight over shares,\\nQuarreling over who got more. \\nDrinks shared only with others,\\nAs flesh and blood become foes. \\nThe lotus falls, the lotus falls.
context: 看看兄弟不是亲，\\n三窝两块说不均。\\n同胞也要分彼此，\\n争多争少要理论。\\n有酒只和旁人吃，\\n自家骨肉作仇人。\\n莲花落，莲花落。

original_en: Look how spouses aren't truly kin,\\nMarriage arranged through matchmakers. \\nPreferring the rich and despising the poor,\\nShe left her husband down the road. \\nThere's Widow Liu by the west wall,\\nWho waits until fifty to wed once more. \\nWords with your spouse, not all be told,\\nYour whole heart, don't devote. \\nThe lotus falls, the lotus falls.
context: 看看老婆不是亲，\\n三媒六证结婚姻。\\n嫌贫爱富窦家女，\\n半路辞了朱买臣。\\n墙西有个刘寡妇，\\n守到五十还嫁人。\\n夫妻且说三分话，\\n未可全抛一片心。\\n莲花落，莲花落。

original_en: Look how friends aren't truly dear,\\nFeasting and reveling non-stop.  \\nWords sweet as honey from their lips flow,\\nTaking your money, only to go. \\nOnce wealth and power fade,\\nAffections turn cold. \\nBackstabbing friends behold,\\nSworn brothers, a plain no. \\nThe lotus falls, the lotus falls.
context: 看看朋友不是亲，\\n吃酒吃肉乱纷纷。\\n口里说话甜如蜜，\\n骗了钱去不上门。\\n一朝没有钱和势，\\n反面无情就变心。\\n孙庞斗智刳了足，\\n那有桃园结义人？\\n莲花落，莲花落。

original_en: Alas. Business has been so tough lately.
context: 唉，最近买卖真难做。

original_en: This road I carved with my boot! This lumber I grew from a shoot! That's a really popular mantra these days.
context: 此山是我开，此树是我栽！现在道上的都兴这两句。

original_en: Rumors tell of a Flying Rat in our greenwood. \\nOn eaves and walls he lightly treads,\\nThe stealthiest in this world unmatched.\\nStole the court's treasure and south he fled,\\nTo this day no one knows where!
context: 传闻咱们绿林有位飞天鼠。\\n飞檐走壁逞刚强，\\n天下第一世无双，\\n盗了国宝向南去，\\n至今无人知何方！

original_en: How about snatching a woman and making her my wife! Heh heh heh!
context: 不如去绑个女人回来，当个压寨夫人哈哈哈！

original_en: How about abducting a man...
context: 不如逮个男子回来.....

original_en: Business is bad lately.
context: 最近没什么好买卖呀。

original_en: Should I find something to occupy myself with?
context: 我是不是该去寻点事做。

original_en: A couple more days' rest doesn't hurt.
context: 再歇息两天应该也没什么。

original_en: A hero shouldn't content himself with trifles.
context: 大丈夫生于天地之间，岂能做些鸡毛蒜皮的小事。

original_en: At noon they weed with hoes,\\nTheir sweat drips on the soil. \\nEach bowl of rice,\\nIs the fruit of hard toil. \\n
context: 锄禾日当午，\\n汗滴禾下土。\\n谁知盘中餐，\\n粒粒皆辛苦。\\n

original_en: A seed is sown in spring,\\nA harvest is reaped in autumn. \\nNo land...no land...What does the poem say next?
context: 春种一粒粟，\\n秋收万颗子。\\n四海，四海，后面是什么来着？

original_en: Hope there's a good harvest.
context: 希望有个好收成。

original_en: Will I become poor and weary when I grow old?
context: 我老了之后，会不会就成了卖炭翁？

original_en: Time to go chop some wood. I wonder how much I can sell it for now.
context: 该去砍柴了吧？不知现在柴火能卖几个钱。

original_en: Those who fish, cut wood, or till the soil find joy in their labors.
context: 渔樵耕读自得其乐。

original_en: I have access to some secret information, but my price is quite high.
context: 我知道一些隐秘的消息，但是我收费有点贵哦。

original_en: How to Become Sage in 「Forge」 Ability?
context: 「锻造」能力如何圆满

original_en: The Ou Family excels at 「Forge」, but their location is a well-kept secret. 1,000 coins, fair?
context: 最擅长「锻造」的就是欧氏世家了，隐秘世家的位置鲜有人知，收你1000铜钱，不算坑人吧哈哈。

original_en: I'll pay for this information.
context: 这个消息我买了。

original_en: It's been a pleasure doing business with you!
context: 合作愉快，以后还会来找你做生意的，哈哈哈。

original_en: Don't have enough coins, decline for now.
context: 铜钱不够，无奈拒绝。

original_en: It's not a good time right now, ask him to return later.
context: 此刻不方便，让他晚些再来。

original_en: Alright, we'll meet again in the future.
context: 好吧，后会有期。

original_en: How to Become Sage in 「Crafting」 Ability?
context: 「制作」能力如何圆满

original_en: The Mo Family excels at 「Crafting」, but their location is a well-kept secret. 1,000 coins, fair?
context: 最擅长「制作」的就是墨氏世家了，隐秘世家的位置鲜有人知，收你1000铜钱，不算坑人吧哈哈。

original_en: How to Become Sage in 「Leechcraft」 Ability?
context: 「医术」能力如何圆满

original_en: The Ji Family excels at 「Leechcraft」, but their location is a well-kept secret. 1,000 coins, fair?
context: 最擅长「医术」的就是姬氏世家了，隐秘世家的位置鲜有人知，收你1000铜钱，不算坑人吧哈哈。

original_en: How to Become Sage in 「Weave」 Ability?
context: 「织造」能力如何圆满

original_en: The Hu Family excels at 「Weave」, but their location is a well-kept secret. 1,000 coins, fair?
context: 最擅长「织造」的就是胡氏世家了，隐秘世家的位置鲜有人知，收你1000铜钱，不算坑人吧哈哈。

original_en: How to Become Sage in 「Music」 Ability?
context: 「音律」能力如何圆满

original_en: The Shi Family excels at 「Music」, but their location is a well-kept secret. 1,000 coins, fair?
context: 最擅长「音律」的就是师氏世家了，隐秘世家的位置鲜有人知，收你1000铜钱，不算坑人吧哈哈。

original_en: How to Become Sage in 「Sneak」 Ability?
context: 「潜行」能力如何圆满

original_en: The Shi Family excels at 「Sneak」, but their location is a well-kept secret. 1,000 coins, fair?
context: 最擅长「潜行」的就是时氏世家了，隐秘世家的位置鲜有人知，收你1000铜钱，不算坑人吧哈哈。

original_en: How to Become Sage in 「Geomancy」 Ability?
context: 「奇术」能力如何圆满

original_en: The Liu Family excels at 「Geomancy」, but their location is a well-kept secret. 1,000 coins, fair?
context: 最擅长「奇术」的就是柳氏世家了，隐秘世家的位置鲜有人知，收你1000铜钱，不算坑人吧哈哈。

original_en: How to Become Sage in 「Beg」 Ability?
context: 「乞讨」能力如何圆满

original_en: The Su Family excels at 「Beg」, but their location is a well-kept secret. 1,000 coins, fair?
context: 最擅长「乞讨」的就是苏氏世家了，隐秘世家的位置鲜有人知，收你1000铜钱，不算坑人吧哈哈。

original_en: How to Become Sage in 「Establishment」 Ability?
context: 「营造」能力如何圆满

original_en: The Gongshu Family excels at 「Establishment」, but their location is a well-kept secret. 1,000 coins, fair?
context: 最擅长「营造」的就是公输氏世家了，隐秘世家的位置鲜有人知，收你1000铜钱，不算坑人吧哈哈。

original_en: Warrior, do you dare face formidable creatures in treacherous places?
context: 大侠实力超群，在下知道几个险恶之地，那里有可怖的生物，有没有胆量去试试？

original_en: Accept challenge and ask for locations
context: 喜欢挑战自己，询问位置

original_en: The [Abyssal Ice Loch] is extremely cold, the [Lava Volcano] is scorching, and the [Miasma Ridge] shrouded in poison gas. These regions are extremely dangerous. Please be cautious.
context: 【极恶寒潭】十分寒冷【熔岩火山】酷热难忍【瘴云岭】毒瘴深邃。这些区域的环境十分险恶，大侠千万小心。

original_en: Challenge [Abyssal Ice Loch]
context: 我想挑战【极恶寒潭】

original_en: Take care!
context: 多多保重！

original_en: Challenge [Lava Volcano]
context: 我想挑战【熔岩火山】

original_en: Challenge [Miasma Ridge]
context: 我想挑战【瘴云岭】

original_en: I'm not interested. .
context: 暂时不感兴趣。。

original_en: Thanks for your help. Take these Marrow Refining Pills for your damaged meridians.
context: 恩人，之前多谢你出手相救，我看你经脉大损，这是我珍藏的洗髓丹，你拿去吧。

original_en: Obtained 5 Marrow Refining Pill.
context: 获得5个洗髓丹

original_en: Thank you.
context: 多谢姑娘

original_en: You've saved my life, so I should treat you well in return.
context: 你对我有救命之恩，我怎样对你好都是应该的。

original_en: Please try them.
context: 你快点全吃了吧。

original_en: {0}{1} brought me five Marrow Refining Pills to treat my meridians.
context: 我经脉隐疾过多，{0}{1}赶来送了我5个洗髓丹。

original_en: A thousand thanks
context: 感激莫名

original_en: Thank you for saving me. I can't repay you, but I can devote myself to you. But I'm unsure if you have someone dear to you.
context: 多谢英雄救命之恩，小女子无以为报，愿以身相许。只是不知恩公是否已经心有所属。

original_en: Tell her you already have someone special
context: 表示已有钟情之人

original_en: I understand. I'd be honored to become your sworn sibling if you accept.
context: 既如此，小女子愿认恩公为义兄，不知是否有此福分。

original_en: That's exactly what I thought!
context: 求之不得

original_en: I saved {0}{1} and she became my sworn sibling.
context: 我救了{0}{1}一命，与她结为异性兄妹。

original_en: Brother, please accept this bow.
context: 义兄再上，请受小妹一拜。

original_en: You have become sworn siblings.
context: 双方结拜为兄妹

original_en: Hi, sis.
context: 义妹好

original_en: Refuse again
context: 再次拒绝

original_en: Then... would it be possible to take me as your retainer? I only wish to stay by your side to repay your kindness.
context: 那...能否收小女子为麾下，只求能留在公子身边，端茶倒水，洗衣叠被，已报救命之恩。

original_en: Agree her request reluctantly
context: 勉为其难答应她

original_en: I saved {0}{1} and accepted her as my retainer.
context: 我救了{0}{1}一命，最后将她收为麾下。

original_en: Starting today, I pledge to follow and serve you for life.
context: 属下今后愿追随左右，侍奉终老。

original_en: You've accepted her as your retainer. Trust has increased.
context: 将对方收入麾下，信任增加了

original_en: Good!
context: 好

original_en: Harshly refuse
context: 狠心拒绝

original_en: In that case, I bid you farewell, and I wish you a lifetime of prosperity and peace.
context: 那小女子就此别过，祝恩公鹏程万里，一世平安。

original_en: I saved {0}{1}, but she wanted to stay with me. I refused, and she left disappointed.
context: 我救了{0}{1}一命，她要与我建立亲密关系，我再三拒绝，她只能失望离开了。

original_en: Her sadness has increased.
context: 对方感到悲伤

original_en: Farewell.
context: 再会

original_en: Tell her that your beloved has passed away.
context: 表示钟情之人已经去世

original_en: Master, please don't grieve too much. I believe she also wishes for your happiness.
context: 节哀顺变，恩公前途光明，切莫过度悲伤，相信姐姐在天之灵也希望恩公可以幸福。

original_en: Thanks.
context: 多谢

original_en: Tell her you don't have any intimate relationships.
context: 表示没有情投意合之人

original_en: She is still interested in forming a romantic relationship with me.
context: 对方还是希望与我结为情侣。

original_en: Agree to enter into a romantic relationship with her.
context: 表示愿意结为情侣

original_en: I saved {0}{1} and she wished to become my romantic partner.
context: 我救了{0}{1}一命，她愿以身相许，与我结为情侣。

original_en: You have entered into a romantic relationship. Her trust in you has increased.
context: 双方结为情侣，对方心愿达成，面露喜色，对你的信任增加了

original_en: Happy
context: 开心

original_en: Kindly decline
context: 委婉拒绝

original_en: For stat-boosting food, check out the Tavern's Wine Shelf, Cargo Ships, or explore different places. You can also improve your cooking abilities.
context: 如果你要寻找增加状态的食物，可以去酒馆的酒架或者商船购买，不过不一定会有，可以多跑一些地方看看。也可以自己练习烹饪能力。

original_en: Got it, thanks for the info.
context: 了解了，多谢相告

original_en: Interested in learning about the martial arts styles of these emerging sects?
context: 现在世界越来越热闹了，门派也会相继出现的，你想知道各个门派的武学流派吗？

original_en: Can you tell me more about them?
context: 能详细讲讲吗？

original_en: <TDName>「Beast Sect」</> Masters of multi-beast stances, nature communication, and taming animals. They harness creature power with deep inner strength. \\n<TDName>「Icy Sect」</> Experts in freeze martial skills, icing foes with a touch. Strikes inflict bone-chilling cold, immobilizing and disarming opponents. \\n<TDName>「Drunk Sect」</> Masters of Art of Drunkness. A single sip unleashes the Drunk Fist, with moves that are deceptive and unpredictable, catching foes off guard. \\n<TDName>「Concealed Weapon Sect」</> Masters of concealed weaponry with unmatched speed and versatility. They unleash storms of hidden weapons, leaving foes defenseless and bloodied. \\n<TDName>「Misfortune Sect」</> Practitioners of dark curses, leading foes into misfortune's vortex. Victims suffer mental breakdown and powerlessness. \\n<TDName>「Flame Sect」</> Cultivators of fiery martial arts with scorching energy. Strikes inflict excruciating burns, leaving victims charred and in agony. \\n<TDName>「Poison Gas Sect」</> Proficient in deadly spells and slow-acting poisons. They afflict foes with insidious poisons, causing gradual debilitation. \\n<TDName>「Toxin Sect」</> Specializes in creature manipulation. They control minds through toxin worm, rendering victims helpless and devoid of self. \\n
context: <TDName>「野兽流派」</>习得草原百兽之姿,与天地交通,精通兽语能驯服飞禽走兽,借助它们之力,内功深厚,学成此道,出手一招,兽群涌起,气势如虎。\\n<TDName>「寒冰流派」</>修炼极寒武功,内力寒冷如冰,足以结冰三尺,习得此道,一掌拍出,寒冰透骨,对手招式登时僵直,动作迟滞,被冰封住要害,只能任其宰割。\\n<TDName>「醉意流派」</>酒入醉酒心法,醉打明石,酒量绝人,习得此道,一杯下肚,打出醉拳,虚虚实实,出其不意,对手慢慢陷入醉意,全无还手之力,只知跌倒东歪西倒。\\n<TDName>「暗器流派」</>善使暗器之术,变化无穷,出手速度如风,习得此道,暗器如雨下,对手来不及防御,已中多处要害,血流满地。\\n<TDName>「厄运流派」</>习得厄运心境,会诅咒之术,把对手引向厄运,习得此道,一念诅咒,对手落入厄运漩涡,事事不顺,运气全失,精神崩溃,再无反击之力。 \\n<TDName>「灼热流派」</>修炼火焰武功,内力炽热如火,善用灼热伤人,习得此道,出手一招,烈火熊熊,对手被灼得千疮百孔,皮开肉绽,痛苦不堪,焦头烂额,死状甚惨。\\n<TDName>「毒瘴流派」</>精通各种剧毒之术,善使慢性毒药,习得此道,对手被下毒之后,慢慢消瘦,体力衰竭,各种症状缠身,最终痛苦难当,求生不得,求死不能。\\n<TDName>「蛊术流派」</>专精蛊术心法,用诸般虫蛊来操控人心,习得此道,下蛊一招,虫入对手体内,蛊惑心智,被操控意志,听命于人,失去自我。\\n

original_en: Beast Sect
context: 野兽流派

original_en: This sect is located in the <TDName>「Mount Millibeast」</>, a place surrounded by towering peaks and abundant wildlife.
context: 此派立派<TDName>「万兽山」</>,峰峦叠嶂,兽踪遍野,飞禽走兽,云集此山,气象万千。

original_en: Thanks!
context: 多谢！

original_en: Icy Sect
context: 寒冰流派

original_en: This sect is located in <TDName>「Mount Beimang」</>, where perpetual snow and ice cover the peaks year-round.
context: 此派立派<TDName>「北邙山」</>,积雪皑皑,寒冰森森,峰顶终年不化,下山一里,四季如冬,寒气逼人。

original_en: Drunk Sect
context: 醉意流派

original_en: This sect is located at <TDName>「Drunken Immortal Lake」</>, a breathtaking paradise renowned for its scenic beauty and the irresistible charm of wine.
context: 此派立派<TDName>「醉仙湖」</>,湖光山色,美不胜收,碧波万顷,红莲相依,湖畔小酒,醉意袭人,真是人间仙境。

original_en: Concealed Weapon Sect
context: 暗器流派

original_en: This sect is located at <TDName>「Bamboo Pond」</>, an oasis in the vast desert, making it an ideal place to practice concealed weaponry techniques.
context: 此派立派<TDName>「竹香潭」</>,一片绿洲,在茫茫沙海之中,湖水碧蓝,竹林苍翠,气候温和,景色宜人,是练暗器的好去处。

original_en: Misfortune Sect
context: 厄运流派

original_en: The sect is located at <TDName>「Nine Wolves Burrow」</>, a labyrinthine and desolate wasteland, making it perfect for practicing Misfortune arts.
context: 此派立派<TDName>「九狼窟」</>,一片黄沙之地,洞穴盘根错节,光线晦暗,狼虫满地,阴森可怖,是修习厄运之术的最佳场所。

original_en: Flame Sect
context: 灼热流派

original_en: The sect is at <TDName>「Rubycliff Ravine」</>, with scorching, lava-filled terrain perfect for fiery martial arts practice.
context: 此派立派<TDName>「赤壁峡」</>,岩浆熔岩,火山喷发,赤红滚滚,灼热难近,常人难以近身,是修炼灼热武功的绝佳去处。

original_en: Poison Gas Sect
context: 毒瘴流派

original_en: This sect is located at <TDName>「Shadowy Gorge」</>, a swamp teeming with venomous creatures and miasma, perfect for mastering deadly poisons.
context: 此派立派<TDName>「幽冥谷」</>,阴森沼泽,毒虫满地,瘴气四窜,草木龙飞,走进一步,立刻中毒,是学习各种剧毒之术的最佳场所。

original_en: Toxin Sect
context: 蛊术流派

original_en: This sect is located at <TDName>「Dragon Ridge Valley」</>, a marshy terrain where toxin arts thrive with various creatures.
context: 此派立派<TDName>「龙脊谷」</>,沼泽遍地,蛊虫滋生,是蛊术心法修炼的天然乐土,各种蛊虫,云集此地,远近闻名,人人忌惮。

original_en: Ugh, it stinks! !
She pinches her nose, showing clear disgust.
context: 她捏着鼻子一脸的嫌弃

original_en: Miss, do you have any tissue?
context: 小姐，你有纸吗？

original_en: Here, take it, and move farther away! ~~
context: 给你给你，走远一点，臭死了！~~

original_en: She disdainfully takes something from her pocket and tosses it to you.
context: 她厌恶的随手从怀里掏出一卷纸扔给了你

original_en: Thank you!
context: 谢谢啊

original_en: What a pitiful man. . .
context: 真是个可怜虫。。。

original_en: I had an upset stomach, and {0}{1} handed me a roll of paper. It turned out to be an Inner Kungfu Manual!
context: 我吃坏了肚子，{0}{1}嫌弃我发出臭味，随手送我一卷纸，没想到竟是一本内功书。

original_en: I gave you a secret manual?
context: 给你的竟然是一本秘籍

original_en: Feign deaf and mute
context: 装聋作哑

original_en: Are you mute?  Remember not to eat any unclean food in the future.
context: 是个哑巴啊。。你记着，以后不要吃不干净的东西。

original_en: I had an upset stomach. {0}{1} took pity on me and gave me two Anti-poison Plasters.
context: 我吃坏了肚子，{0}{1}可怜我送给我2个祛毒膏

original_en: {0}{1} tossed me two Anti-poison Plasters (Attitude toward me: Sympathy)
context: {0}{1}从怀里掏出两个祛毒膏扔给了我（并对我产生了怜悯态度）

original_en: Master, I greatly admire your martial skills and reputation. Although my martial abilities are humble, my loyalty knows no bounds. If you accept, I will serve you faithfully.
context: 您的武艺和名声，早就传遍江湖，在下非常仰慕大侠，想要跟从您，小的武艺平平，但绝对忠心，您若不嫌弃，在下愿为大侠鞍前马后，在所不辞！

original_en: Accept as my retainer
context: 收为麾下

original_en: {0}{1} desired to follow me, and I accepted them as my retainer.
context: {0}{1}仰慕我的实力和声望，前来投奔，收入麾下。

original_en: Thank you, master. I won't disappoint you and pledge unwavering loyalty unto death! !
context: 多谢大侠赏识，小的定不负所托，誓死追随！!

original_en: Their trust in you has peaked.
context: 对方对你的信任达到了极点

original_en: Satisfy
context: 满意

original_en: Refuse
context: 拒绝

original_en: I understand. My skills are lacking, and it's hard to earn your recognition. I'll bid farewell for now, but if destiny permits, I hope we cross paths once more. May you continue to achieve greatness in the martial world!
context: 我明白了，在下实力不足，难入您的法眼。在下就在此道别，若有缘分，还希望能与您再度相遇。愿大侠您的再创高峰，扬威江湖！

original_en: {0}{1} admired me, but I turned down their request to follow me.
context: {0}{1}仰慕我的实力和声望，我拒绝了。

original_en: Congratulations on becoming the Sect Master. Please take this.
context: 恭喜你成为了一派掌门，小小贺礼，敬请收下。

original_en: Obtained a treasure.
context: 获得1件珍品

original_en: Accept
context: 欣然接受

original_en: Thank you, Master!
context: 多谢掌门！

original_en: Refuse
context: 婉言拒绝

original_en: Alright, we'll meet again in the future.
context: 那好吧，后会有期。

original_en: I don't approve of my child's relationship with you. Break up now, or expect me to be less polite.
context: 你没有什么前途，我不同意孩子与你交往，你们两个立即分手，否则别怪我不客气！

original_en: I didn't expect you to become a master or a champion; at the very least, you should become an elder! !
context: 不求你是武林盟主或者一派掌门，你连个长老都做不到，我孩子跟着能有什么好日子过？？

original_en: Ask for her opinion.
context: 询问情侣的意思

original_en: It's not me! Why would I ever look down on you? It's my parents! All I want is to be with you and not be separated! !
context: 这不是我的意思，我怎会看不起你！？是父母一意孤行！！我与你生死与共绝不分离！！

original_en: I understand! !
You naive child! You know nothing! ! ! What kind of future can he offer you? Only hardships! You must break up with him! !
context: 你这傻孩子！真的是气死我了！！！他能有什么出息，你跟着只会受苦，一定要分开！！

original_en: Life has its ups and downs, and wealth can change over time. Don't judge me solely based on my current situation.
context: 三十年河东，三十年河西！莫欺少年穷

original_en: Enough with the big talk! Prove yourself, and we'll see.
context: 呵呵，口气不小，既然如此，我给你时间证明自己，如果你能做到再说！

original_en: I'll talk to my parents... Don't stress too much.
context: 难为你了......我会劝解父母的...你不要太有压力。

original_en: Trust increased by 200
context: 对方信任增加200

original_en: {0}{1}'s parents look down on me, but I've made a promise to prove myself. {0}{1} has shown increased trust in me.
context: {0}{1}的父母嫌弃我的身份，我做出约定提升自己，{0}{1}对我的信任增加了。

original_en: I have confidence.
context: 我有信心！

original_en: Your parents are right, we're not really a match.
context: 你父母说得对，你我确实不算般配。

original_en: Life's full of dreams, each with its own journey.
context: 人生有梦，各自精彩。

original_en: Agree to end the relationship
context: 同意解除关系

original_en: Please don't... I beg you... I don't want to be separated from you!
context: 我求求你，不要啊！我不想和你分开！

original_en: Tell her we should temporarily part ways.
context: 表示不想为难对方，暂时分开

original_en: In that case, I'll always be waiting for you.
context: 既然如此，我会一直等着你的~~

original_en: {0}{1}'s parents disapprove of me, so I'm temporarily leaving to avoid any trouble for {0}{1}.
context: {0}{1}的父母嫌弃我的身份，我不想{0}{1}为难，暂时解除情侣关系。

original_en: Your intimacy relationship has ended
context: 与对方解除情投意合关系

original_en: Break up
context: 坚决分开

original_en: You... You're heartless! I never want to see you again! ! !
context: 你..你好狠心，我再也不想见到你了！！！

original_en: {0}{1}'s parents disapproved of me, causing our breakup, and {0}{1}'s Ailment condition worsened, changing her attitude toward me.
context: {0}{1}的父母嫌弃我的身份，我狠心与{0}{1}解除情侣关系，{0}{1}伤心欲绝，隐疾增加，对我的态度发生变化。

original_en: Your intimacy relationship has ended. Her Hysteria increased by 50, and Sadness increased by 100.
context: 与对方解除情投意合关系，对方增加了50癫狂隐疾，悲伤增加100

original_en: We've found the traitor. Your intel proved invaluable. Thank you. Bamboo Pond owes you a debt of gratitude.
context: 那个叛徒已经被找到，你的消息至关重要，多谢你。竹香潭会记得你的恩情。

original_en: A few days ago, Zhixiangtan has already responded.
context: 日前竹香潭之事，已有回复。

original_en: We've found the traitor. We couldn't have done it without your aid. Thank you. Bamboo Pond owes you a debt of gratitude.
context: 那个叛徒已经被发现，若非有你，此事必定难以如此轻易解决。多谢你。竹香潭会记得你的恩情。

original_en: We've identified the traitor. But because of the false intel you fed us, we missed our first chance at getting them. Bamboo Pond doesn't take to deception kindly. Watch where you tread.
context: 前日里那个叛徒，已经被揪了出来，但因为你的消息误导，使得我们第一时间没有抓到那人。我竹香潭并非你可以随意诓骗的组织，阁下好自为之。

original_en: We've identified the traitor. But because we lacked intel, the scoundrel slipped the net. The results may have fallen short, but your faith merits our thanks.
context: 前日里那个叛徒，已经被揪了出来，可惜消息不足，等我们发现问题之时他已经逃之夭夭了。虽然你没帮到我们什么，但这份情我竹香潭记下了。

original_en: Let him go! Release my brother! !
context: 刀下留人！！放开我兄弟！！

original_en: In a critical moment, my brother arrived just in time to save me from danger.
context: 命悬一线时，义结金兰的兄弟出手相救

original_en: You're asking for trouble! Such audacity! !
context: 找死！！简直不自量力！！

original_en: In a critical moment, {0}{1} arrived just in time to save me from danger.
context: 命悬一线之时，{0}{1}千钧一发赶来相救！

original_en: A carrier pigeon arrives with a letter for you. You recognize the seal - it's a letter from your partner.
context: 一封飞鸽传书，忽然送至你的面前，你认得上面的标记，这是来自你伴侣的信件。

original_en: It's probably about your child. Go ahead and read it.
context: 应该是孩子的近况，拆开看看。

original_en: It's been a while. I hope all is well with you. Our child is in good health. Please rest assured. The little one is vigorous and lively, with great Kungfu potential.
context: 一段时间未见，最近可好？我们的孩子十分健康，请你放心。这孩子天生气血旺盛，活泼好动，看来是一个练武的好苗子。

original_en: Your child's Vigor has increased.
context: 孩子的气血提升了。

original_en: That's our kid, healthy and well. (Continue reading)
context: 是个活泼健康的小家伙。（继续读信）

original_en: Our child is well cared for in my charge, you need not worry. If there's any other news, I'll send another letter your way. Safe travels.
context: 孩子有我照顾，你可放心。若有他事，我还会发信给你。祝你一路安泰。

original_en: Our child is growing up.
context: 我的孩子正在一点一点成长。

original_en: I'm so happy to hear about the little one.
context: 能有孩子的消息，我很开心。

original_en: It would be good to go home when there's time.
context: 有空，回家看看吧。

original_en: (The letter ends here)
context: （信读到这里就结束了）

original_en: It's been a while. I hope all is well with you. Our child is in good health. Please rest assured. With their vast meridians, the world will be awed.
context: 一段时间未见，最近可好？我们的孩子十分健康，请你放心。这孩子天生经脉广阔，根骨不差，将来定能名动一方。

original_en: Your child's Chi has increased.
context: 孩子的真气提升了。

original_en: I'm content if the child is happy and well. (Continue reading)
context: 我的孩子只要健康快乐，我就满足了。（继续读信）

original_en: It's been a while. I hope all is well with you. Our child is in good health. Please rest assured. All our neighbors say our child is talented, just like you.
context: 一段时间未见，最近可好？我们的孩子十分健康，请你放心。附近的邻居来看，都说我们的孩子天资聪颖，与你神似。

original_en: A smart little one. (Continue reading)
context: 是个聪明的小家伙。（继续读信）

original_en: It's been a while. I hope all is well with you. Our child is in good health. Please rest assured. The little one is loved by all. Many of our friends have brought gifts to celebrate. Even more loveable than you are.
context: 一段时间未见，最近可好？我们的孩子十分健康，请你放心。这孩子人见人爱，不少朋友都送来了礼品，为其庆祝。竟比你还要惹人喜欢。

original_en: Your child's Energy has increased.
context: 孩子的内力提升了。

original_en: The little one is irresistibly charming. (Continue reading)
context: 这小家伙魅力非凡呀。（继续读信）

original_en: It's been a while. I hope all is well with you. Our child is in good health. Please rest assured. They're lively and endearing, though there's nothing extraordinary.
context: 一段时间未见，最近可好？我们的孩子十分健康，请你放心。我们的孩子虽然没有太多奇异之处，但是十分活泼，叫人喜欢。

original_en: Your child has grown up. As you hold them in your arms, you think about your lost love with a bittersweet smile.
context: 你的孩子有所成长，你看着怀里孩子，想着过世的伴侣，面前挤出一丝苦笑。

original_en: Our child is growing up. But it pains me to think that they will never have a complete family.
context: 我的孩子正在一定一点成长。可惜没有一个完整的家。

original_en: Alas, poor child.
context: 唉，可怜的孩子。

original_en: It's the fate of the mighty to grow in solitude.
context: 强者总是要在孤独中成长。

original_en: Our child is growing up.
context: 我的孩子正在一定一点成长。

original_en: A carrier pigeon arrives with a letter for you. You recognize the seal - it's a letter from your partner. It's probably about your child.
context: 一封飞鸽传书，忽然送至你的面前，你认得上面的标记，这是来自你伴侣的信件。想来是孩子的近况。

original_en: Go ahead and read it.
context: 拆开看看。

original_en: It's time for our child to go to school. What do you think our child should learn?
context: 孩子已经是幼学的年纪了，近些日子正筹备着送他去学些东西。在你看来，我们的孩子应该学些什么比较好呢？

original_en: The letter cuts off, leaving a vast blank space. Clearly meant for you to add your opinion before sending it back.
context: 这信读到这里，你发现一大段空位，想来是想让你将意见写在上面再传信回去。

original_en: Suggest that your child learn Establishment.
context: 建议孩子去学习营造吧。

original_en: Child's Establishment Lv. +1.
context: 孩子的营造能力提升1级。

original_en: The world is fraught with unrest. Even if you seek peace, plight will catch up with you. One must have some Kungfu skills to survive in this realm. What Kungfu do you think our child should learn?
context: 这大荒总是不太平的，你不染风尘，风尘自染人。在这江湖行走，还是要会些功夫的，你觉得我们的孩子学些什么功夫好些？

original_en: There's still a vast blank space below, awaiting your input.
context: 这一段下面依旧有大片的空白供你发挥。

original_en: Train with Weapons. They'll be useful.
context: 学些兵器，行走江湖用到。

original_en: Increase child's Weapon ATK.
context: 孩子的兵器攻击力提升。

original_en: (Summon a pigeon to deliver your reply. )
context: （招来一只信鸽，将你的回信带回。）

original_en: Fist art. It's the most powerful.
context: 还是拳法，最是刚猛。

original_en: Increase child's Fist ATK.
context: 孩子的拳法攻击力提升。

original_en: Palm art. Pliancy conquers strength.
context: 学些掌法，以柔克刚。

original_en: Increase child's Palm ATK.
context: 孩子的掌法攻击力提升。

original_en: Maybe learn some Kicks?
context: 不如去学些腿法？

original_en: Increase child's Kick ATK.
context: 孩子的腿法攻击力提升。

original_en: Concealed Weapons are good. Stay wary, but seek no harm.
context: 暗器不错，害人之心不可有，防人之心不可无。

original_en: Increase child's Concealed Weapon ATK.
context: 孩子的暗器攻击力提升。

original_en: Suggest that your child learn Crafting.
context: 建议孩子去学习制作吧。

original_en: Child's Crafting Lv. +1.
context: 孩子的制作能力提升1级。

original_en: Suggest that your child learn Forging.
context: 建议孩子去学习锻造吧。

original_en: Child's Forging Lv. +1.
context: 孩子的锻造能力提升1级。

original_en: Suggest that your child learn Cooking.
context: 建议孩子去学习烹饪吧。

original_en: Child's Cooking Lv. +1.
context: 孩子的烹饪能力提升1级。

original_en: Suggest that your child learn Taming.
context: 建议孩子去学习驯养吧。

original_en: Child's Taming Lv. +1.
context: 孩子的驯养能力提升1级。

original_en: Suggest that your child learn Weaving.
context: 建议孩子去学习织造吧。

original_en: Child's Weaving Lv. +1.
context: 孩子的织造能力提升1级。

original_en: Suggest that your child learn Geomancy.
context: 建议孩子去学习奇术吧。

original_en: Child's Geomancy Lv. +1.
context: 孩子的奇术能力提升1级。

original_en: It's time for our child to go to school.
context: 孩子已经到了幼学的年纪，要学些东西才好。

original_en: The child learns fast. But what a pity.
context: 这孩子学的很快，只是可惜。

original_en: The family won't be complete.
context: 可惜不能给其一个完整的家。

original_en: Time flies. Our child has grown up. Your fellow disciples visited today with many gifts. Our child was delighted and played with them well into the night before reluctantly tucking in.
context: 不知不觉，我们的孩子已经到了成童的年纪。今日来你师门的同道都来看过，送了不少礼物给孩子。孩子也开心热闹，跟他们玩闹到深夜才不情愿的睡去。

original_en: The little one sure has energy to spare. (Continue reading)
context: 这小家伙还是个人来疯。（继续读信）

original_en: Time flies. Our child has grown up. Your friends visited today with many gifts. Our child was delighted and played with them the whole day. I just tucked the kid in.
context: 不知不觉，我们的孩子已经到了成童的年纪。今日来你那些朋友们都来看过，也带了不少礼物给孩子。孩子也十分开心这些叔伯能来，玩闹了许久，刚刚不久才睡去。

original_en: Hehe, that's my little one. (Continue reading)
context: 嘿嘿，这个小家伙。（继续读信）

original_en: Time flies. Our child has grown up. Today your relatives came to visit our child. They brought a lot of gifts. The kid enjoyed being with the family and just went to bed.
context: 不知不觉，我们的孩子已经到了成童的年纪。今日来你血亲们来家里看望孩子。带了不少礼物前来。孩子也乐的与长辈们亲近，刚刚不久才去睡下。

original_en: Good for the little one to spend more time with family. (Continue reading)
context: 这小家伙也要和亲人们多亲近亲近才是。（继续读信）

original_en: Time flies. Our child has grown up. Your friends visited today with many gifts. Our child was delighted and played with them the whole day. I just tucked the kid in.
context: 不知不觉，我们的孩子已经到了孩提的年纪。今日来你那些朋友们都来看过，也带了不少礼物给孩子。孩子也十分开心这些叔伯能来，玩闹了许久，刚刚不久才睡去。

original_en: Time flies. Our child has grown up. Our neighbors visited lately with a lot of gifts. I've just seen them out and tucked our child in. Then I sent word to inform you of this matter.
context: 不知不觉，我们的孩子已经到了成童的年纪。近日街坊四邻都来看望了孩子，送了不少礼品。刚刚送他们离开，我们的孩子也刚刚睡下，我便传信给你，告知你此事。

original_en: As long as our child is healthy, I'm glad. (Continue reading)
context: 我的孩子健健康康便好。（继续读信）

original_en: Your child has grown up. Thoughts of your lost love fill your heart with sorrow.
context: 你的孩子已经到了孩提的年纪。想起你过世的伴侣，你的心中难免悲伤。

original_en: It's the fate of the mighty to grow in solitude.
context: 强者总是要在孤独中发育。

original_en: Our child will become an adult soon. I've no word of your current well-being, and I can only send letters in hope they find you well.
context: 我们的孩子距离成年已经不远。不知今近况如何，我只能继续写信给你。

original_en: Continue reading.
context: 继续看下去。

original_en: A few days ago, our child swallowed a strange object when I wasn't watching. Unable to induce vomiting, I sought a doctor, who revealed that the ingested item was a Millennium Ganoderma. After just one night, our child's meridians were filled with powerful Chi, far beyond the limits of common folk.
context: 前些日子带孩子出去，一时不察竟让其吞了一支无名异物，催吐不得，寻了郎中来看，其所食之物竟是千年灵芝。一夜之后，其经脉之中真气磅礴，非凡人可以比拟了！

original_en: Your child's Chi has greatly increased.
context: 孩子的真气大幅度提升了！

original_en: Why, that's a blessing in disguise.
context: 这真是因祸得福了。

original_en: Our child is well cared for in my charge, you need not worry. Now that they've grown, I'm hesitant about letting them venture into the Kungfu world. When our child comes of age, I'll let them seek you.
context: 孩子有我照顾，你可放心。如今他已经到了合适的年纪，对是否要让其步入江湖，我有些犹豫。待其成年之后，我让其前往寻你。

original_en: Our child is about to come of age.
context: 我的孩子成人之日将近了。

original_en: Soon, the world will welcome the rise of a little hero!
context: 再过不久，江湖将再填一位小英雄！

original_en: A few days ago, our child stumbled upon an ice toad. I hastily disposed of it, but it was too late. The child burned with fever through the night. The doctor's efforts proved futile. But on the next day, they miraculously recovered, even stronger than before - capable of lifting tremendous weights, far surpassing ordinary limits.
context: 前些日子不知孩子从哪里捡来一只冰蟾，我赶忙将其丢弃，却已经来不及了。孩子发了一夜高烧，我请来郎中也无能为力。却不想第二天其竟然恢复如初，甚至变得力大无比，能负百斤吗，力量远超常人。

original_en: Your child's Load has greatly increased.
context: 孩子的负重能力大幅度提升了！

original_en: An elderly gentleman came by lately and took a great liking to our child. He seemed a man of honor, so I let the kid play with him. On the next day, our child mastered a remarkable Kungfu skill. I wanted to thank the elderly gentleman, but he was nowhere to be found.
context: 前些日子来了一位老先生，对我们的孩子十分喜欢。我见他一身正气不似作伪，便同意孩子与他玩耍一阵。谁曾想第二日，我们的孩子竟然学会了一门精妙的功夫。我本想去寻那老者答谢，却已经找不见他了。

original_en: Your child mastered an unrivaled Skill.
context: 孩子掌握了一门盖世绝学。

original_en: Perhaps I've forged a bond with a great master.
context: 不知是江湖上那位前辈，与我结下善缘。

original_en: An elderly gentleman came by lately and took a great liking to our child. He seemed a man of honor, so I let the kid play with him. On the next day, our child mastered a remarkable Inner Kungfu. I wanted to thank the elderly gentleman, but he was nowhere to be found.
context: 前些日子来了一位老先生，对我们的孩子十分喜欢。我见他一身正气不似作伪，便同意孩子与他玩耍一阵。谁曾想第二日，我们的孩子竟然学会了一门博大精深的内功，我本想去寻那老者答谢，却已经找不见他了。

original_en: Your child mastered an unrivaled Inner Kungfu.
context: 孩子掌握了一门惊世内功！

original_en: A few days ago, we happened to see a peddler selling malt sugar on the street. I bought some for our child. It was sweet and tasty. Sadly, it's not tooth-friendly, so we mustn't indulge.
context: 前些日子，我与孩子一同出门，路上见到一位货郎挑着麦芽糖在卖。我给我们的孩儿买了些，那货郎工艺不错，清甜可口。可惜这物伤牙，不能多吃。

original_en: Your child's Vigor has increased.
context: 孩子的气血增加了。

original_en: The kid's health is paramount. We can buy some more next time.
context: 恩，孩子健康为要，隔一段时间再买些给孩子吧。

original_en: A few days ago, we came across a ferocious dog on the road. I had wanted to step in, but our child was so brave - standing in front of me and yelling at the dog to send it running away, tail between its legs. It was so adorable that I couldn't resist sharing it with you.
context: 前些日子，我与孩子一同出门，路上见到一条恶犬拦路，我本想出手，却不想我们的孩子竟如此勇敢。护在我的身前，对那恶犬呼号几声，就将其吓得吓着尾巴跑了。如此趣事，不得不与你分享。

original_en: Haha, our little one is so brave.
context: 哈哈，小小少年，竟如此勇敢。

original_en: Your child has come of age. It's time to venture into the martial world.
context: 你的孩子已经成年，该是踏出江湖的时候了。

original_en: At last, this day has come. Raising a child has been no small feat.
context: 这一天终于到来，将孩子拉扯成人，实在不易。

original_en: Dad, I'm a grown-up now! I can join you on your adventures!
context: 父亲，如今我以成年，可以随你一同在江湖闯荡了！

original_en: Mum, I'm a grown-up now! I can join you on your adventures!
context: 母亲，如今我以成年，可以随你一同在江湖闯荡了！

original_en: At last, I've come of age. Watch as I make waves and embark on my own journey.
context: 历经许久总算成年，如今天地，翻江倒海又江湖，且看我兴涛掀浪，再开武林新一章。

original_en: Darling, I arrived just in time! You scoundrel! Prepare to meet your doom! !
context: 亲爱的~~还好我来的及时！恶贼~~拿命来！！

original_en: In a critical moment, my lady intervened to rescue me.
context: 命悬一线时，爱人出手相救

original_en: You fiend! ! ! How dare you try to harm my family! I'll face you! !
context: 混蛋！！！竟然想要伤我亲人！！我跟你拼了！！

original_en: In a critical moment, my family intervened to rescue me.
context: 命悬一线时，亲人出手相救

original_en: I'll take you out!
context: 我带你走！

original_en: You dare imprison my brother, release him now! !
context: 竟敢关押我的兄弟，快放他出来！！

original_en: I was imprisoned, and my sworn brother came to rescue me.
context: 我被人关押，结拜兄弟赶来相救

original_en: Just you? Take this punch! !
context: 就凭你？？呵呵，先问问我的拳头！！

original_en: I was imprisoned, and {0}{1} came to rescue me.
context: 我被人关押，{0}{1}赶来相救！

original_en: Just finished the construction you requested. I'm exhausted...
context: 好累哦~~终于把你要的建筑造好了，感觉身体被掏空了......

original_en: You dare imprison my darling, release him now! !
context: 竟敢关押我的爱人，快放他出来！！

original_en: I was imprisoned, and my lady came to rescue me.
context: 我被人关押，爱人赶来相救

original_en: Hey, I'm the boss here. Hand over your money, or you'll be sorry! !
context: 小子，这里之后都是老子的地盘，乖乖把钱拿出来，否则要你好看！！

original_en: Are you talking to me? ?
context: 你在跟我说话？？

original_en: Y-yes, I'm sorry! I... I made a mistake! I didn't realize it was you. Please spare me.
context: 对~~对~对不起！我错了，小的眼瞎了，没看到是大侠您。。求大侠放过我。

original_en: He becomes more frightened.
context: 对方更加的害怕了

original_en: Warn him and let him go
context: 警告并且放过他

original_en: Thank you for sparing my life. I wish to follow you from now on! !
context: 多谢大侠不杀之恩，小的以后想跟着您！！

original_en: He develops an admiration for you.
context: 对方对你产生了崇拜之情

original_en: Accept as a retainer
context: 收为小弟

original_en: {0}{1}, a former robber, surrenders and joins me after seeing my strength.
context: {0}{1}胆敢勒索我，但看清我的实力后拜服，求饶之后被我收为麾下。

original_en: I'm at your service now, ready to obey your every command! !
context: 以后小的鞍前马后，服从您的命令！！

original_en: Master, just give me orders using <TDName>「Command」</>, and I'll follow without hesitation! !
context: 主人今后有何吩咐尽管给我发<TDName>「命令」</>，小的赴汤蹈火在所不辞！！

original_en: Excellent!
context: 很好

original_en: No mercy shall be shown
context: 决不轻饶

original_en: I'm ready to face you! ! !
context: 我~~我跟你拼了！！！

original_en: {0}{1} attempted extortion, leading to a battle when I refused.
context: {0}{1}勒索我，我拒绝后被拖入战斗。

original_en: Hmph! You're no match for me!
context: 哼~~不堪一击

original_en: Why?
context: 为何？

original_en: This is how things work here. Hand over the money!
context: 这就是江湖规矩，把钱拿出来吧

original_en: Lacking martial skills, I reluctantly hand over the money.
context: 此时武功低微，恐怕不敌，忍痛给钱。

original_en: Good decision. Just offer your money next time you see me!
context: 算你识相，以后记得见了老子要主动点！

original_en: Gave him 100 coins.
context: 给了对方100铜钱

original_en: Endure it for now and repay him double when I'm stronger.
context: 委曲求全，等实力精进后让他加倍奉还

original_en: Haha! You're quite sensible.
context: 哈哈哈，你小子真不错。

original_en: {0}{1} attempted extortion, and due to my weak strength, I had to give away my wealth.
context: {0}{1}勒索我，我担心实力不足，破财消灾。

original_en: While they mocked you, they also developed a certain level of admiration.
context: 对方嘲笑你的同时，竟然还产生了一些欣赏态度

original_en: Enduring it for now...
context: 忍了...

original_en: No, I can't bear it! ! !
context: 我忍不了！！！

original_en: Stop daydreaming! !
context: 你简直是妄想！！

original_en: You're asking for trouble! !
context: 你这是找死！！

original_en: {1} with {0} due to grievances, the battle occurred, accidentally lost, but was interrupted by {0}.
context: {1}与{0}因为结怨，发生争斗，不慎落败，竟被{0}打断了腿。

original_en: {1} was interrupted by {0}.
context: {1}被{0}打断了腿。

original_en: {1} has been associated with {0} for a long time, fighting, losing to the opponent, but being looted by {0}.
context: {1}与{0}结缘已久，发生争斗，不敌对方，竟被{0}洗劫一空。

original_en: {1} is ransacked and empty!
context: {1}被人洗劫一空！

original_en: {1} Fighting with {0}, both sides fight each other with their lives. {0} killed {1}.
context: {1}与{0}结怨后发生争斗，双方都以命相搏，{0}下狠手击杀了{1}。

original_en: {1} died in non -life!
context: {1}死于非命！

original_en: You scoundrel, your end is near! ! !
context: 恶贼，你的死期到了！！！

original_en: Why is it like this?
context: 何故如此？

original_en: You have such a notorious reputation, yet you dare to argue. We won't spare you! !
context: 你有如此名声，怎么还有脸狡辩，我等嫉恶如仇，怎能放过你！！

original_en: Admit some of your wrongs and argue that it's none of your concern.
context: 承认有些血债，但与你们无关。

original_en: Do you think your clever words can deceive us? Draw blade! Today is your end! ! !
context: 你这般狡辩还想迷惑我们？拔剑！我们今日非得将你碎尸万段！！！

original_en: Due to my bad reputation, {0}{1} and their fellow have come seeking revenge on me.
context: 由于我的名声不好，{0}{1}等俩个嫉恶如仇人来找我的麻烦。

original_en: Alright, let's confront this head-on!
context: 既然如此，只要迎战！

original_en: You're thoroughly wicked! I can't take you down alone, but together, you're in for trouble! ! !
context: 你简直恶贯满盈！！我一人打不过你，但是我等联手，你在劫难逃！！！

original_en: Stay calm and fight!
context: 沉着应战！

original_en: Take him down! Dealing with a scoundrel like this, martial rules don't apply! !
context: 大家一起上！对付这等恶贼，我们也不必讲江湖规矩了！！

original_en: Due to enmity, {0}{1} and their fellows came to attack me together.
context: 结怨太多，{0}{1}等多人竟然无耻围攻我。

original_en: Try to use money to settle the enmity.
context: 试图用钱财消除结怨

original_en: We won't let you go without 500,000 coins! ! !
context: 没有五十万钱，我等绝不善罢甘休！！！

original_en: Spend more money to get out of troubles...
context: 破财消灾

original_en: Sure, if you're genuine, we'll split the money. Let's move forward, but you must swear not to trouble us anymore! !
context: 好吧，既然你如此有诚意，这些钱我等均分，今后你与我等恩义一笔购销，但你答应不许再找我等麻烦！！

original_en: {0}{1} and their fellows came to attack me. I spent 500,000 coins to resolve the situation.
context: {0}{1}等多人围攻我，还好钱财充足，花费五十万了解恩怨。

original_en: Promise them first since the money has been paid.
context: 钱已经给了，先答应对方

original_en: Give them all the money I have, and settle the rest later.
context: 把身上的钱全给他们，剩下的先欠着

original_en: Okay, we'll take this money for now. Settle the rest when you can. We'll make amends, but you must promise no revenge.
context: 既然如此，这些钱我们先收下了，你自己慢慢归还，我等与你化干戈为玉帛，今后不许找我们算后账！

original_en: {0}{1} and their fellows attacked me, demanding 500,000 coins, forcing me into a huge debt.
context: {0}{1}等多人围攻我，竟然要五十万，无奈欠下巨债。

original_en: I incurred a massive debt...
context: 已经欠下巨债...

original_en: That's insane! I refuse! !
context: 你们穷疯了？？绝不答应！！

original_en: Perhaps unable to win, feigning death might be a good strategy.
context: 害怕不敌，装死或许还有一线生机

original_en: {0}{1} and their fellows came to attacked me. I had to feign death to avoid trouble.
context: {0}{1}等多人围攻我，我怕不敌，装死期望能躲过劫难。

original_en: You dare imprison my family, release him now! !
context: 竟敢关押我的亲人，快放他出来！！

original_en: I was imprisoned, and my family came to rescue me.
context: 我被人关押，亲人赶来相救

original_en: I do not want to conflict with you again, so please friends to come and talk.
context: 在下不想与阁下再起冲突，所以拜托好友前来说和。

original_en: Yes, I've been asked to help them make amends with you. Resolving old feuds is wiser than creating new ones. Letting go of the past would make a great story.
context: 不错，在下受托前来劝解。所谓冤家宜解不宜结，你们二人如果能冰释前嫌，岂不是一段佳话。

original_en: That's exactly what I had in mind.
context: 正合我意

original_en: Great! Let's shake hands and put this behind us.
context: 太好了，握手言和，日后大家都是江湖好友。

original_en: {0}{1} asked their friend to help reconcile with me and resolve our grievances.
context: {0}{1}托好友做说客，与我化解了恩怨。

original_en: The enmity has been reconciled, and there's been a change in attitude.
context: 双方解除结怨关系，对方态度发生变化

original_en: Firmly refuse!
context: 严词拒绝

original_en: More friends than enemies is always better. Can we settle this grudge with my humble request?
context: （皱眉）在江湖上多个朋友总比多个敌人好吧，能否看在我的薄面上了结这段恩怨。

original_en: Reluctantly agree.
context: 勉强答应

original_en: I'm afraid I can't agree.
context: 恕难从命

original_en: Why are you so obstinate? If you agree, I'm willing to provide a treasure map.
context: 你怎么如此固执，如能放过我，在下愿献出一张藏宝图。

original_en: Obtained a treasure map.
context: 获得一张藏宝图

original_en: That's unrealistic.
context: 痴心妄想

original_en: In that case, farewell. You two may resolve your grievances later on your own.
context: 既然如此，在下告辞，你们的恩怨自行解决。

original_en: {0}{1} asked their friend to help reconcile with me, but I refused.
context: {0}{1}托好友做说客，被我言辞拒绝

original_en: Hold on, do you recognize this person?
context: 等等，你看看此人是谁？

original_en: Master... This is...
I could've killed this guy, but his connection to you is strong. I leave this to you.
context: 此人阴险狡诈，我本可处决，但他与你关系匪浅，我想要你自己动手。

original_en: Request Master's mercy for him
context: 请求掌门饶恕他

original_en: This cunning scoundrel will undoubtedly harm your reputation. Why be so lenient? It will seriously damage our sect's standing!
context: 这等奸佞小人，日后必定败坏你的名声，你怎可心慈手软！我派名声也会大大有损！

original_en: Accept the consequences, even if it means expulsion from the sect and physical harm.
context: 愿意承担后果，付出代价（逐出师门、肢体残缺）

original_en: You truly disappoint me. I have no choice but to announce that you're no longer a part of our sect. Take care.
context: 你真是令我心痛，既然如此，我不得不对你出手，今后你不再是我门派之人，生死有命，你好自为之！

original_en: {0}{1} ordered me to execute someone close, but I refused. As punishment, I was expelled from the sect, my Kungfu deprived, my leg tendons severed, and my eyes blinded.
context: {0}{1}命我处决亲近之人，我不愿出手，最终被废除武功、逐出师门、挑断腿筋、刺瞎双眼。

original_en: Expelled from the sect, stripped of my Kungfu, my leg tendons severed, and my eyes blinded.
context: 被废除武功、逐出师门、挑断腿筋、刺瞎双眼。

original_en: Comply with tears
context: 含泪答应掌门

original_en: Attack the Master
context: 偷袭掌门

original_en: Prioritize righteousness
context: 大义灭亲

original_en: Well done! !
context: 做得好！！

original_en: With a heavy heart, I acted in the name of justice, earning the Master's trust and a reputation for being just and ruthless.
context: 忍痛大义灭亲，掌门对我的信任增加了，我获得了嫉恶如仇和心狠手辣的名声

original_en: {0}{1} instructed me to execute someone close, and I opted for the righteous path. This earned me more of {0}{1}'s trust.
context: {0}{1}命我处决亲近之人，我大义灭亲，{0}{1}对我更加信任了

original_en: Indeed... Master... It was the right decision...
context: 是...掌门...我应该做的......

original_en: Firmly refuse
context: 言辞拒绝

original_en: How stupid! In that case, I'll have to eliminate both of you! !
context: 真是冥顽不灵！那我只好清理门户了！！

original_en: {0}{1} ordered me to execute someone close, but I refused. And {0}{1} initiates the battle.
context: {0}{1}命我处决亲近之人，我不答应，与{0}{1}发起战斗

original_en: Battle!
context: 战斗！

original_en: Sir, the first time I saw you, I flipped. Would you consider uniting our fates?
context: 公子，我一见你便心动不已，你可愿与我共结连理啊？

original_en: Politely decline, claiming it wasn't fate
context: 表示没缘分，委婉拒绝

original_en: Now, a final chance for you. Accept it or regret it! !
context: 这可由不得你，再给你一次机会，最好答应本姑娘，否则要你好看！！

original_en: Reluctantly agree due to circumstances
context: 迫于实力，无奈答应

original_en: That's more like it! I promise I'll treat you well, hehe.
context: 这才对嘛，本姑娘一定会对你好的，嘻嘻。

original_en: {0}{1} expressed their affection for me, and I reluctantly accepted. Becomes a couple with {0}{1}.
context: {0}{1}对我求爱，种种原因下我勉强答应。与{0}{1}结为情侣

original_en: Forms an intimate relationship with them.
context: 与对方建立情投意合关系

original_en: Firmly refuse (Battle)
context: 言辞拒绝（战斗）

original_en: The other party has developed dislike.
context: 对方产生了厌恶

original_en: {0}{1} declared her love for me, and when I refused, she attacked!
context: {0}{1}对我求爱，我拒绝后，她竟然出手教训我！

original_en: How could you do this to me? If you don't agree, I'll end it all here. How could you live with that?
context: 你怎么这样对我啊？公子若不答应，我便殉情于此，公子你于心何忍呢？

original_en: You've hurt me deeply, but I won't give up easily!
context: 真让本姑娘伤心欲绝，我绝不会轻易放弃的！

original_en: The other party has become saddened.
context: 对方产生了悲伤

original_en: {0}{1} confessed their love, but I declined firmly. {0}{1} was hurt but persistent.
context: {0}{1}对我求爱，被我严词拒绝，{0}{1}悲伤不已，表示不会轻易放弃。

original_en: Accept delightfully
context: 欣喜若狂，答应对方

original_en: Miss, the first time I saw you, I flipped. Would you consider uniting our fates?
context: 姑娘，我一见你便心动不已，你可愿与我共结连理啊？

original_en: Now, a final chance for you. Accept it or regret it! !
context: 这可由不得你，再给你一次机会，最好答应本公子，否则要你好看！！

original_en: That's more like it! I promise I'll treat you well, hehe.
context: 这才对嘛，本公子一定会对你好的，嘻嘻。

original_en: How dare you reject me! I'll make sure you learn a lesson!
context: 你这是敬酒不吃吃罚酒，本公子教训教训你！

original_en: {0}{1} declared his love for me, and when I refused, he attacked!
context: {0}{1}对我求爱，我拒绝后，他竟然出手教训我！

original_en: How could you do this to me? If you don't agree, I'll end it all here. How could you live with that?
context: 你怎么这样对我啊？姑娘若不答应，我便殉情于此，美人你于心何忍呢？

original_en: You've hurt me deeply, but I won't give up easily!
context: 真让本公子失望，我绝不会轻易放弃的！

original_en: I've heard of your generous spirit, always ready to assist the less fortunate. Could you spare some coins for me?
context: 少侠，听闻您乐善好施，肯为穷苦人伸出援手。能否赏我一些钱财。

original_en: Give 100 coins
context: 施舍100钱

original_en: Thanks. This covers today's meal, but my elderly mother is seriously ill at home. I need more help for her medical care.
context: 多谢少侠，今天的饭钱有着落了，但老母病重在家，还求施主再施些，助我给老母救治。

original_en: Give 100 coins
context: 赠与对方100钱

original_en: Offer a bottle of Astringent
context: 将一瓶金疮药赠与对方

original_en: You are a savior. With this medicine, my mother might have a chance to recover.
context: 真是菩萨心肠，有个药物，老母有救了。

original_en: Offer a bottle of Astringent
context: 赠与对方1瓶金疮药

original_en: You're indeed kind-hearted! My son is always in tattered clothes. Could you spare some clothing for him?
context: 少侠真的是菩萨心肠！我的儿子也是衣衫褴褛，能否再施舍一些衣物。

original_en: Give clothing
context: 将衣服赠与对方

original_en: Haha, your reputation precedes you, and rightfully so!
context: 哈哈，果然名不虚传，哈哈哈！

original_en: Their demeanor shifts, revealing a hidden martial arts master!
context: 对方气势陡然改变，不曾想竟然是一位隐士高人！

original_en: We've crossed paths. If you have any requests, ask away. I'll share my knowledge.
context: 你我有缘，有所求尽管说出来，我必定倾囊相授。

original_en: Their attitude toward you changed.
context: 对方态度产生变化

original_en: Ask for skill teachings
context: 请求传授绝学

original_en: Very well, I will impart to you two secret skills.
context: 好，我便传授给你两个绝学。

original_en: Learned 2 new skills.
context: 学会了两门新绝学

original_en: Met {0}{1} begging, who was a hidden master, and learned two new skills from them.
context: 偶遇{0}{1}乞讨，对方竟然是一位隐士高人，传授我两门绝学。

original_en: Thank you, Master!
context: 多谢前辈！

original_en: Ask for Inner Kungfu teachings
context: 请求传授内功

original_en: Very well, I will impart to you an Inner Kungfu.
context: 好，我便传授给你一门内功，

original_en: Learned 1 new skill.
context: 学会了一门新绝学

original_en: Met {0}{1} begging, who was a hidden master, and learned an Inner Kungfu from them.
context: 偶遇{0}{1}乞讨，对方竟然是一位隐士高人，传授我一门内功。

original_en: Ask for a Gear
context: 请求一件装备

original_en: Here, take this gear as a memento of our encounter. Until we meet again.
context: 嗯，这件装备你收下吧，后会有期

original_en: The master is giving me legendary clothing! !
context: 前辈竟然赠送我一件传说衣服！！

original_en: Met {0}{1} begging, who was a hidden master, and received legendary clothing from them.
context: 偶遇{0}{1}乞讨，对方竟然是一位隐士高人，送了我一件传说衣服。

original_en: Who do you think you are? What makes you think you can teach me? (Refuse Provocation)
context: 你什么身份，我什么身份，用得着你对我倾囊相授？（挑衅拒绝）

original_en: You don't know what's good for you, brat. I'd thought you a kind soul. Tsk, turns out you're not what I expected. Hmph. Until we meet again.
context: 你这小子，当真不识抬举。哼，真是见面不如闻名，老夫还以为你是一个良善之人，哼，后会有期吧。

original_en: You're not quite what I expected.
context: 真是见面不如闻名。

original_en: I appreciate the gesture, but true kindness asks nothing in return. I must decline. (Refuse)
context: 多谢，君子施恩不求回报，还是不必了。（婉言拒绝）

original_en: Your gracious words have impressed me. The world is fraught with danger. Please, I insist that you accept these potions. May our paths cross again.
context: 小友言谈宽仁得体，老夫甚是喜爱，既然你别无所求，江湖走跳难免刀伤剑砍，这些丹药，务必收下。你我有缘再会。

original_en: What a noble gentleman.
context: 真乃仁善君子也。

original_en: In that case, I gratefully accept.
context: 那就却之不恭了。

original_en: Tell them you also lack clothing.
context: 表示自己也是赤身...

original_en: You truly are a noble soul. It's rare to find someone like you nowadays.
context: 你确实是个真君子，当今世界很难见到你这样的人了。

original_en: Show doubt and refuse
context: 怀疑对方，断言拒绝

original_en: Well, you're a good person. I shouldn't have pushed my luck. Farewell.
context: 好吧，你是个好人，我不该得寸进尺，后会有期。

original_en: Agree to help and offer 200 coins
context: 有求必应，赠与200钱

original_en: Give 200 coins
context: 赠与对方200钱

original_en: Express doubt and politely refuse
context: 产生怀疑，委婉拒绝

original_en: Deceive him that you are very poor and can't help.
context: 骗他囊中羞涩，爱莫能助

original_en: Haha, human nature really cannot stand the test. . .
context: 呵呵，真是人心难测啊。。。

original_en: My reputation changed.
context: 我的名声产生变化

original_en: Met {0}{1} begging, pretended to be destitute, reputation damaged, now perceived as Miserly.
context: 偶遇{0}{1}乞讨，我身上有钱但骗他囊中羞涩，名声败坏，变成了视财如命。

original_en: Resolutely refuse
context: 断然拒绝

original_en: It appears that people's reputations aren't always accurate. . .
context: 看来世人所传名不副实啊。。。

original_en: Met {0}{1} begging, refused resolutely and lost the reputation of Charitable.
context: 偶遇{0}{1}乞讨，我拒绝后失去了乐善好施的好名声。

original_en: Master, I feel ashamed that I haven't contributed much to our sect. Please allow me to leave the sect.
context: 掌门在上，感激您的栽培，弟子资质愚钝没有做出什么贡献，请您恩准退出门派归隐田园，祈请掌门开恩。

original_en: Get furious and deprive their Kungfu.
context: 恼羞成怒，废其武功

original_en: Ugh! Why don't you let me leave? I have no other option! !
context: 啊~~！！既然您不肯放过！弟子只好得罪了！！

original_en: Deprived one of their Skills.
context: 出手废除了对方一个绝学

original_en: {0}{1} wants to leave the sect because of my tarnished reputation. Why forgive betrayal? I had to strip him of Kungfu! !
context: {0}{1}竟然因为我的名声不好，想要离开师门！我怎能轻易饶恕，直接废了他的武功！！

original_en: Hmph, so presumptuous!
context: 哼~不自量力！

original_en: Display understanding and agree to their request.
context: 人各有志，答应对方

original_en: Thank you, Master. This is where we part ways. Please take care!
context: 多谢掌门，弟子就此别过，掌门多多保重......

original_en: {0}{1} wants to leave the sect because of my tarnished reputation. I understood his struggle and chose to let him go...
context: {0}{1}竟然因为我的名声不好，想要离开师门！人各有志，我放他离开......

original_en: You may go...
Expel from the sect.
context: 逐出师门

original_en: May I have a word with you?
context: 可否借一步说话

original_en: What's the matter?
context: 何事？

original_en: I've heard you're a tough character, and I have an enemy to deal with. If you could assist me in dealing with him, I'd greatly appreciate it!
context: 听说阁下是个狠人，我有个仇人实在让在下寝食难安。如果你能帮我了结这个祸害，必当重谢！

original_en: Who is that person? How do you plan to deal with him?
context: 这个人是谁？要如何了结？

original_en: This person has stolen our legendary family heirloom weapon. If you help me get it back, here's 2,000 coins upfront. Don't worry, they has no connection to you. If you agree, I'll share their whereabouts with you.
context: 此人抢夺了我家传的传说兵器，解决了此人将兵器送还与我，这2000钱是定金。放心，此人与您毫无关系，如果您答应在下，我会把此人的行踪告诉您。

original_en: Take the job.
context: 答应对方

original_en: Here's an advance payment. Remember to be discreet. I'm counting on you.
context: 这是定金，切记要小心谨慎，不要被人看到。拜托了！

original_en: {0}{1} paid me a 2,000 coin deposit to deal with their enemy and retrieve their family's heirloom weapon.
context: {0}{1}给了我2000钱定金，让我教训他的仇人，并且拿回家传的传说兵器。

original_en: In that case, it's best you forget about this and keep it quiet. It wouldn't be good for you if it gets out. Bye!
context: 既然如此，阁下最好忘记这件事，不要泄漏出去，否则对阁下不利！告辞！

original_en: {0}{1} wanted me to deal with his enemy, and though I didn't agree, I did learn about his enemy possessing the legendary weapon.
context: {0}{1}让我教训他的仇人，我没有答应，但知道了他的仇人身上有传说兵器的消息。

original_en: Not interested
context: 表示没兴趣

original_en: My apologies for the interruption. I'll take my leave now.
context: 既然如此，恕在下打扰了，就此别过。

original_en: I've been struggling financially lately. Could you help me out? I'll make sure to repay your kindness.
context: 在下最近经营困难，我观少侠是大富大贵之人，能否资助在下渡过难关，日后必有重谢！

original_en: How much do you need?
context: 需要多少钱？

original_en: I need 2,000 coins, but any amount you can spare would be a great help. .
context: 在下至少需要2000钱，少一些也是可以的。。

original_en: Decide to invest
context: 决定投资

original_en: Thank you so much! I'll work hard to make my business a success and pay you back.
context: 万分感谢！！在下必定尽心经营，日后回报给您！

original_en: Give them 2,000 coins. Grateful +100
context: 交给对方2000钱，对方感激+100

original_en: Decide to invest half
context: 投资一半

original_en: That's a bit less, but I'll manage. Thanks. I'll definitely repay you down the line.
context: 即使差一些，也许也可以经营起来，多谢，在下日后必有厚报。

original_en: Give them 1,000 coins. Grateful +50
context: 交给对方1000钱，对方感激+50

original_en: Alright, I'll consider other options.
context: 好吧，在下再去想想办法

original_en: My friend, your support during the shop crisis has turned things around.
context: 恩人，之前店铺危机，多亏了您的资助。

original_en: How's business going?
context: 询问经营状况

original_en: Business has been great lately! As a token of my appreciation, please accept this.
context: 老天眷顾，最近生意极好，这是给您的回报，务请收下。

original_en: Accept with pleasure
context: 欣然收下

original_en: I can't thank you enough. If you ever face any difficulties in the future, feel free to reach out to me.
context: 还是多谢您的帮助，今后有何困难随时找我。

original_en: Received a return of 2,200 coins.
context: 获得回报2200

original_en: Received a return of 2350 coins.
context: 获得回报2350

original_en: Received a return of 3,500 coins.
context: 获得回报3500

original_en: Received a return of 3,100 coins.
context: 获得回报3100

original_en: Received a return of 4,000 coins.
context: 获得回报4000

original_en: I invested in {0}{1}'s shop, and it's been quite profitable.
context: 我投资{0}{1}的店铺，回报颇丰。

original_en: I'm really sorry, but I'm not skilled in business, and I've lost everything.
context: 恩人，实在抱歉，在下经营不善，血本无归。

original_en: I understand. Don't worry about it.
context: 表示理解，让他别放在心上。

original_en: I can't thank you enough. Please accept these medicines as a token of my appreciation.
context: 实在是太感激了，无以为报，用这些药品补偿给您。

original_en: Received 3 medicines.
context: 获得3个药品

original_en: I invested in {0}{1}'s shop, but it didn't work out. {0}{1} gave me 3 medicines as compensation.
context: 我投资{0}{1}的店铺，血本无归，{0}{1}给了3个药品作为补偿。

original_en: Give my money back!
context: 表示气愤，让他还钱！

original_en: I honestly don't have any money left, all I can offer is these medicines.
context: 在下实在没钱，只能将这些药品作为补偿了。

original_en: Your attire looks pretty worn. I have some clothes here, choose one.
context: 你这身打扮实在太寒酸。我这里有几件衣裳，你选一件吧。

original_en: Give me the most expensive one.
context: 给我最贵重的衣裳吧。

original_en: You've got high standards and big dreams, which is quite rare. This one is fancy, but it's of no use to me. Take it as a gift!
context: 你眼光高，志向远大,实属难得。这件虽然华贵，但于我无益,就送你吧！

original_en: (They seemed delighted and gave you a refined outfit.)
context: （对方很满意，送给你一件精制衣服）

original_en: {0}{1} seems to appreciate my request and gives me a refined outfit.
context: {0}{1}有点欣赏我，送我一顶精制衣服。

original_en: Many thanks!
context: 太感谢了！

original_en: Any clothes will do.
context: 随便什么衣裳都可以。

original_en: I like your laid-back attitude. In that case, you can have these spare items.
context: 我喜欢你随遇而安的性格，既然这样，这些无用的装备都给你吧。

original_en: (They gave you a crude outfit.)
context: （对方送给了你一套粗制服装）

original_en: {0}{1} values my easygoing nature and gives me a crude outfit.
context: {0}{1}欣赏我的态度，送我一套粗制装备。

original_en: You flatter me.
context: 过奖了

original_en: I don't need anything.
context: 我什么都不要。

original_en: You, walking around nearly naked, and you won't even accept a kind offer?
context: 你这家伙，赤身露体，我一片好心经不领情?

original_en: (They appeared a bit displeased)
context: （对方似乎有些不满）

original_en: Young hero, ever played 「Food Chain Duel」? I'm always up for a game. and have coins to spare. Care to join me for a few rounds?
context: 少侠，在下平时没什么爱好，就是喜欢玩「打筷拳」的游戏，在下身上还有点钱，要不要陪我玩几局？

original_en: Ask about the game's rules.
context: 询问游戏规则

original_en: The rules are quite simple. Both of us simultaneously call out 'Chicken,' 'Worm,' 'Stick,' or 'Tiger,' and it determines the winner. [Chicken eats Worm, Worm bores into Stick, Stick beats Tiger, Tiger preys on Chicken.]
context: 游戏规则很简单，我们双方同时喊出【鸡、虫、棒、虎】其中之一，决定胜负。【鸡吃虫、虫蛀棒、棒打虎、虎吃鸡】。

original_en: Let's begin!
context: 开始吧

original_en: How much are you willing to bet this time?
context: 这次你要押多少钱啊？

original_en: 100 Coins
context: 100铜钱

original_en: Excellent! Let's call it together then...
context: 很好！我们同时喊出来~~~~~~

original_en: [Chicken]
[Worm]! Ah... tough luck, you've won.
Yes! Won 100 coins!
context: 赢了100钱，开心

original_en: I won, let's play another round.
context: 赢了，再来一局

original_en: Let's call it a day!  You've already racked up debts of over 3,000 coins! We can have another go next time.
context: 行了，到此为止吧！！你都欠下3000多钱了！！改日再玩~~

original_en: {0}{1} invited me to play 「Food Chain Duel」, and I got carried away, ending up in deep debt! !
context: {0}{1}找我玩「打筷拳」，我竟然昏了头，陷入其中，欠下巨债！！

original_en: Don't leave! ! ! !
context: 你别走！！！！

original_en: You're quite the player... I've lost all my money. We'll have to have a rematch another day! ! !
context: 你玩的真不赖...都输给你了，我们改日再战！！！

original_en: {0}{1} invited me to play 「Food Chain Duel」, and luck was on my side; I won all of their coins.
context: {0}{1}找我玩「打筷拳」，我运气爆棚，赢光了对方。

original_en: Haha, we'll meet again someday!
context: 哈哈哈，有缘再聚！

original_en: Seems like luck hasn't favored you. You've got less than 300 coins left. It's best to quit now, or you'll end up in debt soon.
context: 阁下手气不佳啊，铜钱都不足300了，算了吧，再玩你就要欠账了~~~

original_en: I want a rematch! !
context: 不服再战！！

original_en: It's best to quit before I lose everything...
context: 不玩了，及时止损...

original_en: {0}{1} invited me to play 「Food Chain Duel」, but luck was not on my side, and I ended up losing everything...
context: {0}{1}找我玩「打筷拳」，我霉运缠身，输了个精光...

original_en: Too bad... alright, maybe next time.
context: 可惜...好吧，那下次有机会我们再玩。

original_en: I quit.
context: 不玩了

original_en: [Tiger]! Aha! I won!
context: 【虎~~~】哈哈哈！我赢了！

original_en: Ugh, lost 100 coins...
context: 倒霉，输了100钱...

original_en: Let's have another round!
context: 我不服，再来一局

original_en: [Worm]
[Stick]! Ah... tough luck, you've won.
[Chicken]! Aha! I won!
context: 【鸡~~~】哈哈哈！我赢了！

original_en: [Stick]
[Tiger]! Ah... tough luck, you've won.
[Worm]! Aha! I won!
context: 【虫~~~】哈哈哈！我赢了！

original_en: [Tiger]
[Chicken]! Ah... tough luck, you've won.
[Stick]! Aha! I won!
context: 【棒~~~】哈哈哈！我赢了！

original_en: Adjust Bet
context: 更改押注

original_en: 300 Coins
context: 300铜钱

original_en: Yes! Won 300 coins!
context: 赢了300钱，开心

original_en: Ugh, lost 300 coins...
context: 倒霉，输了300钱...

original_en: 1,000 Coins
Yes! Won 1,000 coins!
context: 赢了1000钱，开心

original_en: Ugh, lost 1,000 coins...
I quit.
context: 我不玩了

original_en: Let's play next time.
context: 算了，以后再玩

original_en: Try your luck
context: 玩两手试试运气

original_en: I'm not interested.
context: 不感兴趣。

original_en: Congratulations on becoming the Champion! ! !
context: 恭喜您成为武林盟主，我等特来庆贺！！！

original_en: The people display respect and a change in attitude.
context: 众人流露出恭敬的神色，态度发生变化。

original_en: Thank you, everyone.
context: 多谢诸位

original_en: Your achievements are remarkable. Here's a small gift to show our admiration.
context: 盟主功业远胜古今，小的特备薄礼，望主人笑纳。

original_en: Obtained 5 Serpent Ganoderma
context: 获得了5个玄蛇灵芝

original_en: I appreciate your kind gesture.
context: 有心了。

original_en: Congrats! I've got a small gift to show my appreciation. Hope you like it.
context: 恭贺您成为武林盟主，特备礼物，聊表寸心，希望盟主不要嫌弃礼物太轻。

original_en: Obtained 15 Meridian Shift Pill
context: 获得了15个易经转穴丹

original_en: Thank you!
context: 有劳了，多谢！

original_en: Wishing you a prosperous future. Please accept this gift as a token of our support.
context: 盟主万福，今后武林将在您的带领下创造辉煌，在下奉上此物，以表心意。

original_en: Obtained 2 Great Return Pill
context: 获得了2个大还丹

original_en: You became Champion! I couldn't help much, but I searched diligently for this gift. Hope it meets your expectations.
context: 你已成为了武林盟主！！我帮不到你什么忙，就花了点心思寻来此物，不知是否合你心意。

original_en: Obtained 1 Unfulfilled Destiny
context: 获得了1个仙佛茫茫两未成

original_en: You're too kind, your presence here is the greatest gift!
context: 你我不必如此客气，你能来就是最好的礼物！

original_en: Hum...
I emerged victorious in the Kungfu Contest, becoming the Champion. {0}{1} and many friends came to celebrate and bring precious gifts.
context: 我参加武林大会，击败所有高手成为武林盟主，{0}{1}等多位好友前来道贺，送给我很多珍贵的礼物。

original_en: I'd like to talk to you.
context: 我想和你谈谈

original_en: The other person seems a bit down.
context: 对方看上去有些伤心

original_en: What's going on?
context: 询问何事？

original_en: How could you be so unfaithful? I won't stand for it! You can only be intimate with me, so make a decision.
context: 你怎能如此花心！我绝不接受！！你只能与我一人情投意合，做出选择吧。

original_en: (Happy)
context: （开心）

original_en: {0}{1} accuses me of unfaithfulness and demands I end my relationship with the other person. Their distress intensifies their Hysteria.
context: {0}{1}埋怨我花心，要我做出选择，与另外一人解除关系，（他/她）们二人伤心欲绝增加了癫狂隐疾。

original_en: 情投意合关系发生变化
context: 情投意合关系发生变化

original_en: Continue
context: 继续

original_en: How could you treat me like that? . .
context: 你怎能如此狠心对我。。。

original_en: Both of their attitudes have changed.
context: 两人态度发生变化

original_en: Their Hysteria intensified.
context: 对方癫狂隐疾增加了

original_en: I forgave you once, but how could you do this again?
context: 之前我已经原谅过你，你怎能一而再再而三呢？

original_en: Promise not to do it again, seek forgiveness.
context: 保证不会再犯，请求原谅

original_en: {0}{1} accuses me of repeatedly entering into romantic relationships with others. Their distress intensifies their Hysteria.
context: {0}{1}埋怨我又再次与他人结为情侣，最终（他/她）们二人都伤心欲绝增加了癫狂隐疾。

original_en: Their Hysteria intensified.
context: 对方两个人的癫狂隐疾增加了

original_en: Unwilling to compromise
context: 依然我行我素

original_en: I'll teach you a lesson! ! !
context: 我要给你个教训！！！

original_en: {0}{1} decides to teach me a lesson due to my flirtatious nature.
context: {0}{1}因为我风流成性，悲愤难忍，决定教训我。

original_en: Wait, wait, don't be impulsive!
context: 别别别冲动啊~~~

original_en: Refuse the other person.
context: 拒绝对方

original_en: Alright, I wish you happiness.
context: 好吧，祝你幸福

original_en: {0}{1} asked me to make a choice, and after refusing, I ended the relationship with {0}{1}.
context: {0}{1}让我做出选择，我拒绝后与{0}{1}解除情投意合关系。

original_en: Console them.
context: 哄哄对方

original_en: Continue persuading.
context: 继续劝解

original_en: I bear no grudges against them, and they aren't related to me by blood. I agree just because I love you.
context: 我与（他/她）并无结怨，也非血亲，又爱你至深，勉强答应。

original_en: {0}{1} accuses me of infidelity, and despite agreeing reluctantly after persuasion, it significantly intensifies their Hysteria.
context: {0}{1}埋怨花心，经我一番劝解之后，虽然勉强答应但增加了大量癫狂隐疾。

original_en: The other person is deeply distressed.
context: 对方伤心欲绝

original_en: Stop fooling yourself!
context: 你简直痴心妄想！

original_en: The other person now despises you.
context: 对你增加了鄙视态度

original_en: Haha! How dare you intervene my relationship? ! ! You're despicable! Remember to be a better person in your next life! ! !
context: 哈哈哈！！竟胆敢夺我所爱！！！你真是该死，下辈子记得做个好人！！！

original_en: I am incapacitated. {0}{1}, believing that I am trying to interfere in their relationship, attempts to take my life.
context: 我失去行为能力，{0}{1}因为我夺其所爱，竟然乘人之危取我性命！

original_en: What sins did I commit in a past life? I shouldn't have given birth to you! Why do you hold such a grudge against me? !
context: 我前世是做了什么孽！怎么生了你这么个孽种，对我竟是如此仇恨！！

original_en: I see the wrongs of my ways. I'll work hard and change for the better.
context: 我知错了，日后定当励精图治，痛改前非。

original_en: From now on, I'll live a decent life!
context: 从今以后，好好做人！

original_en: Well, you're not that likable.
context: 是你太不讨人喜欢。

original_en: You're just...urgh! ! !
context: 你...真是气死我了！！！

original_en: My lord, I fear that my Bandit status would tarnish your reputation. Please, point me toward a new path.
context: 主上，小的盗匪身份怕会辱没您的名声，您为小的指明一个新的身份吧。

original_en: You can be a Woodcutter
context: 你做樵夫吧

original_en: Understood! Thank you, my lord, for giving me the chance to start anew. I'll do my best.
context: 遵命！多谢主上让我洗心革面重新做人，小的会好好做的。

original_en: {0}{1} feared their Bandit status would tarnish my reputation and, with my permission, started anew as a Woodcutter.
