context: 你做乞丐吧

original_en: {0}{1} feared their Bandit status would tarnish my reputation and, with my permission, started anew as a Beggar.
context: {0}{1}因为盗匪的身份害怕辱没我的名声，请求我的同意重新做人成为了乞丐。

original_en: You should continue being a Bandit
context: 你还是继续做强盗吧

original_en: Understood! At your command, I will carry on with this promising career...
context: 遵命！谨遵主上法旨，小的会继续坚持这份有前途的职业...

original_en: {0}{1} feared their Bandit status would tarnish my reputation and asked for my permission to start anew. I refused and told them to continue their work as a Bandit...
context: {0}{1}因为盗匪的身份害怕辱没我的名声，请求我的同意，我没答应，让他继续做盗匪...

original_en: Excuse me, I have my eye on a house you own. Would you be open to selling it?
context: 打扰了，我看中了您名下的一所房子，能否割爱卖给我？

original_en: Which one?
context: 你看中的是哪里？

original_en: The property here
context: 就是这处房产

original_en: How much do you offer?
context: 你打算出多少钱？

original_en: Here's the cash
context: 这是钱

original_en: Politely refuse
context: 婉言谢绝

original_en: Alright, I'll look around for somewhere else. Goodbye.
context: 好吧，那在下再另寻他处，告辞

original_en: I was just about to buy your house...and you took it down...
context: 我正想买你的房子...你就给拆了...

original_en: Seems like you're a Roamer. If you have nothing to do, how about helping me gather some Refined Iron?
context: 我看你还是个流民，既然无事可做，要不要帮我收集点精铁。

original_en: Accept Quest
context: 这个任务接了

original_en: Great. Let's start by doing some work for money. We have a long journey ahead. Poor Mines don't contain much Refined Iron. But if you happen to find a Rich Mine or Rare Mine, you'll strike it rich.
context: 很好，先做点事情赚钱，以后的路还长着呢。贫矿中精铁的含量低一些，如果找到富矿甚至是稀有矿，那你可就发财了。

original_en: You accepted a Quest. They show Admire.
context: 接了一个任务，对方表达了欣赏态度

original_en: Not interested
context: 没兴趣

original_en: Hey, being lazy does you no good...Ah well, never mind, just do as you please.
context: 你这孩子不要好恶逸劳啊...算了，你好自为之吧。

original_en: I have some spare cash, bro. It's not much, but you can take it.
context: 兄弟，我手头还有一些闲钱，虽然不多你拿去吧。

original_en: I can't do that...
context: 这怎么好意思...

original_en: Now no need for the formalities. Think of it as my investment in you, alright? Don't worry, just take it.
context: 你跟我还客气什么，我这也是在投资你，不要多想，快收着吧。

original_en: Well...thank you...
context: 这...多谢了...

original_en: Alright, I'll get going now. If you need anything, just give me a shout.
context: 好了，我先去忙了，有事随时叫我。

original_en: Obtained 3,000 coins
context: 获得3000铜钱

original_en: {0}{1} noticed my financial struggles, and insisted on giving me the money, even though I tried to decline. It warms my heart.
context: {0}{1}看到我囊中羞涩，我再三婉拒，还是把钱塞给我，心里好暖。

original_en: Obtained 2,000 coins
context: 获得2000铜钱

original_en: Obtained 1,000 coins
context: 获得1000铜钱

original_en: Please, it's alright...
context: 真的不用了...

original_en: Alright then, I'll hold onto it for you. When you need it, just come find me, okay?
context: 那好吧，我先帮你保管，需要的时候随时来找我。

original_en: I don't need this...
context: 表示不需要...

original_en: You have great martial arts potential, what with that form and agility. Join my sect. You'll be off to great things.
context: 我看你姿态矫健、身手敏捷，是个练武的好苗子。加入我的门派吧，前途不可限量。

original_en: View Sect Info
context: 查看门派信息

original_en: Got it
context: 了解了

original_en: Gladly agree!
context: 欣然同意

original_en: Joined sect. They show Admire.
context: 加入门派，对方产生了欣赏态度

original_en: {0}{1} invited me to join their sect. When I agreed, the Master admired me a great deal.
context: {0}{1}邀请我加入门派，我同意后掌门对我很欣赏。

original_en: Understood!
context: 弟子遵命！

original_en: Well...to each their own, I guess. You may go.
context: 既然如此...人各有志，那就此作罢，你走吧。

original_en: Humph! Don't say I didn't warn you! You can do as you please.
context: 哼！不识抬举！那你好自为之吧！

original_en: They developed Dislike
context: 对方产生了厌恶态度

original_en: {0}{1} invited me to join their sect. When I declined, they disliked me...
context: {0}{1}邀请我加入门派，我拒绝后对方竟然厌恶我...

original_en: Insolent brat! ! ! You never learn, do you? You keep gambling like this, I'm beating you to a pulp! !
context: 竖子！！！你真的是屡教不改！一而再的赌博，我打死你！！

original_en: This won't happen again, I promise! !
context: 我再也不敢了！！

original_en: Heavens, what have I done to deserve this? You unruly brat! Correcting your ways pains me more than you know! Take this lesson to heart! !
context: 哎~~~我真的是做的什么孽啊！生了你这个逆子！打在你身痛在我心！！希望你能记住这个教训！！

original_en: My parents were heartbroken because of me. Ailments increased! ! !
context: 父母对我感到伤心绝望，隐疾增加了！！！

original_en: I'm breaking your legs so you'll take this to heart! !
context: 打断你的腿，今后记住这个教训！！

original_en: Because I never learned my lesson, {0}{1} was heartbroken. They broke my legs in hopes that I would finally take my lesson to heart.
context: 因我屡教不改，{0}{1}痛彻心扉，打断我的腿，希望我能记住这个教训。

original_en: No...! I won't do that again, I promise!
context: 不要啊~~孩儿一定改~~！

original_en: My child, have you been gambling? ! ?
context: 孩子啊，你是不是跟人玩钱了！！？

original_en: Admit you played 「Food Chain Duel」
context: 承认玩了打筷拳

original_en: Try to cover it up with a lie
context: 编个谎话，尝试隐瞒

original_en: Insolent brat! ! ! How dare you deceive me! ! ? You're breaking my heart!
context: 竖子！！！你还敢欺瞒我吗！！？真是太让我伤心了！

original_en: Lying broke your parents' heart
context: 撒谎让父母伤心了

original_en: My child, you have disappointed me greatly. Don't gamble. Never gamble! Gambling brings only harm and no joy! It ruins families and takes away lives! I don't expect much, only that you may lead a decent, peaceful life.
context: 孩子啊，你太让我失望了！！切莫赌！切莫赌！赌博唯害绝无乐！妻离子散家产破，落得颈项套绳索！我希望你能堂堂正的做人，不求大富大贵，但求你一世平安。

original_en: Swear to heavens that you won't gamble again
context: 诚恳认错，发誓不再赌博

original_en: Good, good. Nothing better than a prodigal son returning. Go right your ways, but if I find you at it again, I'll make sure to break your legs! !
context: 好，浪子回头金不换，今后要好好做人，再让我发现就打断你腿！！

original_en: {0}{1} was exasperated that you played 「Food Chain Duel」, and made you promise that you'd steer clear of gambling.
context: 因为玩打筷拳，{0}{1}痛心疾首，陈述利害，让我发誓远离赌博！

original_en: Promise in earnest
context: 真诚的答应！

original_en: Say it's just an innocent game
context: 表示只是小游戏，无伤大雅

original_en: Preposterous! So many fools started with innocent games, only to end up in ruin, families torn and loved ones lost! !
context: 荒谬！！你可知多少浑人都是从小赌怡情开始一步步沦陷无法自拔，最终家破人亡、妻离子散！！

original_en: {0}, I'm going to teach you a Skill. Learn it to defend yourself.
context: {0}，我有一门绝学传授给你，你好好学习，多一门防身。

original_en: Okay, I'll check if {0} meets the requisites.
context: 好，我看看{0}是否达到学习条件。

original_en: {0}{1} planned to teach me a Skill.
context: {0}{1}准备传授给我一门绝学。

original_en: Alright, we'll pick it up another day.
context: 那好吧，日后再说。

original_en: {0}, do you want to learn a Skill? I'll be counting on you soon, {0}. The more the merrier.
context: {0}，我有个绝学你要学吗？日后我都要靠{0}了，多多益善呢。

original_en: {0}, you should learn this Skill. No one can lay a finger on you.
context: {0}，我这个绝学你得学一下，以后不怕被人欺负。

original_en: My lord {0}, I have a new Skill for you.
context: {0}，小的有一门绝学您还不会，愿意献给您。

original_en: {0}, let me teach you this Inner Kungfu.
context: {0}，我这门内功也传授给你吧。

original_en: {0}{1} wanted to teach me Inner Kungfu.
context: {0}{1}主动传授给我一门内功。

original_en: {0}, you should learn this Inner Kungfu to protect me better.
context: {0}，我这个内功你还不会，一定要学好，以后好保护我。

original_en: {0}, I'd like to teach you this Inner Kungfu.
context: {0}，我有一门你还没掌握的内功，传给你吧。

original_en: My lord {0}, I have a family Inner Kungfu for you.
context: {0}，小的有一门家传内功，愿意献给主上。

original_en: No! Let go of my master! ! !
context: 住手！！放开我主人！！！

original_en: In a critical moment, my retainer intervened to rescue me.
context: 命悬一线时，麾下出手相救

original_en: Chatter! Chatter! Chatter! ! !
context: 吱吱吱！！吱吱吱吱吱！！！

original_en: Stop yapping, beast! I'm gonna kill you! !
context: 一个畜生也敢叫嚣！我宰了你！！

original_en: Why are you so disheveled? Didn't I give you clothes before? Why don't you put them on?
context: 你怎么还是衣衫不整啊，我不是之前送你衣服了吗？为何不穿上？

original_en: Long story. . .
context: 一言难尽啊。。。

original_en: Yeah, just put them on, or you'll catch a cold. Care to join me for a drink, to kill some time?
context: 嗯，赶快穿上吧，免得伤寒。闲来无事，我们共饮一杯如何？

original_en: Exactly what I have in mind.
context: 在下正有此意

original_en: That's the stuff!
context: 真是痛快哈哈哈！

original_en: They Admire you
context: 对你产生欣赏

original_en: When {0}{1} and I met again, we shared a drink to our hearts' content.
context: 我与{0}{1}再次相遇，一同饮酒，两人畅快淋漓。

original_en: Let's drink and make merry. Tomorrow's worries can wait. Haha!
context: 今朝有酒今朝醉~哪管明日再哪睡~~~哈哈哈

original_en: Cheers!
context: 干杯！

original_en: See you on the flip side.
context: 那改日再聚，告辞。

original_en: Till next time.
context: 再会。

original_en: I gave it to someone in need.
context: 我送给更需要的人了。

original_en: What a remarkable act of kindness. There would be far less strife if everyone were as decent as you are. . .
context: 想不到你竟有如此善举，如若江湖中人人都如你一样真诚待人，那也不会有这么多纷争了。。。

original_en: They mused, and forced another garment into your arms.
context: 对方感慨后，又强塞给你一件衣服

original_en: I met {0}{1} again. After hearing my story, {0}{1} pondered and insisted on giving me another garment.
context: 我与{0}{1}再次相遇，{0}{1}听闻我的诉述，一番感慨后，又送我一件衣服。

original_en: Let go of my Master! !
context: 立刻放了我的主人！！

original_en: I was imprisoned, and my retainer came to rescue me.
context: 我被人关押，麾下赶来相救

original_en: Chatter! Chatter! !
context: 吱吱吱吱吱吱！！

original_en: Where did the beast come from? Die!
context: 哪里来的畜生！！找死！

original_en: You're awake, child. You gave me quite a fright. You suddenly passed out on the ground. I gave you some water, and you woke up.
context: 孩子你醒来了，真是吓死我了。刚刚你忽然就昏倒在地。我喂了你些清水，你变醒来了。

original_en: Good to see you're fine. The Clinic Manager said they've found out something about memory loss. He wants to see you in the village.
context: 你无事便好，郎中说已经找到失忆症状的信息了，让你去村子里找他。

original_en: Sounds good.
context: 如此便好。

original_en: You're quite lucky to have survived that. I'm in a good mood, so I won't bother with you. The Clinic Manager of the village wants to see you. You can go find him now.
context: 你还真是命大，竟然这都没死。今日我心情不错，就不与你一般见识了。村子里的郎中说要找你，你快去见他吧。

original_en: You're finally awake. I just saw you collapsed on this ship, pale as a sheet. I feared you wouldn't make it.
context: 你终于醒了，刚刚看到你晕倒在这船上，面色煞白，还以为你活不成了。

original_en: Oh, I'm a farmer from a nearby village. I came here to gather some herbs, and I saw you collapsed on the ship. I gave you some water, and you woke up.
context: 哦，我是附近村子的农夫，要来到这里采些药材，却见你倒在这船上，刚喂了你些清水，你便醒了过来。

original_en: Who are you?
context: 你是谁？

original_en: Where am I?
context: 我在哪？

original_en: This is Six-Mile Longting. Skyland Village is not far ahead.
context: 此处名唤龙亭六里，再往前不远便是天秤村。

original_en: As you utter “where am I”, you sense a flicker of fear on the farmer's face, as if this scene has played out before, many, many times...
context: 当你再次说出我在哪的时候，你能明显感到眼前农夫的脸上生出一丝恐惧的神情，仿佛这个场景发生过无数次一般...

original_en: ...Have we met before...
context: ......我们是不是在哪见过...

original_en: I don't think so.
context: 并没有见过.

original_en: It's as if I'm stuck in a never-ending dream. Every day, I wake up to familiar faces, familiar lines...Where am I? ...Where am I...
context: 我仿佛做了一场无法醒来的梦，每天睁开眼睛，熟悉的人，熟悉的话，我在哪？...我在哪...

original_en: A chilling truth strikes you both. Yet it flickers for the briefest of moments. Then it is gone.
context: 一个令人毛骨悚然的事实同时出现在你们两个的脑海之中。可只是存在了一个瞬间，便消失不见。

original_en: You watch as the farmer before you take on a vacant stare. Eventually, he addresses you, in a voice that can only be described as robotic.
context: 你看着眼前的农夫逐渐变得呆滞，最终用着可以称之为机械的声音对你开口道。

original_en: Uncanny. Exaggeratedly, disconcertingly so. Suddenly, realization dawns on you.
context: 极端夸张的不自然，极端别扭的不自然，你忽然明白了什么。

original_en: (Bows) Thank you!
context: （恭敬行礼）多谢！

original_en: What about the ship?
context: 船？

original_en: The ship came from across the sea. We do trade now and then, just not sure how far off they sailed.
context: 这船是从海那边过来的，我们平时也会做一些交易，只是不知海那边有多远。

original_en: Thank you.
context: 多谢你。

original_en: Don't sweat it. I just gave you some water and you woke up.
context: 不必客气，我只是喂了你些清水你便醒来了，

original_en: I feel much better
context: 我感觉已经好多了

original_en: This book was next to you when you were out. I can't read the script, but it's probably something important to you. You hold onto it.
context: 你昏迷的时候，身边还有这本书，我看不懂里面的文字，不过应该是对你很重要的东西，你收好吧。

original_en: I know the script. It's the Heavenly Scrolls.
context: 这文字我认识，是一本天书宝典。

original_en: I'm glad you're alright. You look unfamiliar, so I reckon you're not from around here. I wonder what brought you to this spot. How come you were passed out here?
context: 你没事便好，看你面生，应该不是本地人，不知你因何来此，又怎会昏迷在此处？

original_en: Honestly, I have no clue either.
context: 实不相瞒，我也不知为何。

original_en: I heard from the village Clinic Manager that some people lose memories after a disaster. Maybe that's what happened to you? Anyway, since you're alright, guess I'd get going.
context: 我听村里郎中说，有人落难之后会失去一些记忆，可能你便是如此了。也罢，既然无事，我就去忙我的事了。

original_en: I'm in your debt. Is there anything I can do for you?
context: 大恩不言谢，有什么我能帮你的吗？

original_en: Alright, you can go chop some trees or dig some mines. Or you can practice Qinggong and climb to the mountain peak. Many herbs grow up there. I'd appreciate it if you could bring me 10 Licorice.
context: 也好，你可以去砍树挖矿，或者练习轻功后爬上山顶，上面有很多草药，顺便帮我带回10个甘草就感激不尽了。

original_en: Obtained Quest: Gather Licorice
context: 获得收集甘草的任务

original_en: I wake up from a daze. Seems like my memories are gone. {0}{1} gave me some water, helped me regain consciousness, and told me many things. To repay his kindness in these Great Wilds, I decided I'd lend him a hand.
context: 我从浑噩中醒来，似乎忘记了过去的记忆。{0}{1}喂了我些清水，救我醒来，告诉了我许多事情。如今我身处大荒界之中，为了报答对方的恩情，我决定先帮他一点小忙。

original_en: Leave it to me
context: 放心，交给我吧

original_en: I'm in your debt. I promise I'll find a way to repay you.
context: 大恩不言谢，日后必有厚报。

original_en: Then I'd be on my way to gather herbs. If you want to ask about your memory loss, it might be helpful to speak to the Clinic Manager at the village Clinic.
context: 那我便采药去了，对于你失去记忆之事，若你有想法，可去村里寻医馆的郎中了解一下。

original_en: I wake up from a daze. Seems like my memories are gone. {0}{1} gave me some water, helped me regain consciousness, and told me many things. I decided to repay {0}{1}'s kindness later. It's more important to figure out why I lost my memories.
context: 我从浑噩中醒来，似乎忘记了过去的记忆。{0}{1}喂了我些清水，救我醒来，告诉了我许多事情。{0}{1}的恩情我决定之后再报答他。先搞清楚自己为何会失去记忆比较重要。

original_en: Thank you
context: 多谢了

original_en: C'mon, you gotta tell me where the village is before you fly off.
context: 你再忙也得先告我我村子在哪吧？

original_en: So rude. Ah, fine. That's how kungfu folks are these days, no manners at all.
context: 你这人好生无礼，罢了罢了，现在的江湖人都是这个样子，不懂礼数。

original_en: They show Dislike
context: 对方表现出厌恶的态度

original_en: I wake up from a daze. Seems like my memories are gone. {0}{1} gave me some water, helped me regain consciousness, and told me many things. I felt anxious and found it hard to talk to {0}{1} calmly. After asking about the village's location, I quickly departed.
context: 我从浑噩中醒来，似乎忘记了过去的记忆。{0}{1}喂了我些清水，救我醒来，告诉了我许多事情。我有些焦虑，实在难以心平气和的和{0}{1}说话，问了村子的位置之后，草草离开。

original_en: I'm the master of this mountain! Hand over your money! Gotta use it for my trip!
context: 此山是我开！留下点钱来给我当盘缠吧！

original_en: I've been gathering herbs here for a decade, never knew a mob boss like you here. I thought I was doing good, but alas, I ended up saving a villain!
context: 我在此地采了十几年的药材，却不知还有你这么个山大王在。本以为自己行善积德，却不想救了一个恶人！

original_en: I wake up from a daze. Seems like my memories are gone. {0}{1} gave me some water, helped me regain consciousness, and told me many things. Despite my best self-restraint, I couldn't resist the strange tingle under my skin. I stared at {0}{1}, and an evil idea reared its head.
context: 我从浑噩中醒来，似乎忘记了过去的记忆。{0}{1}喂了我些清水，救我醒来，告诉了我许多事情。虽然我极力克制，但心中那莫名的悸动完全无法抗拒，我看像{0}{1}，一个邪恶的想法冒了出来。

original_en: What's it got to do with you?
context: 我的事情，与你何干。

original_en: I'm just curious. There are only ores and herbs here, not many folks come by. Finding you passed out here and all, that got me curious. Anyway, since you're alright, guess I'd get going.
context: 只是好奇心作怪，这附近只有些矿石草药，少有人来，见你昏迷在此，难免想要问问。也罢，既然无事，我就去忙我的事了。

original_en: I'm afraid I can't tell you anything, seeing it's my private affairs.
context: 个中尚有难言之隐，恕难相告。

original_en: Oh, some sort of vendetta? Well, seems like there'll be a storm brewing. Anyway, since you're alright, guess I'd get going.
context: 莫非是江湖仇杀不成？唉，看来这日子又不太平喽。也罢，既然无事，我就去忙我的事了。

original_en: It's none of your business.
context: 多管闲事。

original_en: Heh, you don't talk nice, do you? Ah well, my bad for prying. Skyland Village is not far ahead. Many beasts roam these wild lands. Don't be reckless, or you might risk your life.
context: 你这人好生无礼，罢了，算我多事。这附近偏僻，多有野兽出没，前方不远便是天秤村，莫要逞强免得误了性命。

original_en: I'm in your debt. I have matters to attend to.
context: 大恩不言谢，我尚有要事。

original_en: Glad you're alright. Skyland Village is not far ahead. Many beasts roam these wild lands. If anything comes up, you can seek me out in the village.
context: 嗯，你无事就好。这附近偏僻，多有野兽出没，前方不远便是天秤村，若有什么事可来村里寻我。

original_en: I'm fine, don't worry about me. (Skip the novice guide)
context: 我没事，不用管我。（跳过新手引导）

original_en: In that case, I will go about my own business.
context: 既然如此，那我就去忙自己的事情了。

original_en: That's what I need. Thank you.
context: 就是这东西，多谢多谢。

original_en: My pleasure.
context: 举手之劳。

original_en: Grateful +30
context: 对方对我感激+30

original_en: Swift moves. You were wobbling on your feet just a while ago, and now you can leap in the air. You must be Veteran in your Technique, with enough to go upon.
context: 我见你动作敏捷，刚刚连走路都有些摇晃，现在竟能一跃丈高，应是已然武技小成，有一技傍身了。

original_en: You're Veteran
context: 已然小成了

original_en: A peculiar Roamer arrived in our village a while ago. He's acting weird, but you can tell he used to be a hero. Perhaps he might know something about you.
context: 我们村里近日来了一位神神叨叨的流民，但看得出之前是个江湖侠客，说不定会知道一些你的事情。

original_en: Perhaps you could introduce me to him?
context: 有劳先生引荐。

original_en: Alright, I'll show you the village. You can ask around there.
context: 好，我告诉你村子在哪，你可以去那里找。

original_en: I helped {0}{1} gather some herbs. My abilities improved in the process. He told me the location of a village. Perhaps I can find some clues to my memory loss there.
context: 我帮{0}{1}采了些草药，在这过程中我的能力都有所提升，他告诉了我一个村子的位置，或许我能在那里找到一些关于我失去记忆的线索。

original_en: You can ask around the village.
context: 你去村子找找吧。

original_en: I helped {0}{1} gather some herbs. My abilities improved in the process. He said someone in the village might have clues to my memory loss. I decided to pay the village a visit.
context: 我帮{0}{1}采了些草药，在这过程中我的能力都有所提升，他说我之前发现的村子里或许有人知道关于我失去记忆的线索，我决定去那个村子好好看看。

original_en: It's a treacherous world. You need a strong physique to walk this realm. You're unsteady on your feet, maybe because you just woke up? Perhaps you could go chop some wood or gather some herbs to get your bearings and level up your Technique, get yourself ready for the kungfu world.
context: 这世道险恶，行走江湖需得有个好身体，我见你脚步虚浮可能是刚刚醒来还不适应，不如去伐木或是采些药材适应一下，提升一下武技能力，才好在江湖上闯荡。

original_en: Level up Technique by chopping wood, mining, and gathering. Press R to view Abilities
context: 通过砍树、挖矿、采集可以提升武技，查看能力快捷键R

original_en: Got it.
context: 明白了

original_en: What about the pay?
context: 不知报酬几何？

original_en: Right, right, almost forgot. I wouldn't take your trouble for granted. Here you are. Thank you for helping me with the herbs.
context: 对对对，我差点忘了，怎能让你白走一趟，这些钱你拿好，多谢你帮我采药了。

original_en: Obtained 100 coins
context: 获得100铜钱

original_en: The farmer said you were looking for me.
context: 我听农夫说你在找我？

original_en: Do you know of memory loss?
context: 阁下可知失忆之症？

original_en: Some people lose memories after suffering a great hardship. They're distressed and forget many things. What of it? You know someone with the condition?
context: 失忆之症乃是人遭逢大难之后，受到刺激，故而忘记许多事情，怎么？莫非你身边有患有这种病症之人吗？

original_en: Well, in fact, that would be me.
context: 实不相瞒，正是在下。

original_en: My medical skills are limited. I can't find any problems with you. I'm afraid I can't be of much help. Don't lose heart though. It's a big world. I'm sure you'll run into remarkable people who can help you sort this out.
context: 在下医术粗浅，实在没有看出有什么问题，真是爱莫能助。不过你也不必气馁，江湖之大，总会碰到一些奇人隐士，帮你解困惑。

original_en: Guess that's all for now
context: 现在也只好如此了

original_en: Sorry I couldn't be of more help. Here, take these two garments.
context: 在下没帮上什么忙，这两件衣服你拿去吧

original_en: {0}{1}, the Clinic Manager of the village, knew very little about my memory loss. Before my departure, {0}{1} gave me a piece of clothing. As I walked the road, draped in this single garment, I couldn't help feeling lost. Who am I?
context: 村子里的郎中{0}{1}对我失忆的事情知之甚少，临行之际{0}{1}送了我一件衣服，我披着单衣走在路上，心中不由得一片茫然，我究竟是谁。

original_en: To tell the truth, I have a buddy...
context: 实不相瞒，我有一个朋友....

original_en: You don't have a house of your own. If you deplete your Vigor, any further damage would lead to Inner Injuries in your Meridians...
context: 你现在没有自己的房子住，万一气血空了之后再受到伤害经脉就会有内伤了...

original_en: What should I do then?
context: 那怎么办？

original_en: You can restore Vigor by sleeping. Here, take these wild grass. Make do with a grass mat for now. Later you can build your own house.
context: 睡觉可以回复气血，这几个杂草给你，你先做个草席凑合用吧，以后可以自己建个房子。

original_en: Obtained materials. You can click Craft Item in Backpack, and select Grass Mat for crafting.
context: 获得了一些材料，可以点击背包的制作物品选择草席进行制作。

original_en: Hey! Damned monkeys! Messing up my place every day!
context: 哎呦！这群死猴子！天天来我家里捣乱！

original_en: What's up, buddy?
context: 这位朋友，发生什么事了？

original_en: Alas, there's a great mountain surrounding this village. I hunt the birds and animals there for a living. But lately, a bunch of monkeys settled in the mountains. They're so ridiculously nimble, they put tigers to shame. These monkeys have taken over the entire mountain. They scare off all my game, and sneak into my house to steal my brew.
context: 唉，这村子周围有座大山，平日飞禽走兽不少，我经常抓些猎物，以此为生。可不知道什么时候，那山上来了一群猴子，身手灵敏矫健，竟不输虎豹。这群猴子将那山占了，惊走了我的猎物不说，还经常来我家里偷酒去喝。

original_en: Look, they just paid me another visit, turned everything upside down.
context: 这不，刚刚又来我这光顾一番，把我家翻得乱七八糟。

original_en: Such mischief shouldn't go unpunished.
context: 这猴儿如此顽劣，应当惩戒一番！

original_en: I feel the same way. Problem is, these monkeys seem to have picked up some kungfu. I'm no match for them. They wreck my home, and all I can do is watch.
context: 我也想如此，只是这群猴子不知道从哪学了些拳脚，我竟也不是对手，心有余而力不足，只能眼睁睁看他们在我家里放肆。

original_en: Leave it to me.
context: 此事交给我吧。

original_en: If you could teach them a lesson, grab two jars of Monkey's Wine, I promise to repay you handsomely.
context: 唉，若这位侠士真能帮我教训教训两只猴子，给在下带两瓶猴儿酒，在下必有重谢。

original_en: {0}{1} from Skyland Village had been harassed by monkeys lately. They stole his wine every day, and turned his place upside down. I decided to help him deal with the problem.
context: 天秤村中的{0}{1}最近正被附近的猴子骚扰，说是每日偷他的酒喝，还要把他家里翻得乱七八糟。路遇此事的我打算出手帮他解决了这个问题。

original_en: If nothing else works, you can just move out.
context: 实在不行，就搬走吧。

original_en: Well, I guess you have a point. I have no idea what I did to offend those monkeys. Very well, I'll just pack up and move out of here.
context: 唉，这位侠士所说在理，我也不知怎的得罪了这群猴儿，罢了，我最近便收拾收拾，搬到别处去住了。

original_en: {0}{1} from Skyland Village had been harassed by monkeys lately. They stole his wine every day, and turned his place upside down. For a big guy to be bullied by monkeys...what a loser. Best he moves away.
context: 天秤村中的{0}{1}最近正被附近的猴子骚扰，说是每日偷他的酒喝，还要把他家里翻得乱七八糟。好大的人竟被猴子欺负，这样窝囊还是让他搬走算了。

original_en: You're on your own
context: 那你自求多福吧

original_en: Bullied by monkeys? What a loser.
context: 好大的人竟能被猴子欺负。

original_en: Dislike +5
context: 对方厌恶+5

original_en: Please, have mercy! I had no idea it's your land. Please, spare me.
context: 大王饶命，大王饶命，在下不知此山是大王之地，饶命，饶命呀。

original_en: Demand money, spare his life.
context: 勒索钱财，饶他一命。

original_en: Thank you, thank you sir! This is everything I have. It's all yours to take.
context: 多谢大王，多谢大王。这是小老儿的全部身家，全都献给大王了。

original_en: And your house?
context: 还有房子？

original_en: Yes, yes, I have a hut. Please, do take it if it suits your fancy.
context: 房子，啊对，还有一间茅屋，大王喜欢，也可以一并拿去。

original_en: And your daughter?
context: 还有女儿？

original_en: A chill runs down his spine. The farmer shudders.
context: 农夫只感觉浑身恶寒，打了一个冷颤。

original_en: Please, sir. She is dearest to me. I beg of you, please, have mercy.
context: 大王，女儿是小老儿的心头肉，可万万不能如此呀大王。

original_en: Heeheehee
context: 桀桀桀

original_en: Cut the crap. Your life? Or your dearest?
context: 废话少说，你是要命还是要你的心头肉！

original_en: Kill me. Kill me! I can't let you take her, you thug!
context: 你杀了我吧，就算杀了我也不会让女儿跟了你这恶贼！

original_en: Take his head.
context: 取其首级。

original_en: You fiend! ! ! Divine punishment awaits! !
context: 你这个恶人！！！必遭天谴！！

original_en: I took away everything {0}{1} has. Ah, the ecstasy! Perhaps I don't need a past after all. It's best to live in the present!
context: 我几乎夺走了{0}{1}的所有，这种感觉真是太好了！或许我不在需要什么过去了，活在当下才是最好的！

original_en: Break his limbs.
context: 打断四肢。

original_en: You bastard! I will be avenged! !
context: 你这混蛋！！会有人给我报仇的！！

original_en: I'm not a devil after all.
context: 毕竟我也不是什么魔鬼。

original_en: Seized a property
context: 抢夺了一处房产

original_en: Consider yourself lucky!
context: 算你识相。

original_en: Thank you, sir, thank you. This way to the village.
context: 多谢大王，多谢大王，这里是村子所在。

original_en: Let him go
context: 放他一马

original_en: Spare him this once. There's no next time.
context: 念在恩情，放他一次，下不为例。

original_en: I was just messing with you.
context: 适才相戏耳。

original_en: The farmer feels a chill down his spine as he observes your unpredictable mood.
context: 农夫只觉得一阵恶寒，看着喜怒无常的你，冷汗直流。

original_en: Where's this village you were talking about?
context: 你刚刚说的村子在哪？

original_en: That way
context: 就在那个方向

original_en: Hey, isn't it a monkey from the mountains? You managed to tame it!
context: 咦，这不是山上的猴子吗？竟被侠士你驯养收服了！

original_en: Piece of cake.
context: 不过是小事一桩。

original_en: To have subdued those troublemakers. Impressive. Here, take these heirlooms. They'll go to waste in my possession anyway. But in your hands, they serve a better purpose.
context: 侠士确实不凡，竟连这顽劣的猴儿都能降服。我这些先人留下的东西，留在我手里也是无用，不如赠与侠士，请侠士万万不要推辞。

original_en: In that case, I'll accept them with gratitude.
context: 恭敬不如从命。

original_en: Obtained Skill Manual
context: 获得一本绝学秘籍

original_en: I'm doing so to help you, not for riches.
context: 行侠仗义，不为钱财。

original_en: A truly honorable hero. If you ever need help, don't hesitate to ask me.
context: 侠士高义，日后若有所需，但有驱使，敢不效力。

original_en: I heard there's a sect that fights alongside animals. Perhaps you'd be interested.
context: 我听闻江湖上有一个门派，能够驯服动物，协同作战。少侠若有兴趣，可以前往一观，或有增益。

original_en: Worship Increased
context: 对我的崇拜增加了

original_en: I helped {0}{1} deal with their monkey problem, and tamed a little monkey to boot. When I declined payment, they held me in great admiration. {0}{1} saw the little monkey by my side, and told me the location of a sect.
context: 我帮助{0}{1}解决了猴子的骚扰，还驯服了一只小猴子。行侠仗义不为财富，他对我崇拜万分。{0}{1}见我身边的小猴，告诉了我一个门派的位置。

original_en: What about my pay?
context: 我的报酬呢。

original_en: Do take this money as a token of my gratitude. If it weren't for you, I'd still be suffering from my monkey crisis.
context: 这些钱请你万万收下，若无侠士，我还苦于这群猴子引发的骚乱呢。

original_en: Gratitude Increased
context: 对我的感激增加了

original_en: I helped {0}{1} deal with their monkey problem, and tamed a little monkey to boot. {0}{1} saw the little monkey by my side, and told me the location of a sect.
context: 我帮助{0}{1}解决了猴子的骚扰，还驯服了一只小猴子。{0}{1}见我身边的小猴，告诉了我一个门派的位置。

original_en: I helped {0}{1} deal with their monkey problem, and tamed a little monkey to boot.
context: 我帮助{0}{1}解决了猴子的骚扰，还驯服了一只小猴子。

original_en: To have learned such remarkable skills from those monkeys in no time. What incredible talent.
context: 侠士确实不凡，竟然只是这么短的时间就从那些猴儿身上学的了如此精妙的绝学，这等天资世间罕有。

original_en: Hmm, what's this refreshing aroma? Would that be Monkey's Wine?
context: 咦，你身上怎有一股清冽的酒香？莫非是猴儿酒？

original_en: It's Monkey's Wine.
context: 是猴儿酒。

original_en: Hmm, strong booze mellowed with rich fruit. Robust, with a hint of sweetness. A true delicacy. So they were stealing from me to brew their own Monkey's Wine. It all makes sense now.
context: 嗯，酒气扑鼻又带了浓浓的果香味，烈性之中带着几分甜美，当真是人间绝品。原来这群猴子从我这里偷东西只是为了去酿制猴儿酒。原来如此。

original_en: Perhaps you could give them some wine once in a while?
context: 不如隔段时间给猴子们送些酒去？

original_en: You have a point. Had I known what they were up to, I would have put some liquor in the backyard for them to take. Here, take this money. Thank you for figuring it out. I would have still been in the dark otherwise.
context: 侠士所言极是，早知如此，我就放些酒在后院，给这群猴子去取了。这些钱请你万万收下，若没有你我还不知这群猴子为何总来我家光顾呢。

original_en: I helped {0}{1} resolve their monkey problem and figure out why monkeys kept harassing {0}{1}. {0}{1} gave me some money as a token of gratitude, and I gladly accepted.
context: 我帮助{0}{1}解决了猴子的骚扰。也搞清楚了猴子骚扰{0}{1}的原因，{0}{1}得知了前因后果对我十分感激送上了一些金钱作为报酬，我欣然笑纳。

original_en: I helped {0}{1} resolve their monkey problem and figure out why monkeys kept harassing {0}{1}. {0}{1} gave me some money as a token of gratitude, but I declined. {0}{1} was impressed by my chivalry and admired me much.
context: 我帮助{0}{1} 解决了猴子的骚扰。也搞清楚了猴子骚扰{0}{1}的原因，{0}{1}得知了前因后果对我十分感激送上了一些金钱作为报酬，江湖侠客行侠不留名，拒绝了报酬，见识到了我的侠气，{0}{1}对我崇拜万分。

original_en: In any case, the monkeys still made a lot of mischief.
context: 即使如此，猴子所为仍是顽劣。

original_en: You have a point. Now that they've been disciplined, they ought to cause less trouble. Do take this money as a token of my gratitude. If it weren't for you, I'd still be suffering from my monkey crisis.
context: 侠士所言极是，如今这群猴子被惩治一顿，应当会老实不少。这些钱请你万万收下，若无侠士，我还苦于这群猴子引发的骚乱呢。

original_en: You want it? Name a price.
context: 想要？出个价吧。

original_en: This Monkey's Wine is a true delicacy. Unfortunately, I'm short on cash. Perhaps you'd settle for a Concealed Weapon?
context: 这猴儿酒确实是人间绝品，可我如今囊中羞涩，不如用这暗器来换如何？

original_en: I'd still prefer cash.
context: 暗器不如铜钱实在。

original_en: Sounds good.
context: 如此也好。

original_en: Obtained Crude Concealed Weapon
context: 获得一把粗制暗器

original_en: You must be the hero the hunter spoke of. Alas, misfortune befell him after you left. He asked me to give you these items if you were ever to return, so that you didn't help him deal with those monkeys for nothing.
context: 你就是猎户所说的侠士吧，唉。你走之后猎户他便遭了不测，还交代我，若见你回来将这些东西交予你，也不枉萍水相逢你帮他教训这群猴子出气。

original_en: Accept
context: 收下吧

original_en: Since he has passed on, it's best that his belongings go with him.
context: 斯人已逝，这些东西他一同下葬吧。

original_en: The hunter was lucky to have a loyal friend like you. May he rest in peace.
context: 你真是重情重义，猎户有你这样的朋友也不枉此生了。

original_en: They Salute me. I gained a Loyal Reputation.
context: 对方产生了佩服，我获得了重情重义的名声

original_en: You should watch your words and actions, young one. It's best to treat others with kindness, or you won't know when you might make enemies.
context: 你这孩子，说话做事不要这么冲！江湖上还是要与人为善，否则不知道什么时候就得罪什么人...

original_en: Apologize
context: 认错道歉

original_en: I'll let it slide. Here's the village. Go find the Clinic and treat your wounds.
context: 这次我就原谅你了，这是村子的位置，你自己去找医馆治伤吧。

original_en: That's the way I am! !
context: 我就是这样！！

original_en: Well, suit yourself.
context: 那你好自为之吧。

original_en: It won't serve you well to make needless enemies. Even my patience has its limits. Go treat your wounds at the Clinic. Don't be so reckless in the future!
context: 江湖上不要轻易得罪人，我的容忍也是有限度的，你自己去医馆治伤吧，以后不要如此冲动做事！

original_en: Thank goodness I was nearby to save you in time.
context: 还好我就在这附近，可以及时救你。

original_en: I was attacked by bandits when I journeyed through the wilds. Fortunately, a master named {0}{1} intervened and saved me from harm. After talking to him, I learned that the former Champion had also suffered from memory loss. Perhaps I could uncover the truth about my origins if I became the Champion? I should ask {0}{1} about sects when I have time.
context: 我行走大荒之时，被盗匪袭击，幸好名为{0}{1}的高手出手相助，我才幸免于难。与他交流之后才知道，曾经的武林盟主也得过失忆之症。或许成为武林盟主才是了解我身世的办法？有空找{0}{1}问问门派的事情吧。

original_en: Are you alright?
context: 你没事了吧

original_en: Thank you, good master. Allow me to repay this debt in the future. May I know who I am indebted to?
context: 多谢前辈，救命之恩容后再报。不知您是？

original_en: Ah, I am just an insignificant nobody. By a stroke of fate our paths crossed, so to your aid I came. Sit down, let me treat your wounds first.
context: 呵，我本是江湖上名不见经传的小角色，今日因缘与你相遇，这才出手救你，你坐下，我先帮你运功疗伤。

original_en: I feel much better.
context: 我感觉好多了。

original_en: I sense profound Inner Kungfu. You must be one of great renown.
context: 我观前辈内功深厚，绝不是寂寂无名之辈......

original_en: I'm curious why you'd attach importance to me.
context: 不知前辈为何对我如此看重？

original_en: Ah, it appears you're unaware of your natural kungfu talent. A one in a million prodigy. I couldn't resist being drawn to your potential. That's why I came to save you. That begins the bond between us.
context: 呵呵，小友怕是不知自己天生武骨，乃是万中无一的练武材料。我也不免见猎心喜，起了爱才之心。这才出手救你，这便是你我之间的缘了。

original_en: I wonder if you've heard of memory loss.
context: 见前辈能为不凡，不知是否了解失忆之症。

original_en: Indeed I've heard a thing or two about this curious condition in my travels. It's rumored that the former Champion had also been afflicted, but no one knows how they were cured.
context: 我广游四方，这失忆奇症也曾听过一二。传闻当年的武林盟主也曾得此奇症，但如何治愈，却未听得风声。

original_en: Do you know anything about the Cargo Ship that bore me here?
context: 那前辈可知道载我到此的商船来历

original_en: The mysterious Cargo Ship is connected to a secretive force in the kungfu world. It has far-reaching implications that even Champions would hesitate to speak of. Champions are also related to your memory loss. It seems that you have no other choice but to become the Champion, should you wish to know more.
context: 那商船神秘非常，关系到武林中一股隐秘势力。此事非同小可，牵扯甚广，历代武林盟主都对其忌讳莫深。兼之你患有失忆奇症，也与武林盟主有关，若你真要深究这些，只怕除了成为武林盟主之外，别无他法。

original_en: Guess I have to let it drop, for now.
context: 如此看来，只能暂且搁下。

original_en: Your Kungfu is impressive. I wonder where you hail from.
context: 前辈身手不凡，不知究竟何方神圣。

original_en: Hahaha, I'm but a lone traveler in this world. There's nothing impressive about me.
context: 哈哈哈哈，名川独走惯春秋，四海通行逍遥游。我不过一介浮萍，江湖过客而已，哪里是什么“神圣”。

original_en: Thank you for helping me out. I wonder if you could teach me a few moves.
context: 多谢前辈救我，不知能否教我一招半式？

original_en: Hahaha, I'm used to a laid-back life. Teaching is not a thing for me. Very likely I'll point you in the wrong path.
context: 哈哈哈，老夫自在散漫惯了，哪里做得来教人的活计，若要强求，只怕是要误人子弟喽。

original_en: I really mean it. Please, could you honor my request?
context: 在下真心求教，望前辈成全。

original_en: Hahaha, alright, alright. I was indeed intrigued by your natural talent. It would be insincere of me to pretend otherwise. I may be able to teach you a few moves, but my learning may not be suitable for you. I do not wish to distort such a fine gem as you. There are many prestigious sects in this world, each with its own profound arts. My knowledge is limited, but I can give you a simple overview of these sects. Feel free to ask me if you're interested. You can then choose a sect that appeals to you.
context: 哈哈哈，罢了，罢了，你天生武骨，老夫本就动了心思。话已至此若我再推，未免虚伪。教你一招半式并非不可，只是老夫所学对你而言不一定合适。璞玉未雕，老夫当真不愿耽误你。这天下广大，名门大派多如牛毛，不少武学都奇诡精绝，博大精深。老夫虽涉猎不深，但为你讲解这些门派的特色，却是没有问题。你若有兴趣，自可问我，寻个喜欢门派去学。

original_en: Thank you, good master.
context: 那就多谢前辈了。

original_en: I was about to step into your battle with the bandits, when you treated me to an impressive showdown. Hahaha.
context: 我看到你与盗匪战斗，还不等我出手救你，就看了一场好戏，哈哈哈。

original_en: I was attacked by bandits when I journeyed through the wilds, but I managed to defeat them. It was not until a master named {0}{1} started clapping that I realized there was someone there. After talking to him, I learned that the former Champion had also suffered from memory loss. Perhaps I could uncover the truth about my origins if I became the Champion? I should ask {0}{1} about sects when I have time.
context: 我行走大荒之时，被盗匪袭击，在我打退他们之后，名为{0}{1}的高手拍手叫好，这时我才发现竟然有人在我身后。与他交流之后才知道，曾经的武林盟主也得过失忆之症。或许成为武林盟主才是了解我身世的办法？有空找{0}{1}问问门派的事情吧。

original_en: I appreciate your kindness. May I know your name?
context: 前辈的好意我心领了，不知您是？

original_en: Ah, I am just an insignificant nobody. I sensed you were in danger and wanted to help out.
context: 呵，我本是江湖上名不见经传的小角色，感到你有危险，想要与你结一段善缘。

original_en: {0}, the gentleman's movement is not handled, today I will argue with you !!
context: {0}，君子动口不动手，今日我要与你一辩雌雄！！

original_en: Hehe ~~ I want to see what high discussion you have!
context: 呵呵~~我倒要看看你有何高论！

original_en: It's troublesome!! I just want to speak with my fist!
context: 真是麻烦！！我只想用拳头说话！

original_en: Ignore them
context: 无视对方

original_en: What? You have nothing to say? I dare not argue with me!
context: 怎么？你无话可说？竟然不敢与我一辩！

original_en: Haha, it's been a while. You've grown stronger.
context: 哈哈哈，小友旬日未见，如今再会，今非昔比了。

original_en: I only dabbled in the basics. It's nothing to boast about.
context: 不过学了些三脚猫的功夫，前辈见笑了。

original_en: Hahaha, your modesty is commendable. I knew you're meant for greater things. Now that we've met again, I'd like to aid you in your Kungfu training. Name something, and I'd oblige.
context: 哈哈哈，谦恭不亢，老夫果然没看错人。今日再会，老夫有意成全小友武道之路，若有所需，小友但说无妨。

original_en: Thank you. I'll give it some thought.
context: 多谢前辈，容在下思考片刻。

original_en: I need a handy Weapon.
context: 需要一件趁手的兵器。

original_en: Then take this. The day you become Champion, don't forget to invite me for a toast.
context: 那就把这个送你，他日若成了武林盟主，莫要忘了请老夫吃酒。

original_en: Obtained Legendary Weapon
context: 获得一把传说兵器

original_en: It's been a while since {0}{1} and I last met. After catching up, he offered to assist me in my kungfu pursuits. Upon my request, he gifted me a handy Weapon. I was overjoyed.
context: 相隔许久，我与{0}{1}再度相会，相谈一阵之后他决定助我武道路上再上一层，在我的要求之下，赠了我一件趁手兵器，令人欣喜。

original_en: Thank you
context: 多谢前辈

original_en: Alright, I have pressing matters to attend to, so I'll take my leave. May you ascend to greatness the day we meet again.
context: 好了，我尚有要事在身，先行离去。希望下次与小友重逢之日，小友已然神功大成，傲立武道巅峰了。

original_en: I shall redouble my efforts so as not to squander your kindness.
context: 自当勤奋不辍，不负前辈深恩。

original_en: I wish to have a suitable Concealed Weapon.
context: 若有合适的暗器再好不过。

original_en: Obtained Legendary Concealed Weapon
context: 获得一枚传说暗器

original_en: It's been a while since {0}{1} and I last met. After catching up, he offered to assist me in my kungfu pursuits. Upon my request, he gifted me a Concealed Weapon. I was overjoyed.
context: 相隔许久，我与{0}{1}再度相会，相谈一阵之后他决定助我武道路上再上一层，在我的要求之下，赠了我一件暗器，令人欣喜。

original_en: A good hat would be useful.
context: 君子无冠不正，望前辈成全。

original_en: Obtained Legendary Hat
context: 获得一顶传说帽子

original_en: It's been a while since {0}{1} and I last met. After catching up, he offered to assist me in my kungfu pursuits. Upon my request, he gifted me a headpiece. I was overjoyed.
context: 相隔许久，我与{0}{1}再度相会，相谈一阵之后他决定助我武道路上再上一层，在我的要求之下，赠了我一顶头冠，令人欣喜。

original_en: Good robes would be useful.
context: 如有宝衣护体，定不负前辈冀望。

original_en: Obtained Legendary Clothes
context: 获得一件传说衣服

original_en: It's been a while since {0}{1} and I last met. After catching up, he offered to assist me in my kungfu pursuits. Upon my request, he gifted me a precious garment. I was overjoyed.
context: 相隔许久，我与{0}{1}再度相会，相谈一阵之后他决定助我武道路上再上一层，在我的要求之下，赠了我一件宝衣，令人欣喜。

original_en: Good bottomwear would be useful.
context: 江湖路险，希望有一件不错的下装。

original_en: Obtained Legendary Pants
context: 获得一条传说裤子

original_en: It's been a while since {0}{1} and I last met. After catching up, he offered to assist me in my kungfu pursuits. Upon my request, he gifted me a bottomwear. I was overjoyed.
context: 相隔许久，我与{0}{1}再度相会，相谈一阵之后他决定助我武道路上再上一层，在我的要求之下，赠了我一件下装，令人欣喜。

original_en: A unique Skill would help.
context: 若有亡轶之绝学，定能攀武道之峰。

original_en: Acquired Secret Skill
context: 学会一门不传绝学

original_en: It's been a while since {0}{1} and I last met. After catching up, he offered to assist me in my kungfu pursuits. Upon my request, he taught me a long-lost Skill. I was overjoyed.
context: 相隔许久，我与{0}{1}再度相会，相谈一阵之后他决定助我武道路上再上一层，在我的要求之下，教了我一门失传绝学，令人欣喜。

original_en: A unique Inner Kungfu would help.
context: 传闻有失传内功，不知前辈可有涉猎。

original_en: Acquired Secret Inner Kungfu
context: 学会一门不传内功

original_en: It's been a while since {0}{1} and I last met. After catching up, he offered to assist me in my kungfu pursuits. Upon my request, he taught me a long-lost Inner Kungfu. I was overjoyed.
context: 相隔许久，我与{0}{1}再度相会，相谈一阵之后他决定助我武道路上再上一层，在我的要求之下，教了我一门失传内功，令人欣喜。

original_en: Potions would help
context: 行走江湖，若有灵丹傍身，自然无虞。

original_en: Obtained 10 Great Return Pills
context: 获得10颗大还丹

original_en: It's been a while since {0}{1} and I last met. After catching up, he offered to assist me in my kungfu pursuits. Upon my request, he gifted me some potions. I was overjoyed.
context: 相隔许久，我与{0}{1}}再度相会，相谈一阵之后他决定助我武道路上再上一层，在我的要求之下，给了我一些灵丹妙药，令人欣喜。

original_en: {0}{1} is extraordinary. He recognized me even after my rebirth into this world. Upon accepting his gift, I made up my mind to get to the bottom of all my mysteries.
context: {0}{1}这人当真神通广大，我莫名重生一世，他竟然也能认得出我。我接受了他的赠与之后，决定要将身上的一切秘密探究到底。

original_en: Thank you, good master. But I'm afraid we've never met before.
context: 多谢前辈，但是你我应该从没见过面

original_en: Haha, is that so? Well, let's leave it at that. I'm in a good mood. If you have a request, feel free to name it.
context: 呵呵，小友与我当真没见过吗？罢了罢了，便当是没见过吧。老夫今日心情甚好，小友若有所需，但说无妨。

original_en: It's been a long time since I last heard of {0}{1}. Imagine my grief when I learned that {0}{1} had passed away. I accepted the gifts from {0}{1}'s friend, and vowed to redouble my efforts, so as not to let {0}{1} down.
context: 相隔许久，再次得到{0}{1}的消息，{0}{1}竟然已经撒手人寰。我悲痛万分，接受了{0}{1}朋友赠送给我的宝物，立志勤练不辍，不辜负{0}{1}对我的期望。

original_en: What's your name? I don't think we've met before.
context: 不知前辈何人？你我似乎并不相识。

original_en: Does 「Yuwen」 ring a bell? I'm his sworn brother. He often talked about you. Sadly, he passed away a while ago. He knew of your pursuit of kungfu. Before his passing, he entrusted me with finding you and offering you guidance.
context: 不知你是否还记得「宇文」兄？我乃是他的结拜兄弟，他总与我提起小友你，前些日子他已经驾鹤仙去了。我那兄弟知道小友你欲攀武道之巅，故而临走之前特别嘱咐，让我寻你为你再添些助益。

original_en: No, Master [Yuwen]...Please, I need a moment.
context: [宇文]前辈他竟然，惊闻噩耗，容在下缓和片刻。

original_en: Hehe, my brother had always led a carefree life. If he saw you like this, he might have had a good chuckle. Let me know if you have any requests. It was my brother's last wish.
context: 嘿嘿，我那兄弟生性豁达，见了你这幅样子，说不定还要笑你。你若有所需，大可说来，莫要辜负我那兄弟的一番心思。

original_en: Forgive me, I have yet to grasp the true meaning of life and death.
context: 唉，生死乃人生大事，晚辈尚未看透，见笑了。

original_en: Heavenly Saint
context: 天圣老人

original_en: Seems they noticed after all. The timing isn't ideal, but when push comes to shove, we have to carry it through.
context: 他们到底还是注意到了，虽然时机还未成熟，但箭在弦上，不得不发了。

original_en: Master? How come you're here! Did you see what just happened?
context: 前辈？！你怎么在这！刚刚的一切，你都看到了吗？

original_en: We're in the midst of a crisis, so there's no time for catching up. You've raised the alarm of the Venerables. The substitution spell no longer works. I can only appear before you in my true form.
context: 如今事态严重，叙旧的话语便免了吧。你已经引起尊者的警觉！入替之术已然失效，不得已我只能以本来面目前来见你。

original_en: The substitution spell...it resembles the possession spell of those two Venerables!
context: 入替之术，似乎与刚刚那两位“尊者”的附体之法如出一辙！

original_en: Hehe, didn't expect you to be so perceptive. I dared not reveal too much before you regained your memories, seeing there's so much at stake. But now, there's no point in keeping this from you any more. I shall tell you everything.
context: 呵呵呵呵，想不到你如此敏锐，事关重大，之前在你未拿回记忆之前我不敢向你透露太多。不过事已至此，隐瞒已经没有意义，一切的一切，我都将与你细细道来。

original_en: Who are you?
context: 你究竟是谁？

original_en: I am the Heavenly Saint. For centuries I've walked the Kungfu world, and honed my skills to perfection. Yet I was felled when defending the beings of these Wilds, stripped to my primordial spirit, having to possess bodies to exist.
context: 我乃天圣老人，纵横江湖数百年，武学修为早已臻至化境！却因要为这大荒生灵出头，落得如今这般仅剩下元神需要附体而生的下场。

original_en: Who are the Venerables?
context: 尊者是谁？

original_en: Heh, the so-called Venerables are the most wicked beings to walk this earth. Centuries ago, they founded the Huanmos Temple and used vile means to collect the world's Kungfu Skills, destroying numerous sects in the process. All they wanted was to control the Great Wilds and place the whole world under their tyranny.
context: 呵，所谓尊者乃是天下间最卑劣之人。数百年前他们建立幻魔寺，以卑鄙的手段搜罗天下绝学，灭门无数。所作所为便是为了掌控整个大荒，使整个世界震慑于他们的淫威之下。

original_en: Who am I?
context: 我是谁。

original_en: As for you, haha. Hundreds of years ago, there was one who strode the Wilds undefeated. One hailed as a Kungfu legend, the unchallenged champion of the martial arts world. Indignant at the deeds of the Huanmos Temple, the righteous hero set out with his friend to take down Huanmos.
context: 你是谁，呵呵。数百年前有一人，纵横大荒不败，被誉为武林神话，江湖的无冕之主。他一身正气，对幻魔寺的所作所为义愤填膺，便与他的好友一同，前往幻魔寺征战。

original_en: Would that be... !
context: 前辈所说莫非？！

original_en: Yes. You are the Kungfu legend of yore, the uncrowned lord of the Wilds. And I...I am the Heavenly Saint, the friend who fought alongside you in Huanmos Temple.
context: 没错，你便是那数百年前的武林神话，大荒的无冕之王。而老夫天圣老人，便是当初与你并肩作战攻入幻魔寺的挚友。

original_en: And what became of that battle?
context: 那一战的结果....

original_en: We suffered a crushing defeat. Turns out there were a band of Primal Kungfu masters in Huanmos Temple, while on our side, we two were the only ones to reach that realm. Faced with such disparity, you were gravely wounded and fell into a coma, while my body was destroyed, leaving only my primordial spirit.
context: 一败涂地。幻魔寺之中竟然有数位先天高手，而我们这边只有你我两人跨越武道障壁进入先天境界。战力悬殊之下，你重伤昏迷，我肉体溃散，只剩元神留存。

original_en: What about the ship? What's the ship about?
context: 那船呢？船是什么？

original_en: That's the Ferry. The Venerables use it to reap the world. Inhabitants of the Wilds offer their valuables. Kungfu experts are ferried to Huanmos Temple, where they are devoured and assimilated, to ensure the Venerable's rule.
context: 载你那船名唤“往渡”。乃是尊者们收割天下的媒介，大荒之人要将贵重的物质献上，超过一定修为的武林高手，都会在一段时间之后被“往渡”接去幻魔寺被他们吸收炼化，以保证他们的统治。

original_en: Are they aware of their fate?
context: 那些高手知道自己自己上船后的下场吗？

original_en: Would that make any difference? You saw what the Venerables are capable of. They have ascended the Primal realm, far beyond the reach of mortals. Their wield a truly terrible power. Whoever dares defy them will be erased from the world, the entire family exterminated.
context: 知道如何，不知道又如何？刚刚尊者的手段你也感受到了，破入先天境界已非凡人，手段几可通天。谁敢反抗下场便是彻底被从世界除名，整个家族鸡犬不留。

original_en: Why do they call me Cultivator?
context: 他们为何唤我为耕夫？

original_en: Hahaha. You cultivate the world, just like a farmer. They brainwash those who defy Huanmos, until they become mere pawns. These pawns surveil the world for them, removing uncertainties and fortifying their rein.
context: 哈哈哈，耕耘世界，如同农夫。他们会将反抗他们的人洗脑成为他们的棋子，为他们暗中监视世界，减少变数，以巩固他们的统治。

original_en: Why did I wake up on the ship?
context: 为何我会从船上醒来？

original_en: After our defeat, I went into hiding, thinking I no longer had the power to defy Huanmos Temple. Little did I expect to see you again, here in the Wilds. Fortunately, you were born with Kungfu talent, and I needed very little effort to summon back your primordial spirit and soul. That's why you were able to learn all these Kungfu skills with ease. After all, you created many of them yourself.
context: 那日战败之后，我东躲西藏，本以为此无力再对抗幻魔寺的压迫，却不想一日竟然见你重现大荒。所幸你武骨天成，我只用了极少的力量便唤回了你的灵智与元神。这也是为什么你学习这些大荒武学十分简单速成的原因。这些武学之中甚至有不少乃是你创造出来的。

original_en: It all makes sense now.
context: 原来如此。

original_en: ...What do you plan to do next?
context: ......那之后你想怎样？

original_en: It's not about me. It's about both of us!  Should we uproot Huanmos Temple and restore this world to peace and order? Or spend our days in hiding, watching as people suffer.
context: 不是我想怎样，是我们想怎么样！！是将幻魔寺连根拔起，还这世界一个朗朗乾坤，还是如我一般终日乾乾，东躲西藏，见苍生蒙难，众生沉沦。

original_en: For the sake of the innocent people, we cannot evade our obligation.
context: 苍生何辜....我辈义不容辞。

original_en: Haha, exactly the hero I remember! Well said. In this world of ruin, who else can shoulder this obligation, if not us?
context: 哈哈哈，这股英雄气概，这才是我记忆中的你！不错，天地无眼，众生沉沦，这苍茫之间，舍我辈其谁呢？

original_en: Tell me what I need to do.
context: 说吧，我该如何做。

original_en: You need to cross the ocean. Head north and seek the Huanmos Temple realms beyond the sea. They have sharks in the sea. You must be very careful. If you have good Energy, you can use the Qinggong Fly On Water and traverse the sea. If you have enough Vigor, you can try being swallowed by a shark, as it will bring you straight to Huanmos Temple.
context: 需要穿过大海！朝着正北方寻找海外幻魔寺的领地！海中有他们控制的鲨鱼，你需要万分小心！内力深厚可以使用轻功蜻蜓点水，一路从海面掠过。如果你气血充沛倒是可以被鲨鱼吞掉，它自然会带你去幻魔寺。

original_en: Are we going just like this? From what you told me, I'm not what I used to be.
context: 就这么去？听你所述，如今的我似乎远不比从前。

original_en: Of course not, if the Venerables were vigilant. But so used to power they are, they have long ceased to care about worldly affairs. Almost everything is handled by their Huanmos Servants, puppets of Huanmos Temple. They possess powers surpassing mortals, but so predictable they are, it will be possible to take them down with might or wit.
context: 若是那些尊者足够警惕，自然不行。但那些人作威作福惯了，早已经不问世事。几乎一切都教给灵仆打理。灵仆都是幻魔寺的傀儡，虽然掌控超越凡人之力，但其行事循规蹈矩，并非不可力敌或是智取。

original_en: Even I am no match for Huanmos Servants, who have surpassed mortals.
context: 超越凡人的灵仆，如今的我，只怕也非对手。

original_en: They are but a bunch of lowly wits. As long as we are careful, we'd be able to divide and conquer. As long as we can open the Heavenly Gate before the Venerables have time to react, we can set free everything they have amassed over the years, with or without form. By then, it will be too late for the Venerables to do anything.
context: 那些家伙都是灵智低弱之辈，若行事小心，分而破之，一定可以成功！只要在那些尊者还未反应过来之前，打开天门，放出他们这些年前收拢的有形无形各类物质，解放众生，就算尊者反应过来，也已经无济于事了。

original_en: What's the Heavenly Gate?
context: 天门？

original_en: The Huanmos Temple plundered not only rare treasures, but also the Energy of kungfu experts, the souls of martial arts prodigies, your memories, my body. All of these have been locked within a place called the Heavenly Gate.
context: 幻魔寺掠夺的并非只有奇珍异宝，成名高手的内力，武学奇才的魂魄，你的记忆，我的肉体，都被他们锁在一个名为天门的建筑之中。

original_en: I never knew a place like this existed.
context: 世间还有如此奇物？

original_en: If I had told you before today that someone could harness the weather and engulf the Wilds, you probably wouldn't have believed me.
context: 若是今日之前，我说有人可以翻手云雨鲸吞大荒，只怕你还以为翻手云雨四字只是一个形容词而已。

original_en: That's amazing.
context: 实在不可思议。

original_en: Very well, the decision is up to you. No matter what your choice is, know that I'll have your back. Farewell...
context: 好了，如何抉择全都取决于你，无论如何我都会在暗中支持你，再会...

original_en: Even if I don't stand up against them, I don't think they'll let it pass.
context: 即使我不愿反抗，只怕他们也不会善罢甘休。

original_en: Such an ominous aura. Who are you again?
context: 恐怖的气息，你又是何人。

original_en: I'm [Yuwen]. You don't recognize me in this form?
context: 我是你的[宇文]前辈，如今换了副样子，你便认不出我了？

original_en: [Yuwen]? !
context: [宇文]前辈？！

original_en: Who are you? ? ! !
context: 你是谁？？！！

original_en: I had to discard my vessel 「Yuwen」, and talk to you in this form.
context: 我的残体「宇文」已经丢弃，迫不得已用这具残体与你对话。

original_en: Oh no! Your primordial spirit is about to be expelled from your body! !
context: 大事不妙！你的元神马上就要被抽离肉体魂飞魄散了！！

original_en: (Unable to control my body, I can't utter a sound)
context: （我无法控制身体，我说不出话来）

original_en: I can hear you. Don't panic. Time is running out, so I'll keep it short. I'm sending a mantra to you. Repeat it silently in your mind.
context: 我听得到你的声音，不要惊慌，时间紧迫，长话短说，我传你一道口诀，你在心中默念。

original_en: (You silently recite the mantra, and feel the burden on your primordial spirit lift)
context: （默念口诀感到神魂清明，元神之上的压迫感减少许多）

original_en: This method will protect your primordial spirit. You're about to be expelled from this realm, and your body will be imprisoned here. But I've opened other paths. You can return to Great Wilds and find a way to recover your body.
context: 此法能护住你的元神，你即将被逐出世界，此肉体将被禁锢，无法从此天命通道接入世界，不过我已设法开启其它通道，你可以借此再入大荒，寻机解救此身。

original_en: <GuideRed>This is an important choice! ! ! ! ! </>\\nSelecting <GuideRed>[Advance the Story]</> will move the plot forward. Your current character will be imprisoned, and you'll need to create a new character to rescue them before you can use them again. \\nSelecting <GuideRed>[Free Exploration]</> allows you to explore freely without advancing the plot. Your character will return to Great Wilds, and you can continue playing.
context: <GuideRed>此处为重要选项！！！！！</>\\n选择<GuideRed>【推进剧情】</>将会推进剧情，玩家此角色将会被囚禁，需要新建其他角色解救后才能使用。\\n选择<GuideRed>【自由探索】</>自由探索，不进行剧情推进，角色返回大荒，可继续游玩。

original_en: [Advance the Story]
context: 【推进剧情】

original_en: I can feel my consciousness fading...
context: 感觉意识逐渐模糊了.....

original_en: Please take care! I'll await you in Great Wilds...
context: 万事小心谨慎！我在大荒等你......

original_en: The voice grows fainter until there's silence...
context: 声音越来越远.....直到一片死寂......

original_en: [Free Exploration]
context: 【自由探索】

original_en: I have no other option but to use my last resort. I'll burn some of my primordial spirit to help you escape, but if you get trapped again in the future, I might not be able to rescue you. Are you prepared? I'll start now.
context: 罢了，看来只有动用最后的办法了。老夫将会燃烧一些元神之力祝你脱困，但老夫元神有限，若下次再次受困，老夫不一定还能救得了你！准备好，我要开始了！

original_en: With a composed and concentrated mind, my body slowly becomes weightless.
context: 静气凝神，身体逐渐放空。

original_en: Radiance, the Sunlit
context: 阳 · 太阳烛照

original_en: Calamity, the Moonlight
context: 劫 · 阴 · 太阴幽荧

original_en: Hahaha, incredible! Absolutely incredible! After waiting for countless ages, today has finally arrived!
context: 哈哈哈，了不起！！了不起！！无尽岁月的等待，终于换来今日！

original_en: Countless ages? Something doesn't seem right. !
context: 无尽岁月？！有些不对？！

original_en: The Heavenly Gate has opened, and from now on, I shall no longer be held back!  Hahaha!
context: 天门 已然打开，从此老夫将再不受拘束了！哈哈哈哈！

original_en: Held back? Wait! Could it be!
context: 拘束？难道！不好！

original_en: You bold cultivator! How dare you defy Karma and open the Heavenly Gate! Do you realize the seriousness of your sins?
context: 大胆耕夫！竟敢违背天命，打开天门！你可知你犯下何等罪责！

original_en: What's going on?
context: 这究竟是怎么回事！

original_en: Radiance, what's unfolding today is meant to teach you that everything has its preordained destiny! You took control of the Heaven Realm, closing the Heavenly Gate and isolating the Three Realms. Did you ever envision this reunion? !
context: 哈哈哈哈哈哈，阳，今日之事，便是教你万物生灭自有定数！你窃据上界，自命为天，关闭天门绝地天通，隔绝三界，可曾想过有这么一天会与我重逢呢？！

original_en: So, it was you who manipulated the cultivator. No wonder even I was misled, thinking he had simply gone astray. Cultivator, do you realize that your momentary confusion will bring great disaster to all living beings?
context: 原来，是你在耕夫身上使了手段。怪不得就连我也错判，认为他只是出了问题。耕夫，你可知因你一时之蒙蔽，将为三界众生带来何等劫难？

original_en: After today, sentient beings will lose their order. The cycles of prosperity and decline, birth and death, will be disrupted. Because of you, the primordial spirits of all beings will fall into chaos!
context: 今日之后，众生失序，天人难免五衰轮替之苦。五行三界，将有枯荣生灭，劫难轮回。众生元神寂灭，重归混沌愚昧，乃是你一手造就！

original_en: Don't pay heed to his nonsense! What you did was in harmony with heavenly will, to save the beings of the Three Realms from control! The foundation of this world extends across three thousand realms, where life should naturally cycle between birth and death. Yet, you so-called deities have disrupted the cycle, upsetting the balance of heaven and earth!
context: 莫要听他胡说！你所做乃是顺天应命，救三界众生脱离掌控！这天地根上三千世界，有生无灭，众生本该轮回有序，今日你做天人，明日我做草木！可尔等上界所谓神灵竟阻隔元神轮转，破坏天地平衡！

original_en: Calamity, we've reached this point, why continue to hide? Reveal yourself!
context: 劫，事已至此，何必躲藏，还不现身出来！

original_en: Hehe, in another place, I might fear you to some extent, but in here, what can you possibly do to me?
context: 哈哈哈哈哈哈，若是在他处，我反要惧你三分，但在此界，你能耐我何？

original_en: Calamity, is that your name? Have you been deceiving me all this time?
context: 劫，这是你的名字吗？你所说的一切，都是骗我的？

original_en: My true name is Calamity, the Moonlight, and I represent the shadow of all beings. Although there was some deception, everything I'm saying now is undoubtedly true. You are indeed the hero who saved the beings of the Three Realms.
context: 我本名为劫 · 阴 · 太阴幽荧，乃是众生之影。虽然之前与你所说多有编造之语，但此时此刻所言，句句属实。你切实是解放了三界众生的英雄。

original_en: You manipulated me?
context: 你竟然利用我？

original_en: To say I manipulated you might be an overstatement. You once asked who I really am. Well, now I'll tell you. You're just a cultivator, a pawn under Radiance's command, tasked with cultivating. At the beginning of each world, Radiance sends cultivators like you to nurture living beings. However, when it's time for the harvest, it also marks your own end.
context: 若说利用，未免太过。你曾问过我自己是谁。如今我切实告诉你。你是耕夫，只是阳手下负责开垦三千小世界的一枚棋子。每当一个小世界伊始之初，阳便会派遣你这样的耕夫，开垦播种，孕育万千生灵，待成熟收割之日，也是你寂灭之时。

original_en: Do you expect me to believe you?
context: 你以为我还会相信你？

original_en: Hehe, whether you believe it or not, I may have utilized you, but I also empowered you.  Now, you've broken free from Radiance's control, transcended the Three Realms, and exist beyond the Five Elements. From now on, no one can truly bring about your demise. You will be immortal, just like us.
context: 呵呵呵，无论你相信与否，我虽然利用了你，但也成就了你。如今的你已然脱离阳的掌控，跳出三界外，不在五行中。从今往后，这三千世界之中再无人能真正让你寂灭，你将与我等一般，长存不朽。

original_en: He didn't actually deceive you, but the situation isn't beyond repair. This world is out of my control. With your current abilities, if you're willing to restore order, you can become a deity once order is reestablished.  And this world will also serve as your personal domain, and you can do as you please. What do you say?
context: 他确实没有骗你，不过事情也并非到了不可挽回的地步。如今这方世界已经脱离我的掌控，凭借你如今的能力，若愿意重归秩序，则在秩序恢复之后，你将为天人。此方世界，也将作为你的私人领地，随你做什么，我都不会过问。如何？

original_en: Hahaha, Radiance, don't tell me you've run out of cards to play? Listen, this world exists beyond his grasp. Even if you don't cooperate with him, you're the ruler here! Life, death, aging, and sickness—all of it now depends on your whim! Why not join me and purge those who have haughtily governed it from the Heaven Realm for countless ages? Let's establish genuine fairness and order!
context: 哈哈哈，阳，你难道没有更重的筹码了吗？哈哈，你小子听我说，这方世界已经脱离他的掌控，即使你不配合他，你也是这里的土霸王！生老病死，如今都在你一念之间！小子，不如与我一同，将这些窃据上界无数岁月的道貌岸然之徒杀个干干净净，还这世界真正的公平与秩序！

original_en: Calamity, you fooled me once, but you won't pull that off a second time.
context: 劫，你欺骗了我一次，便骗不了我第二次了。

original_en: Calamity, your elaborate schemes amounted to nothing. Cultivator, no, I should now call you the Sage. Come, let's jointly establish order and govern the Three Realms. I'll be awaiting you in the upper realm.
context: 劫，你处心积虑，不过竹篮打水一场空。耕夫，不，如今该称呼你为至人。来吧，和我一同司掌秩序，统辖三界。我在上界等你。

original_en: In due time, the heaven and earth will be restored to their rightful order.
context: 天地终将重新恢复秩序。

original_en: As I step into the martial world, regrets will be a thing of the past, and our destinies shall intertwine once more.
context: 一入江湖终不悔，风云再会侠客行。

original_en: (It seems an unseen connection has formed between me and this world. The cycles of and the destinies of all beings in this realm appear to be within my grasp. )
context: （我与这世界之间出现了某种看不见的牵绊，日月星辰，生老病死，这一界众生之因果，似乎都在我的掌控之中了。）

original_en: I never expected the Heavenly Saint, or rather, Calamity, to deceive me and lead to a grave mistake. Luckily, the damage was minimal, and Radiance's timely intervention brought everything under control.  This world is now under my dominion, and I'll await Radiance to fulfill our pact and take me to the Heaven Realm.
context: 想不到天圣老人，哦不，是劫！竟然骗我铸成大错。所幸造成破坏不大，阳的及时出现让一切得到了控制。如今此方世界已经在我的掌控之中，接下来，便是等阳履行约定，带我前往上界了。

original_en: Invading the Heaven Realm? That sounds quite intriguing.
context: 杀入上界？呵呵，听上去还挺有趣的。

original_en: Radiance, your meticulous manipulation of primordial spirits and disruption of the rules has all come to naught. Cultivator, no, I should now call you the Sage. Come, let us dismantle this chaotic world together. I'll be waiting for you in the Heaven Realm.
context: 哈哈哈，阳，你处心积虑垄断元神破坏规则，如今不过竹篮打水一场空。耕夫，不，如今该称呼你为至人。来吧，与我一同将这失序的世界战至破碎，我在上界等你。

original_en: Even though Calamity deceived me, the initial aim of saving the Three Realms was not mistaken. Invading the Heaven Realm? Calamity, that's a rather intriguing proposal! Witnessing those rule makers begging for mercy on their knees should provide me with great satisfaction.
context: 虽然劫骗了我，但他拯救三界终生的出发点并没有错。打入上界？呵呵，劫当真是说了一个好提议！看着那些所谓秩序的制定者跪地求饶的摸样，应该能让我笑的很开心吧。

original_en: If we can truly liberate the Three Realms, what does it matter if it costs a lifetime of battles?
context: 若能真正解放三界众生，斗战一生又如何！

original_en: Since I'm now immortal, why should I bow to others?
context: 既然我已不朽，何必再屈居他人之下？

original_en: The heavenly order is not to be trifled with. This is merely one world breaking free from control. How much influence can you truly exert on the Three Realms all on your own? Cultivator, no, I should call you the Sage now. I eagerly anticipate our next encounter.
context: 天道秩序不容撼动，不过一个小小世界脱离掌控而已，你单枪匹马又能对这三界有多少影响。耕夫，不，如今该称呼你为至人了，我期待与你下次相见。

original_en: Hahaha, you, young one, truly amuse me. Go cultivate. I'm in your debt for the Heavenly Gate. When the time comes in the Heaven Realm, we'll settle this score between us.
context: 哈哈哈，你小子当真合我胃口，罢了。小子好好修行，天门之事我承你恩情，来日到了上界，你我再了却这段因果。

original_en: I've transcended the Three Realms, now existing beyond the Five Elements, having become an immortal presence akin to Radiance and Calamity. Why should I concern myself with the conflict between them? Throughout the Three Realms, no one shall stand above or dominate me any longer!
context: 我竟然已经跳出三界外，不在五行中，成为了和阳与阴一样的不朽存在。阴阳相争与我何干，从此三界终生，再无人能高高在上，凌驾于我了！

original_en: I shan't be under anyone's control, merely following my own path as I see fit.
context: 从此之后，我不再受他人掌控，只是遵循本心，行我该行之路。

original_en: Please spare me...
context: 饶命~~你饶命~~~

original_en: Have mercy... spare me...
context: 求求你~~绕饶命~~饶命~~~

original_en: Spare its life.
context: 饶它一命

original_en: I defeated a monkey, and it squealed as if begging me to spare it.
context: 我打败一只猴子，它吱吱吱的叫，好像是在求我放过它。

original_en: Ruthlessly finish it off.
context: 狠心下手

original_en: I defeated a monkey, and it pleaded for mercy, but I heartlessly finished it off.
context: 我打败一只猴子，它向我求饶，我狠心处决了它

original_en: Chatter... Chatter...
context: 吱吱~~吱吱吱~~~

original_en: Chatter... Chatter...
context: 吱吱吱~~吱吱吱~~吱吱~~~

original_en: I don't understand what you're saying...
context: 听不懂在说什么...

original_en: Follow... me...
context: 好~恩人~~跟我走吧~~~

original_en: Good... under... stone...
context: 宝~石头~~埋~~

original_en: There's a monkey that seems thankful, leading me to a hidden treasure.
context: 有只对我感恩的猴子，带我寻到一个藏匿的宝藏。

original_en: Are you saying there's treasure buried under the stones?
context: 你是说有石头埋着宝藏？

original_en: Chitter... Chitter...
context: 吱~吱吱~~吱吱吱吱~~~

original_en: Chitter... Chitter...
context: 吱~吱吱~~吱~~

original_en: What are you trying to do? ? ?
context: 你要做什么？？？

original_en: {0}, you're still quite young, and it's not ideal to continue living as a roamer. People might look down on you.
context: {0}，你年纪轻轻可不能一直做流民，会被人看不起的。

original_en: How can I alter my identity?
context: 如何改变身份

original_en: In the future, you can join a sect, run a shop, or even establish your own martial sect and become the Champion. But for now, it's a good idea to start with a more basic occupation.
context: 日后你有所成，或者加入门派，或者经营店铺，说不定还能开宗立派成为武林盟主。不过当下还是要脚踏实地先选一个初级身份，以免被人诟病，

original_en: Become a 「Woodcutter」
context: 那就先做「樵夫」

original_en: You can gather wood and supply it to other merchants. Here's a Grocery Cabinet for you. People will buy wood from it when needed.
context: 那你可以多砍伐木材，给其他商人提供资源，这个杂货箱送你吧，以后有人需要木材会来你的杂货箱购买的。

original_en: {0}{1} advised me to become a Woodcutter and gave me a Grocery Cabinet.
context: {0}{1}劝我脱离流民的身份，成为樵夫，还送我一个杂货柜。

original_en: Received a Grocery Cabinet.
context: 获得一个杂货柜

original_en: Become a 「Farmer」
context: 那就先做「农夫」

original_en: Farming can be fun. You can cultivate a small plot, grow and sell herbs, and take a sip in your free time.
context: 当个农夫很惬意的，自己种一块小田，种植贩卖草药，无事就喝喝小酒，岂不美哉。

original_en: {0}{1} advised me to become a Farmer and gave me a piece of Field.
context: {0}{1}劝我脱离流民的身份，成为农夫，还送我一个田地。

original_en: Received a piece of Field.
context: 获得一个田地

original_en: Become a 「Miner」
context: 那就先做「矿工」

original_en: As a miner, you can gather ores and supply them to other merchants. Here's a Grocery Cabinet for you. People will buy ores from it when needed. Mining can be quite rewarding. I've heard some miners even discovered treasure maps.
context: 那你可以采集矿石，给其他商人提供资源，这个杂货箱送你吧，以后有人需要矿石会来你的杂货箱购买的。其实采矿挺不错的，我听说有人采矿时还挖出过藏宝图呢。

original_en: {0}{1} advised me to become a Miner and gave me a Grocery Cabinet.
context: {0}{1}劝我脱离流民的身份，成为矿工，还送我一个杂货柜。

original_en: Become a 「Hunter」
context: 那就先做「猎户」

original_en: You'll need to learn animal taming from a stable owner. As a hunter, you can hunt, collect resources from animals, and even capture some for domestication.
context: 你得找个马厩老板学习一下驯化，除了猎杀动物收集资源外，还能抓一些动物圈养起来。

original_en: {0}{1} advised me to become a Hunter and gave me an Animal Pen.
context: {0}{1}劝我脱离流民的身份，成为猎户，还送我一个兽栏。

context: 湖里和海里都有鱼可以抓捕，可以卖到酒馆去，水下抓鱼内力越多越好，这个玄蛇灵芝你吃了吧，能增加一些真气。

original_en: {0}{1} advised me to become a Fisherman and gave me a Serpent Ganoderma.

context: 当保镖得有过人的武艺，否则没人敢把命交给你，这个假人你拿走吧，要勤加练武啊。

original_en: {0}{1} advised me to become a Bodyguard and gave me a Dummy.

context: 那{0}你收好，偷偷练习，以后一鸣惊人，不怕爹爹小瞧你了。

context: {0}{1}偷了掌门爹爹的一本江湖罕见的内功书送给我，我让{0}{1}送还回去，以免节外生枝。

original_en: I refuse! I worked so hard to get it. I know my dad always looks down on you. {0}, train hard and prove yourself to him!
context: 那怎么行！我好不容易偷出来，爹爹一向小瞧你，{0}你好好练习，日后让爹爹对你刮目相看。

original_en: My child gave you my cherished Inner Kungfu manual, and now you've returned it. Your unwavering integrity has earned my respect.
context: 我孩子偷了我珍藏内功送你，你竟然面对诱惑还能保持本心，人品倒是不错，倒是让我刮目相看了。

original_en: You display modesty and politeness, the qualities of a 「True Gentleman」.

original_en: Thanks to Mister's reputation, his praise earned me the title of 「True Gentleman」.
context: 前辈身份高贵，他的评价让我立刻江湖传名，获得名声「正人君子」

original_en: Mister, your praise is too much. I'm not worthy.

original_en: Don't fuss over it. Take these. If you achieve great things in the future, it will not be in vain that my child held you in high regard.

context: 获得传说帽子，获得一本珍藏内功秘籍。

original_en: Because I declined the secret manual {0}{1}'s child wanted to give me, his attitude toward me changed. He praised me as a 「True Gentleman」 and rewarded me with a Legendary Hat and a secret Inner Kungfu manual.
context: {0}{1}因为我拒绝他孩子偷偷送我的秘籍，对我态度大为改观，不但为我扬名「正人君子」，还送了我一顶传说帽子和一本珍藏内功。

original_en: My child stole my cherished Inner Kungfu manual and gave it to you, and you accepted it without any guilt. You have disappointed me.
context: 我孩子偷了我珍藏内功送你，你竟然就这么心安理得的收下，人品实在让老夫失望。

original_en: Despise +50
context: 对我的鄙视+50

original_en: Try to explain.

context: 你有何话可说，老夫一生重情重义，最恨道德败坏之辈。如今你我比试一场，如若胜我此事作罢，如若败了...哼哼~~

original_en: Because I accepted the manual his child stole and gave to me, {0}{1} decided to test my martial skills.
context: {0}{1}因为我收下了他孩子偷给我的秘籍，决定试试我的武功。

original_en: Secret intelligence: A group of people who are resentment with you, formed an alliance to prepare to destroy your martial arts!

original_en: {0} {1}, etc., many people who resent me for resentment to me form an alliance, destroying my martial arts flag!
context: {0}{1}等多个对我怨愤之人结成同盟，破坏我的门派大旗！

original_en: I've observed your remarkable agility. You must be a master of Inner Kungfu! Would you be open to sharing your skills with me? I'm willing to pay.
context: 我观阁下身手矫健气息绵长，定是内功大家。不知阁下内功是否愿意传我，我愿意出钱向您学习。

original_en: Since we've crossed paths, let's be friends.

context: 哈哈哈，好，既然是朋友，怎能平白受你好处，此乃我家传丹药便赠送与你，见证你我友谊。

original_en: Sounds good.

original_en: {0}{1} showed interest in learning my Inner Kungfu. We soon became friends and exchanged gifts.

original_en: We have a deal.

You want 10,000 coins with your modest skills? You should just rob someone.

original_en: Tsk, what's wrong with you?

original_en: Is this extortion? !

original_en: Now that you know, 3,000 coins, or trouble.

original_en: Swallow your pride for now.

original_en: You're a wise one. If I ever run low on funds, I might come 'borrow' some more.

original_en: I'm afraid he'll come asking for money again sooner or later.

original_en: You daring to cross my path?

original_en: That makes sense. Take the money.

original_en: Hehe, thanks, friend. Perhaps we can share a drink another day, my friend. Heehee。

original_en: Take care.
context: 一路小心。

original_en: My friend, do you know who I am?

original_en: Forgive my poor eyesight, my friend. I must have offended you. I've broken the martial world's rules, consider this compensation.
