original_en: I'm the Sect Elder.
context: 我乃门派长老。

original_en: I'm the Sect Master!
context: 我乃是一派之主！

original_en: Oh my, this fool is as blind as can be! This gold is to make amends. Please, just let me go like I never existed!
context: 哎呦，小人有眼不识泰山，这些钱是小人向您赔的不是，您就把我当个屁给放了吧！

original_en: Just leave.
context: 赶紧滚吧。

original_en: I'm the Champion!
context: 吾乃武林盟主！

original_en: What? Champ...Champion? Oh my, this fool is as blind as can be! Spare me this once, my lord - I've elderly and young to feed. Such a mistake will never happen again, I swear. Mercy, please, have mercy!
context: 武，武，武武林盟主？！哎呦呦，小人有眼不识泰山，求您饶了小人这一次吧，小人上有老下有小，这一次是行差踏错，绝无下回了，饶命，饶命呀！

original_en: Surrender your Kungfu, and I'll let it pass.
context: 自废武功，饶你这次。

original_en: Thank you. Thank you.
context: 多谢饶命，多谢饶命。

original_en: Leave.
context: 滚吧。

original_en: Uh-oh, we're in trouble.
context: 哎呦，这下惹上硬茬子了。

original_en: Blind yourself, and I'll let it pass.
context: 自废双眼，饶你这次。

original_en: Cripple your own legs, and I'll let it pass.
context: 自费双腿，饶你这次。

original_en: Leave your belongings and scram.
context: 将你身上的财物留下，赶紧滚吧。

original_en: Cross me again, and you'll be as good as dead.
context: 再有下次，你小命不保。

original_en: Go ahead and take your own life.
context: 你自裁吧。

original_en: What? Please, have mercy, my lord!
context: 这这这，大人饶命，饶命呀！

original_en: Yes? You want me to dispatch of you myself?
context: 怎么？要我亲自动手？

original_en: Goddammit, I ain't going down without a fight!
context: 妈的，左右是死，跟你拼了。

original_en: Humph! Such audacity!
context: 哼！不自量力！

original_en: This has nothing to do with my family. Please have mercy on them, Champion.
context: 祸不及家人，希望盟主，对他们高抬贵手。

original_en: Don't waste my time.
context: 莫要耽误时间。

original_en: Goddammit. Die!
context: 妈的，去死吧！

original_en: The person dared a surprise attack when you were unaware. Yet how can their feeble glow compare to the brilliance of the moon in the sky?
context: 那人趁你不被竟出手偷袭，可萤火之光如何比的天空皓月。

original_en: That's all you got?
context: 只有这点水平？

original_en: Ahh! No! I won't accept this! I won't!
context: 啊啊啊！！我，我不甘心吗，我不甘心啊啊！

original_en: Hmph, so presumptuous!
context: 哼，不自量力！

original_en: This has nothing to do with my family. Please don't give them a hard time, Champion.
context: 祸不及家人，希望盟主，不要为难他们。

original_en: Ah well. Let him live.
context: 算了，饶他一命吧。

original_en: Sniveling won't help.
context: 卖惨可没有用。

original_en: Alas, I brought this on myself.
context: 唉，是我不自量力，招来祸患。

original_en: Mess with me, and death is too light a sentence.
context: 惹到我头上，死有余辜。

original_en: Goddammit, I ain't going down without a fight!
context: 可恶，左右都是一死，不如跟你拼了！

original_en: You think you scare me? You deserve a good beating!
context: 呵，当老子是吓大的！真是讨打！

original_en: Stay calm and fight!
context: 沉着应战。

original_en: Excuse me, did you defeat the bandit in this area?
context: 这位侠士，这附近的盗匪是你所杀？

original_en: What if I did?
context: 是又如何？

original_en: This bandit has been a problem here, and I've been tracking him for days. I didn't expect a hero like you to handle it before me.
context: 实不相瞒，这盗匪四处烧杀抢掠，我已经追踪了他许多日子，不想今日被侠士先行一步将他斩杀为民除害。

original_en: It's our duty to uphold justice.
context: 我辈侠士自当匡扶正义。

original_en: Accept this token of gratitude, noble warrior. When you come across injustice, don't hesitate to wield your sword.
context: 这点钱是我的一点心意，请大侠务必收下。日后江湖路上路见不平定要继续拔刀出手。

original_en: Of course.
context: 自当如此。

original_en: He had the misfortune of crossing paths with the wrong person.
context: 是他命不好，惹到了不该惹的人。

original_en: Your words are truly just. This villain got what he deserved. I must attend to urgent matters, so I'll bid farewell.
context: 侠士所言也不无道理，天理昭彰，这恶贼终日作恶当有此劫。我尚有要事，先告辞了。

original_en: Until we meet again.
context: 后会有期。

original_en: You've mistaken me for someone else.
context: 阁下认错人了。

original_en: Since you joined the sect, I've been watching your progress. I'd like to spar for mutual improvement. Will you accept?
context: 自你入门之后我对你十分关注，今日见你武功进境颇多，想与你切磋交流一番，希望你不要拒绝。

original_en: Let's spar and hone our skills.
context: 互相切磋，精进武艺。

original_en: Alright, let's have a friendly match and stop when it feels right.
context: 好，会武切磋点到为止，请了。

original_en: I'm ready.
context: 我准备好了。

original_en: I'm not interested. Perhaps another time.
context: 没兴趣，下次再说吧。

original_en: If that's the case, I won't bother you.
context: 既然如此，就不打扰你了。

original_en: What if we sweeten the deal a bit?
context: 不如加点彩头？

original_en: We martial artists should avoid gambling, but take these 500 coins as my treat for our spar if you're short on funds.
context: 习武之人，不好沾染赌习，如果你囊中羞涩，这500钱你且拿去，就算是我请你陪练，如何？

original_en: Sounds good!
context: 如此甚好！

original_en: Feeling embarrassed, let's spar without involving money.
context: 有些羞愧，不要钱了，直接切磋。

original_en: Alright, let's spar. Get ready! I'm making my move.
context: 嗯，同门切磋，精进武艺最是重要，注意来，我要出手了。

original_en: Let's skip the sparring.
context: 还是不要切磋了。

original_en: You have pressing matters to attend to? If that's the case, I won't bother you.
context: 你尚有要事？既然如此，就不打扰你了。

original_en: I practice martial arts diligently, and now I have made progress. I hope you can compete with me and give me your advice.
context: 我勤练武艺，如今已有进境，希望您与我切磋，不吝赐教。

original_en: As the head of the sect, you can learn from him and guide you in martial arts.
context: 作为掌门，与其切磋，指导武艺。

original_en: As an elder, you can learn from him and guide you in martial arts.
context: 作为长老，与其切磋，指导武艺。

original_en: I have matters to attend to. Perhaps another day. (Refuse Spar)
context: 尚有要事，改日再说。（拒绝切磋）

original_en: I picked some flowers from the back mountain. Aren't they beautiful?
context: 这是在后山刚采的鲜花，漂亮吧？

original_en: They do complement you well.
context: 芬芳四溢，这花正配师姐你。

original_en: Actually, these flowers were meant for my beloved.
context: 这花其实是要送给我的心上人。

original_en: May I ask, who is that lucky one?
context: 不知师姐的心上人是谁？

original_en: Trees live on mountains and branches live on tree. My heart lives for you but you do not see.
context: 山有木兮木有枝，心悦君兮君不知。

original_en: (She hands me the flowers with a blushing smile before running off. )
context: （师姐说完就将花塞到我怀里红着脸跑开了。）

original_en: She's really adorable.
context: 师姐她真是可爱呢！

original_en: What a nonsense!
context: 什么乱七八糟的！

original_en: We're both martial artists. How can we let love tie us down?
context: 师姐，你我同为习武之人，怎能拘泥情爱？

original_en: Humph! You fool! You fool! You fool! You're just a big dummy! I can't stand you!
context: 哼！呆子！呆子！呆子！师弟你就是个大笨蛋！最讨厌你了！

original_en: (She stomps her foot and runs off angrily, leaving me bewildered. )
context: （师姐跺了跺脚，一脸羞怒的跑开了，真是莫名其妙。）

original_en: Wow, where did you pick these flowers?
context: 芬芳四溢，不知师姐在哪里采得？

original_en: Fresh flowers with a beautiful lady like you, it's a perfect match.
context: 鲜花配美人，师妹你这么可爱，配这花是最好。

original_en: I think you're lovely too.
context: 我也觉得师姐你很漂亮呢。

original_en: (With a shy glance, she hands me the flowers and hurries away. )
context: （师姐臊红了脸，将花塞到我的怀里，扭捏的看了我一眼，便跑开了。）

original_en: Taking a deep breath, beyond their fragrance, I could sense her presence. )
context: （我嗅了嗅怀里的鲜花，除了清新之外，还有一味女子的芬芳。）

original_en: She's really adorable.
context: 真是可爱的师姐。

original_en: I toss the flowers away, as I was just playing along with her.
context: 刚刚不过是逢场作戏，将花丢掉。

original_en: That's not right.
context: 师姐，这样不好。

original_en: I... I understand that my feelings for you might bother you. Goodbye.
context: 唉，我对师妹你的感情可能确实让你难以接受。告辞了。

original_en: (She sighs sadly and walks away. )
context: （师姐幽怨的叹了口气，转身离去。）

original_en: No one can disturb my training, not even you.
context: 师姐，即使是你也不能打扰我练功。

original_en: You mean, I'm disturbing you?
context: 如此说来，是师姐打扰到你了？

original_en: She runs away crying. How strange.
context: 师姐哭着跑开了，她真是奇怪。

original_en: So you got it!
context: 你知道便好！

original_en: Did someone give you flowers lately?
context: 听说前些日子，有人送你花了?

original_en: Yeah, my senior sister did.
context: 确有此事，是师姐送的。

original_en: You've got some nerve! You just accepted her affection without considering your own worth, huh?
context: 送你你便接了？也不掂量一下自己几斤几两，也敢随便承情？

original_en: Oh, are you feeling jealous?
context: 哦，原来你是嫉妒了。

original_en: Damn it! Are you provoking me?
context: 他妈的！你是故意讨打！

original_en: Heh, do you really think I'm scared of you?
context: 呵，以为我怕你？

original_en: As tension mounted, a graceful figure approached.
context: 就在剑拔弩张之际，一道身影款款而来。

original_en: Hold it right there!
context: 都给我住手！

original_en: Senior sister, you're here.
context: 师姐你来了。

original_en: My senior sister positioned herself in front of me, protecting me.
context: 师姐来到我的身前，将我挡在她的身后。

original_en: Don't worry, as long as I'm here, nothing will happen to you.
context: 莫怕，有我在，你不会有事的。

original_en: I trust you, senior sister.
context: 我相信师姐。

original_en: She pointed at the troublemaker and began scolding him.
context: 只见师姐抬手指向找茬那人，开口骂道。

original_en: I've heard you've been bullying the new disciples. Today, you've crossed the line! Leave now!
context: 之前总听说你欺负新来的弟子，今日竟然欺负到师弟头上！赶紧给我滚！

original_en: Senior sister is amazing.
context: 师姐霸气。

original_en: No, I...
context: 不是的，我....

original_en: The man attempted to argue further, but senior sister paid him no more attention.
context: 那人还要争辩，可师姐却背过身去，不再理他。

original_en: He felt thoroughly defeated and left sadly.
context: 看着师姐决绝的面容，他深受打击，掩面而去。

original_en: Heehee。
context: 嘿嘿嘿。

original_en: It was my words that were too harsh.
context: 是我言辞太过。

original_en: You better understand. Remember this well, don't accept just anyone's gifts.
context: 你小子知道便好，下次长点记性，别谁的礼物都敢接。

original_en: I understand.
context: 我知道了。

original_en: Look who's behind you.
context: 看你背后是谁来了。

original_en: Hmph, trying to fool me? !
context: 哼，还想骗我？！

original_en: You should turn around and see.
context: 你回头看看。

original_en: Hmph, trying to fool me?
context: 哼，还想骗我！

original_en: Get lost before I get angry.
context: 趁我没生气，赶紧滚。

original_en: It seems I must teach you a lesson.
context: 看来老子非得教训你一顿不可。

original_en: Strike first.
context: 抢先出手。

original_en: I'm sorry, I misspoke.
context: 对不起，我失言了。

original_en: I'm sorry, I'll cut ties with senior sister.
context: 对不起，我会让师姐和我断绝关系的。

original_en: Using harsh words to pick a fight, are you?
context: 言辞不善，来找茬的？

original_en: Why should I tell you?
context: 我为何要告诉你？

original_en: Are you the new female disciple? You look pretty! Come closer, let me have a look!
context: 你就是新来的女弟子？嘿，长得还挺标志的！过来过来，让我好好看看！

original_en: His hand reached out and attempted to touch your cheek.
context: 这人说着，便抬起手来要抚摸你的脸颊。

original_en: Get your hand off me.
context: （呵斥）拿开你的脏手。

original_en: Oh, feisty, huh? Hehe, I like that!
context: 呦呦呦，性格还挺辣，嘿嘿，我喜欢！

original_en: Give him a direct slap!
context: 直接出手，打他一顿！

original_en: Ouch! !
context: 哎呦！！

original_en: You slapped him hard, causing his nose and ear to bleed, leaving him shocked.
context: 你这一耳光来的突然，结结实实打在他的脸上，直接将他打的耳鼻出血，愣在那里。

original_en: Humph! Now you understand! Get lost!
context: 哼！知道厉害了吧，还不快滚！

original_en: You dare to hit me? I'll get back at you!
context: 妈的，你竟敢打我！老子还收拾不了你了！

original_en: You're always picking on others, and now you've gone after your own junior sister. How disgusting!
context: 平日里就见你欺男霸女，如今竟然找到了自己同门师妹的脑袋上面，真是让人恶心，现在赶紧给我滚。

original_en: As the man attempted to argue, Senior Sister intervened, instantly crippling one of his Inner Kungfu.
context: 那人还要争辩，却见师姐抬手便是一指点在他的丹田上面，竟直接废了他一门内功！

original_en: If there's a next time, I'll take your life! Now get lost!
context: 再有下次，要你的命！还不快滚！

original_en: Mercy, mercy! I was wrong!
context: 饶命，饶命，我知错了。

original_en: After dealing with the troublemaker, she grabbed my hand, expressing concern.
context: 解决完找茬的人，师姐急忙拉起我的手神情关切。

original_en: Are you okay?
context: 师妹，没事把。

original_en: I'm fine, thanks for coming in time.
context: 没事，师姐来得及时。

original_en: Senior sister carefully checked my body, then sighed with relief.
context: 师姐仔细检查了一下你的身体，这才松了口气。

original_en: As long as you're okay. But that slap you delivered was impressive. It reminds me of my old days.
context: 没事便好，不过你刚刚那一巴掌打的不错。我有当年的风范。

original_en: I'll take that as a compliment.
context: 我就当师姐是在夸我吧。

original_en: Of course it's a compliment. As long as you're okay, I should go now. If anyone dares to treat you like that again, come find me. I'll stand up for you.
context: 当然是夸你，好了，你没事就好，我还有要事，就先离开了。下次若还有人敢这么对你，大可以来寻我，师姐为你出气。

original_en: Thank you, I'll remember that.
context: 多谢师姐，我记住了。

original_en: Slap him directly.
context: 直接给他一耳光。

original_en: Have you heard? Recently, there's someone in our sect who appears to be causing trouble.
context: 听说了吗？最近咱们门派中有一个人，似乎偷鸡摸狗无恶不作。

original_en: Really? We shouldn't engage in spreading rumors.
context: 真的假的，话可不能乱说。

original_en: Upon seeing you, his nervous eyes hinted that he was targeting you with his rumor.
context: 那人一见到你，便目光闪烁，显然其口中流言，是指向你。

original_en: Respond with a slight smile.
context: 微微一笑，满不在意。

original_en: Though you remained silent, the rumor-spreader started quivering, refraining from meeting your gaze.
context: 你虽然一言未发，但传谣那人却是双腿打颤，战战兢兢，连多看你一眼都不敢。

original_en: I... I have other matters to attend to, I should go now.
context: 我...我还有事，就先走了。

original_en: Huh? Why leave without revealing who this person you were talking about is?
context: 哎？怎么就走了，还没说明白你口中那人到底是谁呢。

original_en: Turn and walk away.
context: 转身离去。

original_en: As you smile and don't respond, the rumor-spreader raises his voice.
context: 见你笑了笑没有反应，这人变本加厉，声音更大。

original_en: Some people have no shame. They even have the nerve to fake a smile here?
context: 有些人，真不要脸。还好意思在这里笑？

original_en: Huh? Could it be that the person you mentioned is...
context: 啊？！莫非你说的那人，就是.....

original_en: Slap the person!
context: 给他一耳光！

original_en: You deliver a resounding slap to the rumor-spreader's face, causing him to cry out in pain and disbelief.
context: 你猛地出手，一巴掌打在造谣者的脸上上，只听一声哀嚎，一脸不可置信的看着你。

original_en: You, you! How dare you hit me!
context: 你你你你你！竟敢打我！

original_en: You deserved it!
context: 打的就是你！

original_en: Damn it, I'll take you on!
context: 妈的，老子和你拼了。

original_en: “Ahem! What are you saying? Let me join in! ”
context: “咳咳咳！说什么呢？让我听听！”

original_en: No... nothing.
context: 没，没说什么。

original_en: Seeing you approach, the person turns and leaves.
context: 见你凑了过来，那人缩了缩脖子，扭头离去。

original_en: Smile but remain silent.
context: 笑而不语。

original_en: You've crossed the line! Spreading rumors about me? !
context: 竟敢！造我的谣？！

original_en: Where did you see me mentioning you?
context: 你哪只眼睛看到我说的是你？

original_en: Indeed, he hasn't disclosed who that person is. .
context: 确实，这位同门还未说那人是谁。。

original_en: Observing his smug demeanor, you can't help but feel a surge of anger.
context: 你看他那副小人得志的模样，心里不由得生气一股无名火。

original_en: But you decide it's not worth your time.
context: 算了，不和他一般见识。

original_en: You've been with our sect for a while now. Any thoughts on our sect?
context: 你入我门派已经有一段时间了，对我派有没有什么看法呀？

original_en: Everything is pretty good.
context: 咱们门派一切都好。

original_en: Well, as long as you're satisfied. Our sect has always supported you, and it's your time to give back.
context: 嗯，你满意便好。门派培养你许多日子，如今也到了该回报的时候了。

original_en: You mean?
context: 不知长老话中的意思是？

original_en: I have been a bit short on funds. If you could spare 2,000 coins, I'd certainly appreciate.
context: 本长老近日囊中羞涩，若你能给我2000钱的话，我自然不会亏待你。

original_en: The Elder has been good to me, and 2,000 coins is fine.
context: 长老待我不薄，2000不算多。

original_en: That's right. I'll remember your kindness, and you'll be rewarded in the future!
context: 不错，不错哈哈哈，本长老记住你了，来日定会提拔于你！

original_en: Thank you, Elder.
context: 多谢长老。

original_en: I've been a bit tight on funds recently...
context: 在下最近手头也有些紧张....

original_en: You clearly have money, but you dare to fool me! Hand over the money, or I'll break your legs and expel you from the sect!
context: 哼，你明明有钱，竟敢耍我！近日，你若不把钱给我，我定会打断你的双腿，将你逐出宗门！

original_en: Your little scheme has been exposed. Now you're facing an angry and treacherous individual. You must decide now.
context: 你的小心思被他看穿。如今你面前的是一个暴怒的奸邪之徒，该做出选择了。

original_en: Swallow your pride.
context: 忍气吞声。

original_en: Should have done that earlier, shouldn't you? Just leave.
context: 哼，早这样不就好了？赶紧滚吧。

original_en: Seeing how arrogant he is now, you hang your head.
context: 看着他现在狂妄的样子，你压低了脑袋。

original_en: I'll take my leave.
context: 在下告退。

original_en: Endure no more! Strike first!
context: 忍无可忍！率先出手！

original_en: Strike first.
context: 率先出手。

original_en: No money? Why didn't you mention it earlier? !
context: 哼，没钱，没钱你不早说？！

original_en: When the Elder realizes you also lack money, his kind expression fades.
context: 听闻你也没钱，长老一改方才慈祥的表情，转而变得冷漠。

original_en: I'm truly sorry.
context: 实在抱歉。

original_en: Get lost, don't disrupt my kungfu practice.
context: 哼，滚滚滚，赶紧滚开，别打扰我练功。

original_en: His attitude annoys you.
context: 见到他态度如此，你心中有些不快。

original_en: Dare to say it again? !
context: 有胆你再说一遍？！

original_en: Hmph, what if I do? Just get lost!
context: 哼，我就是再说一遍又如何？赶紧滚开！

original_en: In the face of an Elder who has lost his temper, it's time to decide.
context: 士可杀，不可辱，是该有所选择了。

original_en: Strike directly.
context: 直接出手。

original_en: You suddenly strike, catching even the Elder off guard.
context: 你突然出手，即使是长老也被你打了个措手不及！

original_en: You scoundrel, how dare you!
context: 你这贼子好大的狗胆！

original_en: The Elder's eyes filled with rage. He never expected you to attack directly!

original_en: The Elder was about to attack you when a powerful force threw him aside. Regaining his composure, he saw someone beside you.
context: 长老刚要对你动手，就被一股恐怖巨力轰飞出去，等他回过神来，只见一道身影站在你的面前。

original_en: Greetings, Master.
context: 弟子拜见掌门。

original_en: The Master motioned for you, then turned to the Elder, interrogating him.
context: 掌门对你摆了摆手，示意免礼，随后对着长老开口问责道。

original_en: Extorting fellow sect disciples and seeking revenge after being defeated. If I don't step in, it suggests our sect lacks discipline! !
context: 私下勒索门派弟子，还被打倒在地，恼羞成怒想要动手。若我不出手惩治于你，被他人听去，岂不是显得我派没有规矩？！

original_en: The Elder, previously confident, now showed fear before the Master.
context: 一直到刚才都一脸有恃无恐的长老此刻在掌门面前终于露出了恐惧的神情。

original_en: How to handle this disgrace to our sect is for you to decide.
context: 这个门派败类该如何处置，你来决定吧。

original_en: You nodded at the Master and sized up the reprehensible Elder.
context: 你对着掌门点了点头，对着这个可恶的长老打量起来。

original_en: Sensing your gaze, the Elder dropped to his knees, pleading for mercy.
context: 长老感受到你的目光，竟然扑通一声跪了下来，不断的开口磕头求饶。

original_en: I was wrong. I beg you mercy. Since it's my first offense, please spare me.
context: 我错了，我真的错了，我狗眼不识泰山，求求你念我触犯，将我放了吧。

original_en: Spare him for now.
context: 得饶人处且饶人。

original_en: Thank you. I know I was wrong. I'm willing to recognize you as my master and serve you faithfully for life.
context: 多谢，多谢，我知错了。从此之后，救命之恩难以报答，我愿认你为主，此生当牛做马，不敢有违。

original_en: The Master nodded as they looked at you.
context: 掌门看着你点了点头。

original_en: Very well, you've shown great charity. You shall fill the vacancy left by this Elder.
context: 不错，心胸宽广，有容人之量，他的这个长老空缺，就由你来做吧。

original_en: Thank you, Master!

original_en: I have other matters to attend to, so I'll take my leave.

original_en: He's obsessed and has gone mad.

original_en: You notice his vengeful eyes. Today's mercy might sow the seeds of future bitterness.

original_en: Be cautious when you encounter him in the future. I won't always be by your side. I have other matters to attend to, so I'll take my leave.

original_en: Urghhhhh! Even if I become a ghost, I won't spare you! ! !

context: 生死有命，富贵在天。八面黑雀的预告，即是阁下命运之终。我行走江湖，从不留情，所谓灭绝人性，不过是弱者的悲鸣。今天，阁下若有半点怯懦，便是百年修行，化为泡影，纳命来吧！

If the fate is too good, I just want to be benevolent.\\n\\nEight -sided black bird\\n(At the end of the letter, the pattern of Black Town is faintly visible, it seems to indicate the ominous sign)
context: （飞鸽传书上的字迹如同幽冥刻画，每个字都带着凛冽的冷意）\\n亲启者：\\n\\n汝之名已入黑雀册，死亡之预告，非吾等儿戏。\\n黄昏后，风起时，汝将面对命运之试。\\n非求汝畏，非求汝逃，但知天下无常，生死由命。\\n此函一到，算汝知晓，剑拔弩张，准备迎战。\\n若能破局，自当重获天日！若命运多舛，只愿一战成仁。\\n\\n八面黑雀\\n（函末，黑雀的图案隐约可见，似乎预示着不祥之兆）

original_en: Black Small letter
context: 黑雀密信

May Ruzhen take a serious, after this, each of them is well.\\n\\n{0}\\n（This tribute letter is getting more and more messy, and it seems to be in a hurry.）
context: （飞鸽传书的字迹颤抖不定，仿佛能感受到恐惧与不安）\\n\\n余闻汝身背黑雀死讯，此事非同小可，恐将殃及池鱼。\\n余情愫微薄，怯懦不堪，力难扶持，心更悚惧。\\n思量再三，余决断铜镜，自此水面清波不再相见。\\n余平庸难配汝之英雄勇武。\\n愿汝躲过此劫，后会无期，不复相扰。\\n天涯何处无芳草，何必单恋一枝花。愿汝珍重，此别后，各自安好。\\n\\n{0}\\n（这封断绝关系的信，笔迹越发凌乱，似是匆匆草就，可见写信之人心境之慌张。）

original_en: Master, you've been quite busy, and I've noticed you've lost weight. Here are 1,500 coins. Please accept.
context: 掌门，最近事务劳碌，眼见您都瘦了。这1500钱是我的一片心意，请你笑纳。

original_en: I've never liked sycophants like you.
context: 我平生最厌恶想你这样喜欢拍马屁的人！

original_en: After a rebuke, the person attempting to flatter left in embarrassment.
context: 被你训斥了一顿，这个想要溜须拍马的人立刻灰溜溜的离开了。

original_en: Today, I've upheld the sect's standards!
context: 今天又是维护了门派风气的一天呀！

original_en: Then I shall gratefully accept it.
context: 嗯嗯，那我就却之不恭了。

original_en: Master, as an outdoor disciple, my influence is limited. I was wondering if...
context: 嘿嘿，感觉我和掌门你的关系还算不错，外门弟子实在权利太小。没办法为您分忧，不知道能否.....

original_en: I'll promote you to an Indoor Disciple!
context: 提升你为内门弟子吧！

original_en: Thank you, Master! Thank you, Master!
context: 多谢掌门！多谢掌门！

original_en: You accepted the gift and promoted them to an Indoor Disciple.
context: 你收下了礼金，将其提升为内门弟子。

original_en: Promote them to an Elder!
context: 直接提升为长老！

original_en: (Excited) Thank you, Master! Thank you, Master! Master, I'll respect your authority. Please accept this money too.
context: （狂喜）多谢掌门！多谢掌门！哈哈，掌门慧眼识英雄，小人一定以您马首是瞻，这些钱也请您收下。

original_en: That's inappropriate.
context: 这不好吧....

original_en: It's all funds for the sect's management, not a bribe.
context: 都是给掌门经营门派的钱，不是什么贿赂。

original_en: You accepted the gift, promoted them to Elder, and received more money.
context: 你收下了礼金，将其提升为长老，他为了感谢你，又给了你一笔钱。

original_en: In that case, I'll accept it.
context: 如此，我便收下吧。

original_en: Dodge the issue.
context: 含糊其辞糊弄过去。

original_en: Master, what about the money you received earlier if you're not promoting me?
context: 掌门，既然不想提升我的地位，那刚刚的钱？

original_en: Money? What money? Did you give me money?
context: 钱？什么钱？你给我钱了吗？

original_en: How could you not admit it?
context: 不是，掌门，你怎么能这样！

original_en: You accepted the gift but took no action, and they expressed their dislike for you.
context: 你收下了礼金，却毫无作为，对方对你的行为感到了厌恶。

original_en: Drive him away.
context: 轰他出去。

original_en: Congratulations! Our Master learned of your sect's establishment and sent me with some gifts as a gesture of congratulations.
context: 恭喜恭喜。听说大荒界又有新门派成立，我家掌门对你十分欣赏，特意让我送来一些礼物，作为贺礼。

original_en: Please convey my gratitude to your Master.
context: 多谢抬爱，我就却之不恭了。

original_en: Certainly. The Great Wilds are perilous, and trustworthy allies can make a significant difference. Our Master welcomes your visit to our sect anytime.
context: 自然会帮您带到，这大荒遍地凶险，若有交好之人，行事会方便不少，掌门交代，阁下若有闲暇，可来宗门一叙。

original_en: Once I've tended to the sect's affairs, I'll make sure to pay a visit.
context: 等我处理完宗门事物，将会亲自登门拜访。

original_en: Nice to hear that. I'll take my leave then.
context: 如此甚好，在下就不打扰了，告辞！

original_en: I appreciate it, but I can't accept these gifts.
context: 贺喜就收下了，但这些礼物是万万不能收的。

original_en: Our Master sends these gifts with sincere intentions, there's no need for excessive modesty.
context: 阁下何必推辞，我家掌门一片心意，无需太过拘谨。

original_en: In that case, I'll accept them with gratitude.
context: 既然如此，恭敬不如从命。

original_en: I don't accept rewards without merit.
context: 在下个性使然，无功不受禄。

original_en: You carry yourself nobly, no wonder our Master holds you in high regard. Our Master said if money doesn't interest you, take this as a gift.
context: 阁下神姿锦绣，又有如此风节，我家掌门果然没有看错人。我家掌门临行交代，若这些黄白之物无法入阁下之眼，便将此物赠与阁下。

original_en: The person then presented a small box to you with respect.
context: 只见这人从腰间掏出一个小小的匣子恭敬的递到你的面前。

original_en: What's inside?
context: 这是？

original_en: Upon opening the box, you were surprised to find three Millennium Ganoderma.
context: 你打开盒子，其中赫然放着几只风干水分的千年灵芝，小小的盒子竟然足足装了三只。

original_en: These are too valuable...
context: 这实在是太贵重了.....

original_en: You're a true gentleman, and our Master greatly admires you. Please don't refuse.
context: 阁下乃是这大荒里少见的正人君子，我家掌门对您十分欣赏，请您万万不要推辞了。

original_en: In that case, I'll accept them humbly.
context: 如此，我便却之不恭了。

original_en: We don't welcome you here. Please leave.
context: 这里不欢迎你们，请回吧。

original_en: In that case, I won't bother you any longer. Bye.
context: 既然如此，那就不打扰了，告辞。

original_en: Though there's an air of tension, the person before you has excellent emotional control, making it hard to read.
context: 你能感受到空气中蔓延着不愉快的气息，但面前之人养气功夫极佳，让你看不出端倪。

original_en: We had some disagreements in the past, but now I'd like to bury the hatchet. What do you think?
context: 你我之前曾经有些过节，如今你已经是一派掌门，我想要与你化解仇怨，不知你意下如何。

original_en: Sounds good! (Resolve conflicts)
context: 如此甚好！（化解仇怨）

original_en: It's wise to resolve old grudges. I'm glad you agreed.
context: 冤家宜解不宜结，你愿意与我化解仇怨再好不过。

original_en: This is rather complex. (Ask for compensation)
context: 此事有些难办。（索要道具）

original_en: I understand it's tough. Here's 1,000 coins. Can we make amends?
context: 让你为难了，这1000钱给你，不知能否结束我们之间的恩怨。

original_en: Ask for 3,000 coins.
Alright, 3,000 it is. Take this money, and let's settle our grievances.
context: 3000便3000，这些钱你拿好，我们之间的恩怨一笔勾销了。

original_en: Humph! You're really fixated on money. Bye!
context: 哼！真是想钱想疯了！告辞！

original_en: Next time we meet, the terms may not be as favorable.
context: 下次再见，就不是这个价格了。

original_en: I won't forget the past. (Refuse to resolve)
context: 过去的事，我不会忘记。（拒绝化解）

original_en: Since you're refusing reconciliation, I suggest you watch your step. Bye.
context: 竟然不同意和解，我劝你好自为之，告辞！

original_en: Next time we meet, the things may be more severe.
context: 下次再见，或许就是生死将定。

original_en: Young hero, I see incredible potential in you! I have a few secret Kungfu manuals with me. Interested?
context: 这位侠士，我见你骨骼惊奇，是百年难得一见的练武奇才。我这有几本秘籍，都是江湖上罕见的东西，不知少侠可有兴趣？

original_en: Where did this beggar come from? Go away!
context: 哪来的臭乞丐，滚滚滚。

original_en: Tsk, take it or leave it, no need to be rude.
context: 切，不要就不要，凶什么凶。

original_en: Oh? Let me take a look.
context: 哦？竟有此事，让我看看。

original_en: Please have a look. This is the Buddha's Palm, this is the Primordial Kick, and this is the Invincible Fist! Which one catches your eye?
context: 侠士请看，这是佛陀神掌，这是洪荒腿法，这是无敌神拳！少侠不知你喜欢哪一本！

original_en: He must be a swindler. Just leave.
context: 这就是个骗子，转身离去。

original_en: Hey, don't go! I can give you a discount! Come back!
context: 哎哎哎，别走呀，我可以便宜卖给你！别走呀！

original_en: Let me think for a moment.
context: 让我考虑一下。

original_en: I'll take the Buddha's Palm.
context: 我要佛陀神掌！

original_en: You have a keen eye! Legend has it that this was the skill used by the Buddha to defeat the Monkey King! A single palm strike can make you unbeatable! Since our paths have crossed, I'll sell it to you for 1,000 coins!
context: 侠士当真识货！传闻这佛陀神掌，乃是当年当年如来佛祖打败齐天大圣的掌法！一掌打出天下无敌呀！这门功夫江湖上已经失传，见你我有缘，1000钱便卖给你了！

original_en: Okay! If I learn the Buddha's Palm, I'll become unrivaled.
context: 好！学会了这如来神掌，我便是江湖第一人了！

original_en: Alright, I wish you success in mastering this skill! I'll take my leave now.
context: 好好好，助少侠早日神功大成！我去也！

original_en: The beggar hands you a cloth bundle and hurries away.
context: 你看到这个乞丐将一个布包塞进的怀里，然后匆匆而去。

original_en: (Open the bundle) Slapstick Palm? That beggar tricked me!
context: （打开布包）扇巴掌？！这个乞丐竟然敢骗我！

original_en: Monkey King? We're not characters from 'Journey to the West'. (Refuse to purchase)
context: 齐天大圣？你当这是西游记呢？（拒绝购买）

original_en: You have a keen eye! Legend has it that this was the skill used by the Buddha to defeat the Monkey King! A single palm strike can make you unbeatable! Since our paths have crossed, I'll sell it to you for 2,000 coins!
context: 侠士当真识货！传闻这佛陀神掌，乃是当年当年如来佛祖打败齐天大圣的掌法！一掌打出天下无敌呀！这门功夫江湖上已经失传，见你我有缘，2000钱便卖给你了！

original_en: (Open the bundle) Sky Eating Palm? !
context: （打开布包）降龙吞天掌？！

original_en: I came across this manual while scavenging. Today, upon meeting a renowned hero like you, I must give it to you as a gift.
context: 我有眼不识泰山，刚刚竟没看出侠士你乃是远近闻名的好人，这秘籍乃是我拾荒所得，今日得见君子，那里还好意思要钱，便直接送给侠士你了。

original_en: Isn't that a bit inappropriate?
context: 这样不太好吧。

original_en: Righteous heroes like you are rare. I may be a beggar, but I know the martial world's code. You take the manual, and I'll go.
context: 这大荒混乱，许多人行邪道，像你这样坚守正义的侠士不多，我虽然只是一个乞丐，但也知道江湖道义，这秘籍你拿好，我去也。

original_en: If I ever meet him again, I must repay him.
context: 若能再遇到他，定要给他一些钱才好。

original_en: You open the cloth bundle to find a manual for the Sky Eating Palm.
context: 你打开布包，里面赫然是一本降龙吞天掌。

original_en: When you walk the righteous path, you'll find many allies. Those who understand that are never alone.
context: 得道多助，失道寡助。江湖有情，悟道不孤呀。

original_en: The Primordial Kick sounds promising!
context: 洪荒腿法听起来不错！

original_en: You have a keen eye! Legend has it that the Primordial Kick was created by Pangu during the separation of heaven and earth. Since our paths have crossed, I'll sell it to you for 1,000 coins!
context: 侠士当真识货！传闻这洪荒腿法乃是当年盘古开天地之时，一脚踩碎三千神魔的绝学。这门功夫江湖上已经失传，见你我有缘，1000钱便卖给你了！

original_en: Good! If I learn the Primordial Kick, I'll become unrivaled.
context: 好！学会了这洪荒腿法，我便是江湖第一人了！

original_en: (Open the bundle) Tickle-toe Kick? That beggar tricked me!
context: （打开布包）踩脚趾？！这个乞丐竟然敢骗我！

original_en: Go away! How can something like this actually exist? (Refuse to purchase)
context: 快滚快滚，怎么有可能有这种东西。（拒绝购买）

original_en: You have a keen eye! Legend has it that the Primordial Kick was created by Pangu to shatter obstacles when separating heaven and earth. Since our paths have crossed, I'll sell it to you for 2,000 coins!
context: 侠士当真识货！传闻这洪荒腿法乃是当年盘古开天地之时，一脚踩碎三千神魔的绝学。这门功夫江湖上已经失传，见你我有缘，2000钱便卖给你了！

original_en: (Open the bundle) Transformations Leg? !
context: （打开布包）这是，千变腿？！

original_en: You open the cloth bundle to find a manual for the Transformations Leg.
context: 你打开布包，里面赫然是一本千变腿。

original_en: Power comes from within the fist! I want the Invincible Fist!
context: 拳力即是权利！我要无敌神拳！

original_en: You have a keen eye! Rumor has it that this Invincible Fist was created by the Unrivaled War God, who defeated all challengers using it. Since our paths have crossed, I'll sell it to you for 1,000 coins!
context: 侠士当真识货！传闻这无敌拳法乃是当年大荒界之上一位名为无敌战神的强者所创，打遍天下无敌手。这门功夫江湖上已经失传，见你我有缘，1000钱便卖给你了！

original_en: Good! If I learn the Invincible Fist, I'll become unrivaled.
context: 好！学会了这无敌拳法，我便是江湖第一人了！

original_en: (Open the bundle) Ground Pounding Fist? That beggar tricked me!
context: （打开布包）地趟拳？！这个乞丐竟然敢骗我！

original_en: The Unrivaled War God? That's a ridiculous name. Get lost. (Refuse to purchase)
context: 无敌战神，什么狗屁名字，快滚快滚。（拒绝购买）

original_en: You have a keen eye! Rumor has it that this Invincible Fist was created by the Unrivaled War God, who defeated all challengers using it. Since our paths have crossed, I'll sell it to you for 2,000 coins!
context: 侠士当真识货！传闻这无敌拳法乃是当年大荒界之上一位名为无敌战神的强者所创，打遍天下无敌手。这门功夫江湖上已经失传，见你我有缘，2000钱便卖给你了！

original_en: (Open the bundle) Wow! Tai Chi Fist? !
context: （打开布包）嘶！太极拳？！

original_en: You open the cloth bundle to find a manual for the Tai Chi Fist.
context: 你打开布包，里面赫然是一本太极拳。

original_en: Go away, you're obviously a scammer. (Refuse to purchase)
context: 滚滚滚，一听就是骗子。（拒绝购买）

original_en: Give him five coins and tell him to leave.
context: 给他五个铜板，让他离开。

original_en: Great hero, your kindness will surely bring you a prosperous future! Thank you so much!
context: 大侠乐善好施，将来必有厚薄！多谢大侠，多谢大侠！

original_en: The world can be filled with wrongdoing, but you can choose to do what is right. Though you've strayed, your wrongs aren't severe. Why not abandon your infamy and devote your life to goodness?
context: 江湖险恶，但亦有正道。这位侠士虽然走上歧路，但作恶不深，不如放下执念，抛弃恶名，此生向善如何？

original_en: I will genuinely repent and choose the path of righteousness. (Abandon infamy)
context: 我定会痛改前非，弃恶从善。（放弃恶名）

original_en: I'm glad you've chosen to embrace righteousness. We'll meet again.
context: 阁下能弃恶从善，在下甚是欣慰，后会有期。

original_en: Your decision greatly benefits the martial world.
context: 能够弃恶从善，不失为江湖栋梁。

original_en: I won't change, what can you do to me? (Show malice)
context: 我一直都会是这样，你待如何？（展示恶意）

original_en: Wrongdoers will face their own downfall. Please reflect on your actions. I'll take my leave now.
context: 多行不义必自毙，这位侠士，还望你好好思考。在下告辞。

original_en: Until our paths cross again
context: 有缘再见。

original_en: Take action to attack.
context: 出手攻击。

original_en: Huh? A sneak attack!
context: 恩？竟然暗中偷袭！

original_en: I'm uncertain, please grant me some time to think. (Choose to stay the same)
context: 我的未来迷茫，请在让我思考思考。（保持现状）

original_en: I hope you'll reconsider and choose the path of goodness soon. Farewell.
context: 希望阁下好好思考，早日弃恶从善。告辞。

original_en: In this dangerous world, it's important for us to stick together and help one another.
context: 江湖险恶，你我同为正道之人，应该多多交流，互相扶持。

original_en: Exactly. (Accept the goodwill)
context: 却该如此。（接受好意）

original_en: Injuries are common on our journeys. Keep these medicines, they might help.
context: 江湖走跳，难免刀砍剑伤，这些药品你且拿好，或许有用。

original_en: Accept.
context: 欣然接受。

original_en: I am accustomed to traveling alone. (Decline the goodwill)
context: 我独来独往惯了（拒绝好意）

original_en: Well, then take care of yourself. Farewell.
context: 江湖险恶，你自己要万分小心。后会有期。

original_en: It's been a while, I hope you've been doing well. Yes, it's been so long, and I couldn't resist the urge to see you.
context: 有段时间没见，不知你过得如何？好久未见，我有些想你，忍耐不住，就来看你了。

original_en: I'm so happy you care about me. (Express delight)
context: 有你关心，如何都是好的。（表达喜悦）

original_en: It's great to see you're doing fine. I've made these foods myself. You can have them when you're hungry. Whenever you enjoy them, think of me.
context: 见你过得不错，我就放心了。这些是我亲手制作，你行走江湖路上，可以拿来充饥。你吃到这菜，便能想起我来。

original_en: Just be cautious not to lose them. I've got some matters to attend to at home, so I'll head back for now. If you ever have the time, come back home. I'll always be there.
context: 恩，千万拿好，莫要粗心被贼人偷了去，家里还有事，我就先回去了。你若是有闲暇，就回家看看，我一直都会等你。

original_en: As long as you are with me, what more do I need?
context: 爱侣如此，夫复何求。

original_en: If you have nothing to do, I'll be fine. Before I came to see you, I saw that the plums on the branches were pleasing, so I picked some just right for you. When you wander in the Jianghu, it's inevitable to live in the open air. These plums are sour, sweet, and delicious, which can relieve the taste. Soaking in wine can also warm your body.
context: 你无事便好，我来见你之前，见枝头梅子喜人，便摘了些正好送你。你在江湖漂泊难免风餐露宿，这梅子酸甜可口，可吃着解味，泡在酒里也能暖暖身子。

original_en: You are so considerate.
context: 多谢你了。

original_en: You're a goofball! No need for such words. If you ever have the time, visit home more often. I've got other things to attend to at home, so I'll head back for now. But don't forget to visit home regularly.
context: 你这呆子，何必和我说这种话。你若有闲暇多来看看我，便比什么都要强了。家里还有别的事情，我就先回去了。可别忘了，常回来看看。

original_en: You're on your own out there, and I always worry about you. I brought you some homemade wine. It's refreshing and aids digestion. Give it a try.
context: 你一人出门在外，我总是很担心你，这些酒是我亲手酿的，我还特意加了些你喜欢的果子，这酒喝起来清爽解腻，你快尝尝。

original_en: I'll keep it and enjoy it later.
context: 哪里舍得，还是路上在喝。

original_en: Well, when you finish it, I'll bring you more. I didn't bring too much, fearing you might not like it. Since you like it, that's great. I'll head back for now. If you find yourself with free time, visit home more often.
context: 无事，等你喝完了，我再给你送便是。我就是怕你不喜欢，才没敢给你带上太多，免得你喝不惯，看着又觉得厌烦。你喜欢这酒是再好不过，家里还有事情，我就先回去了。你若有闲暇，多回家里看看。

original_en: I've been feeling a bit weighed down. (Express grievance)
context: 有些委屈，积压心底。（表达委屈）

original_en: When I see you upset, it pains me too. Life can be tough, and things don't always go our way. We shouldn't keep secrets from each other. If something's bothering you, just talk to me.
context: 见你不舒服，我心里也有些不忍。唉，这江湖就是这样，总是不遂人愿。你我之间不应有什么秘密，有什么事大可说与我听，万般委屈说出来，应该就好受多了。

original_en: It's a long story.
context: 说来话长，是最好的。

original_en: How about we find a quiet place to live away from all the chaos? That way, you won't have to suffer any more.
context: 我俩不如寻个隐蔽地方隐居起来，不去管那江湖上的破烂事情。免得你要受委屈。

original_en: Your comforting words are already helping.
context: 有你劝解，我已经好受多了。

original_en: When you feel better, I'll be happier too. I've got other things to attend to at home, so I'll head back for now. Take this, you'll need money on your journey. If you find yourself with free time, visit home more often.
context: 你心情好了，我自然也会开心。家里还有事情，我就先回去了。这些钱给你，江湖路上用钱的地方很多，我男人出门可不能没钱。你若是有空，可以多回家里看看。

original_en: I'm feeling a bit down. (Express sadness)
context: 不是很好，有些难过。（表达痛苦）

original_en: This world is filled with complexities and troubles beyond our control. But I believe in your choices and trust everything you do. I will stand by you, supporting you silently.
context: 这江湖恩恩怨怨多纷扰，临了半点不由人。不过我相信你的选择，相信你所做的一切。无论如何我一直都会在你背后，默默支持你的。

original_en: As long as you are with me, what more do I need?
context: 得爱侣如此，夫复何求呀。

original_en: It's been a while since we last met. I hope you've been doing well? Yes, it's been so long, and I couldn't resist the urge to see you.
context: 有些日子不见，不知近来可好？好久未见，我有些想你，忍耐不住，就来看你了。

original_en: As long as you're safe, that's all that matters. I made these myself. My cooking skills aren't great, but I hope you won't mind.
context: 你若安好，那一切都好。这些是我亲手所做，我厨艺不精，只盼你不要嫌弃。

original_en: I could never be upset. You've touched my heart.
context: 你有此心，我怎会嫌弃。

original_en: I'm new to cooking, so please forgive me if it's not perfect. If you ever have the time, come back home. I'll always be there. You can always confide in me.
context: 不嫌弃就好，我还是第一次下厨，难免做的不好。你若是闲暇，就多回家里看看，我一直都在。有什么事情，都可以说给我听。

original_en: Having you with me makes me happy.
context: 有你能在我身边，我很开心。

original_en: I wish I had the power to shield you from any hardships. Who's causing you distress? Let me know, and I'll stand up for you.
context: 唉，只恨我没有能耐，没办法保护你让你不受委屈。究竟是哪个让你如此难受，快告诉我，让我为你出气。

original_en: Simply seeing you makes me feel better.
context: 能看到你，我就好受多了。

original_en: If things get too troublesome, maybe we can find a peaceful place to live a simpler life.
context: 这江湖纷扰，大不了你我寻个僻静之地隐居起来，到时我耕田，你种菜，也是一种生活。

original_en: If I ever get tired of all this fighting, a different kind of life wouldn't be so bad.
context: 若有一天我倦了江湖，这样的日子也不错。

original_en: It's getting late. I'm heading home for now. If you ever find the time, visit home more often. I'll always be here for you.
context: 时候不早了，家里还有事情，我便先回去了。你若有闲暇可以多回家里看看。我一直都在等你。

original_en: Having you by my side lifts my spirits.
context: 有你在我身边，我心情好多了。

original_en: The Sky-Heating Saber scorches opponents' meridians with the Chi of the Sun, creating unbearable heat. It's truly unrivaled! And commands respect worldwide.
context: 焚天刀法势大力沉，还能灌入纯阳真气，让对方燥热难忍，烧灼经脉。真可谓刀出无双！号令天下，莫敢不从。

original_en: The Snow-melting Sword awakens frigid energy within opponents, defeating them with grace and elegance. With a single sword stroke, it stands unmatched!
context: 傲雪剑法，灵动飘逸，更能够激发敌人体内寒气，使其威力倍增！一剑祭出，谁与争锋！

original_en: The Sky-Heating Saber stands supreme!
context: 焚天刀法天下无敌！

original_en: Nonsense! The Snow-melting Sword is the true champion!
context: 放屁！傲雪剑法才是举世无双！

original_en: You were just passing by, but these two are focused on you.
context: 你只是路过，这两人却是齐齐将目光投到了你的身上。

original_en: What are you arguing about?
context: 两位这是？

original_en: Come on, share your thoughts. He doesn't believe the Sky-Heating Saber is invincible. How absurd!
context: 来来来，你来评评理，他竟然不觉得焚天刀法天下无敌。实在可笑。

original_en: He's talking nonsense. Help me make him see that the Snow-melting Sword is the best.
context: 听他乱讲，明明是傲雪剑法无双无对，你快帮我说说，让他死心。

original_en: These two are in a heated debate, and they want you to be the judge.
context: 这两人争得面红耳赤，将你当做说服对方的救命稻草。

original_en: The Snow-melting Sword, agile and swift, is undoubtedly unparalleled.
context: 傲雪剑法，灵动迅捷，真乃举世无双。

original_en: Pah! You are clueless!
context: 呸，竟然觉得傲雪剑法更胜一筹，真是不识货！

original_en: Hahaha, indeed, our Snow-melting Sword is the best!
context: 哈哈哈，果然我们傲雪剑法才是天下第一！

original_en: The frigid strike conquers all foes, living up to its name.
context: 寒锋破敌，实至名归。

original_en: Since you're interested, you might want to visit Mount Beimang. I have other matters to attend to. Goodbye.
context: 既然你对傲雪剑法感兴趣，不妨去北邙山看看。哈哈，我尚有要事，后会有期。

original_en: Oh? You're already familiar with the sect at Mount Beimang. No wonder you agree with me.
context: 哦？你已经了解过北邙山的门派了，哈哈，怪不得你会认同傲雪剑法更胜一筹。

original_en: Indeed.
context: 确实如此。

original_en: I don't have much, but these potions. Since we've connected today, they're yours. I have other matters to attend to. Goodbye.
context: 我也没没什么可以送你，这些丹药是我辛苦求来，今日与你投缘，便送给你了。我尚有要事，后会有期。

original_en: The Sky-Heating Saber, mighty and forceful, reigns supreme.
context: 焚天刀法，势大力沉，乃是天下第一。

original_en: Haha, I told you earlier, the Snow-melting Sword can't compare.
context: 哈哈哈，我早就说了，傲雪剑法屁也不是，不如焚天刀法威猛无敌！

original_en: Humph! I can't believe you actually favor the Sky-Heating Saber. You have no taste!
context: 哼！没想到你竟然喜欢焚天刀法这种垃圾绝学！真是没眼光！

original_en: The blaze saber is indeed mighty and deserving of its name.
context: 炎刀威猛，实至名归。

original_en: Since you're interested, you might want to visit Rubycliff Ravine. I have other matters to attend to. Goodbye.
context: 既然你对焚天刀法感兴趣，不妨去赤壁峡看看。哈哈，我尚有要事，后会有期。

original_en: Oh? You're already familiar with the sect at Rubycliff Ravine. No wonder you agree with me.
context: 哦？你已经了解过赤壁峡的门派了，哈哈，怪不得你会认同焚天刀法更胜一筹。

original_en: Prefer not to get involved.
context: 不愿相争，不予理会。

original_en: There should be no distinction between superior and inferior, don't you think?
context: 天下武学高深莫测，岂有高低之分？

original_en: Oh? Why don't you show us some moves? If they can match the Sky-Heating Saber, I'll agree.
context: 哦？那你倒是亮出几招给我看看，要比得上焚天刀法，我才同意。

original_en: Are you suggesting there are skills as potent as the Snow-melting Sword? Are you joking?
context: 这世上还有与傲雪剑法同样高深强大的绝学？你莫不是在说笑？

original_en: Show Tai Chi Fist!
context: 展示太极拳！

original_en: Combines speed and finesse, using force against force. It's unpredictable.
context: 这招绝学以快打慢，借力打力，确实高深莫测！

original_en: Keep demonstrating other skills.
context: 继续展示其他绝学。

original_en: Show Drink to The End!
context: 展示不醉不归！

original_en: Warriors lying drunk on the battlefield, and few return from ancient battles. Truly unique!
context: 醉卧沙场君莫笑，古来征战几人回！这招不醉不归当真奇特！

original_en: Show Flower Rain!
context: 展示漫天花雨！

original_en: Firing numerous concealed weapons, leaving no escape. Extraordinary!
context: 漫天花雨，射出无数暗器，叫人避无可避，确实是绝世好武功！

original_en: Show Annihilation Sword!
context: 展示灭绝剑法！

original_en: Ruthless and unwavering, reaching extremes and truly formidable.
context: 这剑法绝情断义，绝世出尘，趋近极端，不失为一门绝艺。

original_en: Show Extreme Break Fist!
context: 展示破击崩拳！

original_en: Defense becomes offense! It's surprisingly powerful!
context: 破击崩拳，以守为攻，竟是如此刚猛，确实是盖世武功！

original_en: Show Demon Slayer Staff!
context: 展示袈裟伏魔杖！

original_en: Sweep away raging demons with a single staff! Its power knows no bounds, an art of sheer excellence.
context: 群魔汹汹一杖扫！这袈裟伏魔杖威力无穷，确实是一门绝学。

original_en: Show Sky Eating Palm!
context: 展示降龙吞天掌！

original_en: Complex yet potent, undeniably unrivaled.
context: 这降龙吞天掌，大繁至简，威力无穷，当真是举世无双。

original_en: Show Taiyi Xuanmen Sword!
context: 展示太乙玄门剑！

original_en: Harmonizing motion and stillness flawlessly, it's indeed a supreme skill.
context: 这太乙玄门剑，以动制静，竟然毫无破绽，可谓绝颠之剑。

original_en: Show Undefeated Sword!
context: 展示求败剑诀！

original_en: Moves within moves, changes within changes. This is close to a profound art, truly exceptional.
context: 招至极限，招中无招，变至极限，变中不变。这求败剑诀几近于道，不同凡响。

original_en: Show Illuminating!
context: 展示星月旷照！

original_en: Master the principles of energy exchange. Marvelous!
context: 收化运发四字为要，以彼之道还施彼身，这星月旷照真乃不世奇功！

original_en: End demonstration.
context: 结束展示。

original_en: So, you're just good at talking! The Sky-Heating Saber remains unmatched!
context: 搞了半天你也只会耍嘴！还是我焚天刀法天下无敌！

original_en: He can't make any sense. The Snow-melting Sword is genuinely incomparable!
context: 虽然他说不出个所以然，但是傲雪剑法才是举世无双！

original_en: The two of them fell back into an argument. Maybe if I'd shown more skills, they'd have understood the depth of martial arts better.
context: 两人再度陷入了争执之中。或许当初多展示一些绝学就能让他们明白武学之道博大精深了。

original_en: *Sigh* It's rather annoying.
context: 唉，不胜其烦。

original_en: Though you showed various skills to us, I still believe the Sky-Heating Saber is unmatched!
context: 虽然你给我们展示了绝学，但我依旧觉得焚天刀法天下无敌！

original_en: It's evident that the Snow-melting Sword reigns supreme! Stop talking nonsense!
context: 明明是傲雪剑法天下无敌！你莫要胡说！

original_en: After you showcased some skills, these two once again got into an argument. Maybe if I'd shown more skills, they'd have understood the depth of martial arts better.
context: 在你展示完绝学之后，这两人再度陷入了争执之中。或许当初多展示一些绝学就能让他们明白武学之道博大精深了。

original_en: It turns out there are numerous skills that can rival the Sky-Heating Saber.
context: 这天下竟有这么多不逊于焚天刀法的高深绝学。

original_en: I didn't realize there were many peerless skills like the Snow-melting Sword. I was too narrow-minded.
context: 原来我从前都是坐井观天了，却不想这么多能与傲雪剑法争锋的绝世武学。是我狭隘了。

original_en: After your martial arts demonstrations, they realized the limitless potential of martial arts and stopped arguing.
context: 在你展示了许多绝学之后，这两人显然已经明白武道之山，高不见顶，已经不再争执了。

original_en: I'm glad that you were able to settle your disagreement.
context: 两位能够化解争执，求同存异，实在太好了。

original_en: If it weren't for you, we would still be stuck in the narrow debate. These potions were hard-earned by me, so please accept them.
context: 若非有你，我俩还陷在狭隘的刀剑之争，不知道天外有天。这些丹药是我辛苦所得，你千万要收下。

original_en: If it weren't for your guidance, I might have fallen into confusion in the future. Please accept this as a token of my gratitude.
context: 若非有你为我点破迷障，只怕来日我定要陷入迷障。多谢你，这些东西希望你千万收下。

original_en: After you showed some skills, these two seem to have realized that the depth of martial arts, and they are no longer arguing.
context: 在你展示了许多绝学之后，这两人显然明白武道之山，高不见顶，已经不再争执了。

original_en: In that case, I gratefully accept.
context: 那我就却之不恭了。

original_en: Young hero, do you know what the most delicious thing in the world is?
context: 嘿嘿，这位侠士，你可知这天下间最鲜美的东西是何物呀？

original_en: The beggar's eyes keep wandering towards the plump chicken at your side.
context: 这乞丐目光不断瞥向你身边的肥鸡，嘴角时不时淌出些口水。

original_en: I'm not sure.
context: 确实不知。

original_en: It is chicken, but ordinary methods can't truly bring out its flavor. I see there's a chicken. How about letting me turn it into a delicious dish?
context: 这天下间最鲜美的莫过于鸡肉，但寻常的做法难以激发出鸡肉的香味。我看你身边有一只肥鸡，不如交给我来处理，做成一道美味如何？

original_en: Give him the chicken.
context: 将肥鸡交给他。

original_en: You watch as he quickly snatches the chicken and disappears in a few steps.
context: 你见他迅速抱起你身边的那只肥鸡，三两步便跑的不见踪影。

original_en: Did I just fall for a trick?
context: 我是不是被他忽悠呢？

original_en: Politely decline and walk away.
context: 拒绝，转身离开。

original_en: What a shame, that chicken was so plump.
context: 好肥的一只鸡，真是可惜了。

original_en: Give him five coins and tell him to leave.
context: 给他5个铜板，打发他离开。

original_en: Thank you, and may you stay healthy and prosperous!
context: 谢谢您了，祝您身体健康，万事如意，福如东海，寿比南山！

original_en: Just leave.
context: 离开吧。

original_en: (Staring at you blankly)
context: （愣愣的看着你）

original_en: You scoundrel! You've taken the life of the person I held dearest! I challenge you! !
context: 混蛋！你竟然杀了我最亲近的人！！我跟你拼了！！

original_en: Accept the challenge
context: 选择应战

original_en: Face the consequences!
context: 受死吧！

original_en: I took the life of someone {0}{1} held dear, and now {0}{1} seeks vengeance.
context: 我杀了{0}{1}在意的人，{0}{1}来找我报仇。

original_en: Attempt reconciliation
context: 尝试和解

original_en: Do you have anything else to say?
context: 你还有何话好说！

original_en: Try offering money to make amends
context: 尝试花钱达成和解

original_en: (Glaring at you maliciously)
context: （恶狠狠的看着你）

original_en: The other party has a bad reputation, it seems there's a chance.
context: 对方的名声不好，看来有戏。

original_en: Very well, pay me 3,000 coins, and we'll consider this settled.
context: 算了，人死不能复生，给我3000钱，以后我们井水不犯河水。

original_en: Agree
context: 同意

original_en: I took the life of someone {0}{1} cared about, and they opted for a monetary settlement.
context: 我杀了{0}{1}在意的人，对方名声并不好，竟然用钱了结了这段恩怨。

original_en: The other party has a good reputation and appears unwilling to reconcile.
context: 对方名声很好，似乎不愿和解

original_en: I couldn't care less about your money! ! ! Face the consequences!
context: 区区钱财我怎么看在眼里，你简直是妄想！！！受死吧！

original_en: Reluctantly accept the challenge.
context: 找不到合适的理由，无奈应战

original_en: Heard people speak of your formidable strength. Take this elixir, and you'll become invincible!
context: 听人说你的实力很强，我这里有一枚辛苦得来的仙丹，给你服用吧，吃了你就天下无敌了！

original_en: Take it right away.
context: 谢谢，立即服用。

original_en: You've been deceived! Giving you a poisonous pill was my strategy to defeat you! You deserve this! ! !
context: 哈哈哈，你这个混蛋，杀我至亲，我实力孱弱只能出此下策！你真是罪有应得！！！

original_en: You consumed the fake elixir and are now afflicted with a 100-stack poison gas! !
context: 刚服下“仙丹”就察觉体内异常，中了100层毒瘴！！

original_en: I killed someone {0}{1} cared about, and they tricked me into poison.
context: 我杀了{0}{1}在意的人，对方畏惧我的实力，竟然骗我喝下毒药

original_en: You... you're despicable! !
context: 你~~你好卑鄙！！

original_en: You're walking along the road when you notice a commotion in the distance.
context: 你走在路上，看到远处两男一女撕扯不清，不一会拉扯着来到了你的面前。

original_en: What's going on here?
context: 几位这是？

original_en: The people in the dispute pause and notice you.
context: 还在撕扯中的几个人注意到你，这才停下动作。

original_en: Sworn brother, why resort to violence without cause?
context: 你我是结拜兄弟，为何今日一见面不由分说就是撕打？

original_en: You are so shameless! I caught you behaving inappropriately with my wife. I apprehended you red-handed, and yet you have the nerve to talk!
context: 你还有脸开口？我今刚一到家，就见到你非礼你的嫂子，被我抓了个人赃并获，你竟然还有脸说话！

original_en: You decide to watch how the situation unfolds.
context: 静观其变...

original_en: Wife? Isn't she your little sister? How is this possible!
context: 嫂子？她，她不是你的小妹吗？这，这是怎么回事！

original_en: *sobs* Honey, I can't imagine what would have happened if you hadn't come back in time. And he was saying terrible things. I'm too ashamed to repeat them.
context: 呜呜呜，相公，今天幸好你回来的是时候，不然，不然我就要被他强占了去呜呜呜。他，他还说呜呜呜，污言秽语，妾羞于启齿。

original_en: Wait, that's not what you said before!
context: 这，这，你之前不是这么说的呀！

original_en: Darling, you have to stand up for me!
context: 呜呜呜，相公，你要替妾身做主呀。

original_en: Brother, please listen to me!
context: 这，大哥，你听我说！

original_en: His face flushed, tried to speak but ended up swallowing his words.
context: 那汉子涨红了脸，想要说些什么，却最终都咽了回去。

original_en: No more excuses! Don't worry, my dear. I'm here!
context: 你还想狡辩！娘子莫怕，相公为你撑腰！

original_en: Prepare to die!
context: 你这贼子，拿命来！

original_en: Hold on! (Step in to intervene)
context: 且慢！（出手阻止）

original_en: Observing the man about to strike, you prepare to mediate.
context: 说是迟，那时快，眼见那人已经出手，想要阻拦的你蓄势待发。

original_en: Use your power to halt him!
context: 以力阻之！

original_en: Gathering your Chi, you separate the two men on the verge of combat.
context: 你运起真气抬掌激发，飒飒掌风直接将就要战在一处的两人分开。

original_en: Witnessing your strength, those three people no longer underestimate you.
context: 见你功夫不凡，现场三人再也不敢将你忽视。

original_en: Now, please pay close attention.
context: 现在，好好听我说话吧。

original_en: Inquire about the situation with the woman.
context: 询问女子，当时的情况。

original_en: I was at home doing my chores when this scoundrel tried to act inappropriately. I resisted, but he overpowered me. Luckily, my husband returned in the nick of time to rescue me.
context: 今日里，我在家里做着家务，这贼子便要对我行不轨之事，我东躲西藏，和他扭打半天，最终还是被他抱住。幸好这时相公回来，这才让我免遭苦难。

original_en: Continue to inquire.
context: 继续追问

original_en: Did you put up a fight?
context: 你可有反抗？

original_en: I was helpless. As a woman, I couldn't match his strength. I resisted as best I could, breaking dishes and pots.
context: 天可怜见，我一介妇人，哪里是他的对手，我虽然尽力反抗，锅碗都打碎不少，但还是差点被他得手。

original_en: Continue to inquire.
context: 继续询问。

original_en: I have no further questions.
context: 没什么可问的了。

original_en: Did you call for help?
context: 你没有呼救吗？

original_en: Our home is in a secluded place. I screamed for help, but no one heard or came to help.
context: 我家是再僻静处，周围无人，任我叫破了喉咙也没人来救我。

original_en: What kind of person is he?
context: 平日里你那叔子是个怎样的人？

original_en: He's typically a lazy scoundrel who dabbles in petty theft. I don't understand why my husband decided to become sworn brothers with him. His sworn brother puts me in this perilous situation.
context: 他平日里就是个游手好闲偷鸡摸狗的贼子，不知我相公是哪根筋搭错，要与他结拜。呜呜呜竟害得我险些失了清白。

original_en: What's your husband like?
context: 你相公是个怎样的人。

original_en: My husband can be impulsive and rash at times. Otherwise, he wouldn't have become sworn brothers with this scoundrel. Please, brave hero, you must help me.
context: 我相公平日里有些鲁莽冲动，否则也不会和这个贼子结拜，呜呜呜。这位大侠，你要为我做主呀。

original_en: Go ask someone else.
context: 去问问别人吧。

original_en: Inquire about the situation with the woman's husband.
context: 询问女子的丈夫，当时的情况。

original_en: I found this scoundrel holding onto my wife. I was furious and wanted to kill him!
context: 我当时赶回家里，就见到这贼子抱着我的娘子，气得我恨不得当场把他宰了！

original_en: Did you witness him behaving inappropriately toward your wife?
context: 你看到他非礼你娘子了？

original_en: I witnessed it. He and my wife were entangled. She couldn't have been embracing him willingly.
context: 我赶到时亲眼所见，他和我娘子撕扯在一起，不是他非礼我娘子，还能是我娘子去抱他不成？

original_en: What's your opinion of your wife?
context: 对于你的娘子你有什么看法。

original_en: She is very beautiful, and while others may be envious and spread rumors, I wholeheartedly believe that she loves me and has remained faithful.
context: 我娘子生的靓丽，免不了旁人嫉妒说些闲话，但我相信我娘子真心爱我，至今如一。

original_en: What's your take on your sworn brother?
context: 对于你的结义兄弟你有什么看法。

original_en: When we first met, he seemed like a person of integrity. People who knew him praised him as a gentleman. I never expected this betrayal. I must have been blind to become sworn brothers with him.
context: 我结识他时，他可谓一身正气，认识他的人都夸他是难得的正人君子，却不想竟然背后做出这种事情。我当真是瞎了眼，和这种人结拜。

original_en: When you arrived, did you see any signs of a struggle?
context: 你赶到时，现场可有打斗痕迹？

original_en: No, everything was in order, except for a few missing bites from the food on the table.
context: 没有，我回到家时家里各处都算整洁，桌上的饭菜还是都被吃了几口。

original_en: Did you hear your wife cry for help?
context: 你可曾听到你娘子呼救？

original_en: No. If she had screamed, I would have heard it from a distance. I believe he must have covered her mouth to prevent her from screaming. If I had heard her cries, I could have acted sooner, and maybe he'd be dead by now!
context: 没有。我家住的偏僻，若有呼救声音老远我便能听到。想来是这贼子捂住了我娘子的嘴，这才没让我娘子叫出声来。可恨，若是我听到呼救，便能早些过去，现在说不准已经将其毙于掌下了！

original_en: Have you ever discussed your wife with your sworn brother?
context: 你可曾与你兄弟说过你娘子的事情？

original_en: Not at all. Technically, this was their first meeting. He's two-faced. On his first meeting with my wife, he harbored sinister intentions. He deserves punishment.
context: 这到确实没有，按理说这时应该是两人第一次见面。这贼子知人知面不知心，第一次见我妻子竟然就起了歹心，当真该杀。

original_en: Inquire about the situation with the accused party.
context: 询问被指通奸者，当时的情况。

original_en: I swear I did not act inappropriately towards her! She willingly approached me.
context: 天地明鉴，我并没有非礼她！是她主动贴上来的。

original_en: What exactly did you do?
context: 你都做了什么。

original_en: I went to visit my sworn brother, only to find him absent. This woman claimed to be his younger sister and had prepared a meal for me.  I had only taken a few bites when she made advances. I tried to push her away. We were still grappling when my sworn brother returned and became furious.
context: 这日我去拜访我的义兄，到了才发现义兄不在。这女子称自己是义兄的小妹，做好了饭菜等我。我谢过之后刚刚吃了两口酒菜，这女子就主动贴了上来，我想要将她推开，又怕动了功夫伤到义兄的小妹，就在拉扯之中，义兄回来了，对我大发雷霆。

original_en: Were you aware of her relationship with your sworn brother?
context: 你不知道这女子和你义兄的关系？

original_en: She claimed to be his younger sister. Since I'd never heard him mention being married, I took her at her word.
context: 她只说她是义兄的小妹，我从未听义兄说起他已经娶妻之事，便信了她的说辞。

original_en: What kind of person is your sworn brother?
context: 平日里你这义兄是怎样的人？

original_en: He's an upright but hot-tempered person. Like what happened earlier, he didn't listen to my explanation and turned to violence. Some things are just difficult to explain.
context: 我这义兄为人正直但热血冲动，今日之事便是不远听我解释抬手便打，唉。当真是有口说不清。

original_en: She accused you of engaging in petty theft.
context: 你的嫂子说你偷鸡摸狗。

original_en: Today was the first time I met her. How could she slander me like this?
context: 怪也，我今日与她第一次见面，她如何能这样污蔑于我！

original_en: There is only one truth!
context: 真相只有一个！

original_en: I've grasped the situation, and now let me pass judgment.
context: 前因后果我已经了解了，现在你们之间的事情，就让我来论断吧。

original_en: (Judgment) The allegation of misconduct is true!
context: （论断）非礼之事是真！

original_en: As I suspected! You scoundrel, prepare to die!
context: 我就知道是这样，你这贼子，看打！

original_en: Oh no! ! ! !
After your judgment, the two engage in combat. You can't help but notice a subtle smirk on the woman's face.
context: 你论断是非之后，两人便打了起来。不知是不是错觉，你见那女子的嘴角扬起了一丝笑意。

original_en: Something feels off.
context: 总觉得哪里不对。

original_en: (Judgment) The allegation of misconduct is false!
context: （论断）非礼之事是假！

original_en: What? One should be cautious with their words!
context: 啊？！大侠，话可不能乱说！

original_en: I've truly been wronged.
context: 大侠明鉴，我当真是被冤枉的。

original_en: He behaved inappropriately towards me. Please don't judge by my appearance alone.
context: 大侠，是他非礼我的，你可不能看我是个小女子就欺负我呀呜呜呜。

original_en: If I dare to speak, there must be evidence.
context: 我既然敢说，必定是有证据的。

original_en: It's time to present evidence and conclude this matter.
context: 是时候提出证据，终结这场闹剧了。

original_en: Traces of a fight.
context: 打斗痕迹。

original_en: You claim to have resisted vigorously, but why is there no sign of a fight at the scene?
context: 你口口声声说你极力抵抗，为何现场毫无打斗痕迹？

original_en: Well, he possesses martial skills. Even though I fought back fiercely, I couldn't cause much damage.
context: 这，这，这是他有武功在身，做事小心，虽然我极力抵抗，也没能造成多少破坏。

original_en: The woman visibly panics, her demeanor shifting.
context: 这女子明显慌了神，脸色有些变化。

original_en: Cry for help.
context: 呼救声。

original_en: You said you screamed for help, but why didn't your husband hear you? Your home is in a remote area, so he should have heard you from afar!
context: 你说你呼救几乎要喊破喉咙，怎么你相公却未听到你呼救的声音？你家住的偏僻，按理说你丈夫老远就该听到才是！

original_en: This... This... I... I...
context: 这，这，这我，我我....

original_en: The two don't know each other.
context: 两人不相识。

original_en: Until today, you and your brother-in-law had never met. How could you judge his character? !
context: 今日之前，你和你的小叔子都没见过，怎知道他的为人？！

original_en: This... I... I heard it from my husband!
context: 这，这，这我我是听我相公所说！

original_en: Speechless.
context: 哑口无言。

original_en: I haven't been able to gather any evidence. I can only remain silent.
context: 到了此刻我竟然没有掌握任何证据，只能无言以对。

original_en: Remain silent...
context: 无言以对....

original_en: That's all!
context: 言尽于此！

original_en: Enough! You wicked woman, trying to deceive us! You almost caused me to harm my brother!
context: 够了！你这贱人还想狡辩！竟然让我错怪兄弟险些害了他的性命！

original_en: I... Darling, I didn't... I..
context: 我，我，相公，我，没，我没有...我....

original_en: Thank you for helping me clear this up. If not for you, I might have been misled by this woman! Please take this money, and from now on, it's a matter between us brothers!
context: 大侠，多谢你，若非你帮我厘清一切，我只怕会被这贱人骗了！这些钱你且收下，接下来就是我们兄弟自己的事情了！

original_en: Accept gratefully. Then I won't bother you. Farewell.
context: 欣然笑纳，不打扰了，告辞。

original_en: You sly fox!
context: 妈的你这贱人！

original_en: *Sob* Darling, please believe me...
context: 相公，你要相信我呀，呜呜呜呜呜。

original_en: Her sobbing reaches the man's ears, softening his stance. Unfortunately, with more evidence, I might have persuaded him.
context: 一声声啜泣传入那汉子的耳朵，显然他的态度松动了。可惜，如果我能掌握更多的证据，或许就能让他相信我了。

original_en: ...I've said enough. Farewell.
context: ....话已至此，告辞了。

original_en: You gathered your Chi to intervene, but they were already engaged in combat.
context: 你运起真气抬掌欲发，却为时已晚，两人已然战在一处，难解难分。

original_en: What a shame...
Use Tai Chi Fist!
context: 太极拳借力消力！

original_en: Energy flowed through your hands, neutralizing the aggressive moves.
context: 霎那间太极精要在你掌间流转，凶恶招式被你化为无形。

original_en: Use Star Transfers!
context: 斗转星移收化运发！

original_en: The stars shifted, making the man's attack ineffective.
context: 移星换斗绝技再现，立刻将那汉子的攻势化为无形。

original_en: Use Acupoint-blocking Hand!
context: 般若封穴手点穴！

original_en: You blocked the man's acupoints, his Chi stagnated, and he stopped his attack.
context: 封穴手封穴锁脉，那汉子顿时真气一滞，停下攻势。

original_en: Use Undefeated Sword!
context: 求败剑决一剑破招！

original_en: The man found your sword at his throat, instantly immobilizing him.
context: 求败剑诀破尽天下招式，刹那间那汉子已经被你剑锋抵在脖颈，不敢动弹。

original_en: Remain silent. (Observe the situation)
context: 不语。（静观其变）

original_en: Step aside!
context: 别挡我得道！

original_en: Not wanting to become further entangled in the conflict, you walked away.
context: 你不愿与他们多做纠缠，转身离开。

original_en: That's weird.
context: 莫名其妙

original_en: What is it?
context: 有什么事情？

original_en: What do you wish to discuss?
context: 何事需要商议？

original_en: Pleased to meet you!
context: 幸会~

original_en: Excuse me
context: 打扰了

original_en: Gift
context: 送礼

original_en: Back
context: 返回

original_en: Gift 1,000 coins
context: 赠送1000钱

original_en: Gifted 1,000 coins. Influence Relations +5
context: 送出1000钱，势力关系增加5

original_en: I give a gift through diplomacy, and the power of the forces of {0} {1} improved the relationship.
context: 我通过外交送礼，与{0}{1}的势力改善了关系。

original_en: Gift 3,000 coins
context: 赠送3000钱

original_en: Gifted 3,000 coins. Influence Relations +16
context: 送出3000钱，势力关系增加16

original_en: Gift 5,000 coins
context: 赠送5000钱

original_en: Gifted 5,000 coins. Influence Relations +27
context: 送出5000钱，势力关系增加27

original_en: Gift 10,000 coins
Gifted 10,000 coins. Influence Relations +55
context: 送出10000钱，势力关系增加55

original_en: Move your mouth and fighter
context: 发动嘴炮交锋

original_en: Your sect doesn't have enough funds
context: 门派没有足够的资金

original_en: You can only do this once a day
context: 每日只能进行一次

original_en: Ally
context: 结盟

original_en: Alliance formed. Influence Relations +100
context: 成功结盟，势力关系增加100

original_en: I have successfully formed forces with the forces of {0} {1} through diplomacy.
context: 我通过外交，与{0}{1}的势力成功结盟。

original_en: Your Relations with the Influence is below 300. They refused to form an alliance.
context: 势力关系未达到300，对方拒绝结盟

original_en: Try to make a gunfire
context: 尝试嘴炮交锋

original_en: The opponent refuses to make a mouthful of firing
context: 对方拒绝嘴炮交锋

original_en: Give up temporarily
context: 暂时放弃

original_en: Destroy alliance
context: 毁盟

original_en: We have always been on good terms. Are you really going to abandon our alliance? !
context: 你我两派一向交好，你一定要背弃盟约吗？！

original_en: Break alliance
context: 撕毁盟约

original_en: Alliance broken. Influence Relations -300
context: 撕毁盟约，势力关系减少300

original_en: I tear up the alliance with {0} {1} forces, and the relationship between the two sides has fallen sharply.
context: 我撕毁了与{0}{1}势力的盟约，双方门派关系骤降。

original_en: Let me think
context: 再考虑一下

original_en: Declare common goal
context: 宣言共同目标

original_en: Trade resources
context: 资源贸易

original_en: We aren't on good enough terms. I object.
context: 你我两派还不够友好，我不同意。

original_en: Coerce tribute
context: 胁迫进贡

original_en: I through diplomacy, coercion {0} {1} forces of tribute supplies, the relationship between the two parties is slightly reduced!
context: 我通过外交，胁迫{0}{1}的势力进贡物资，双方势力关系稍有降低！

original_en: I may not match your strength, but I won't bow down!
context: 虽然我的实力不如你，但也绝不屈从！

original_en: They resisted your coercion. Influence Relations -20
context: 对方拒绝了你的胁迫，势力关系降低20

original_en: Stop fooling yourself! !
context: 你简直痴心妄想！！

original_en: You can coerce a tribute again after 3 days.
context: 3日后才能继续胁迫进贡。

original_en: Declare hostility
context: 宣言敌对

original_en: Are you sure you want an all-out war with us? ! ?
context: 你确定要与我派不死不休吗！！？

original_en: Confirm
context: 确定

original_en: Your sects became enemies. Influence Relations -500
context: 两派变为敌对关系，势力关系降低500

original_en: The forces of {0} {1} have become hostile!
context: 我与{0}{1}的势力成为敌对关系！双方门派势同水火！

original_en: We're enemies. What's the point in talking? ?
context: 我们之间已经敌对，还有什么好谈的吗！？

original_en: How can I be of assistance?
context: 需要我配合做什么？

original_en: Show goodwill together
context: 共同对其友善

original_en: I have a long-standing grudge with their Master. I'm afraid I can't say yes to that.
context: 我与其掌门素有积怨，请恕在下不能答应！

original_en: Influence Relations among the three forces +50
context: 三方势力关系增加50

original_en: I United Ally, and improve the martial arts relationship with {0} {1}.
context: 我联合盟友，与{0}{1}的势力改善门派关系。

original_en: Show hostility together
context: 共同对其敌对

original_en: They're my allies. Could we settle this peacefully for my sake?
context: 我与其已经结为同盟，看在我的面子上，可否息事宁人。

original_en: Both your Influence Relations with them -100
context: 双方对其势力关系降低100

original_en: I United Ally, reduce martial arts relationships on {0} {1}.
context: 我联合盟友，对{0}{1}的势力降低门派关系。

original_en: Denounce them as a demonic cult
context: 指认其为魔教

original_en: I hold no grudges with them, and they don't appear evil. I'm afraid I can't agree to this.
context: 我与其并无结怨，看他们也并非作恶多端，请恕在下不能同意。

original_en: They're a demonic cult! Why else would they have a grudge against me? I second your decision! !
context: 他们就是魔教！否则怎会与我结怨！我必定支持您的决定！！

original_en: Both of you declare hostility against their forces. Influence Relations -500
context: 双方对其势力宣言敌对，势力关系降低500

original_en: I United Ally, identifying the power of {0} {1} as a magic religion, and a statement of declaration of declarations!
context: 我联合盟友，指认{0}{1}的势力为魔教，并对其宣言敌对关系！

original_en: You were walking on the road, and there was a person in front of you who looked sad and stumbled all the way, and finally fell in front of you.
context: 你走在路上，前方一人神色悲戚一路跌跌撞撞，最终倒在你的面前。

original_en: Help him stand up.
context: 扶他起身。

original_en: Thank you. Do you have any wine?
context: 多谢你，有酒吗？

original_en: Give him a jar.
context: 给他一坛。

original_en: Hahahahaha, strong aroma, good wine, good wine hahahahaha.
context: 哈哈哈哈，香浓性烈，好酒，好酒哈哈哈哈哈。

original_en: Brother, I have a good capacity for drinking.
context: 兄台好酒量。

original_en: Wine brings sadness to my heart, but it only makes me more miserable. I don't have a good tolerance for alcohol. Now I'm just using this cup to kill my spirit.
context: 酒入愁肠，不过更添悲凉。哪有什么好酒量，如今只是借这杯中物，消磨精神罢了。

original_en: What is it that makes you so sad?
context: 不知何事，让阁下伤心至此？

original_en: She and I met in a tavern. She played the piano, I played the flute, and listened to her singing. We got to know each other along the way, and we met each other, and we fell in love.
context: 当初我与她于酒馆相识，她操琴，我弄萧，听她歌上邪。一路相知，相约，情投意合。

original_en: The woman you are talking about...
context: 阁下口中那个她....

original_en: My beloved has passed away, just before we got married. The red color of the house has faded, and my eyes have turned into white silk. Hahahahaha, things in the world make people miserable! Hahahaha.
context: 伊人已去，就在成亲之前。一堂红彩褪色，竟成了满眼白绫。哈哈哈哈，世事弄人，叫人不得好活呀！哈哈哈哈。

original_en: You can feel that the person in front of you is like a gossamer. At this moment, he is on the verge of death, and there is only one breath left to hold on.
context: 你能感受到，眼前此人气若游丝，此刻已然逼近死亡边缘，只剩一口气撑着而已。

original_en: My condolences....
I just burned some paper money for her. Tell me, why does the fire always hit people's faces? No matter where I go, the fire follows me. It burns me so much that it hurts.
context: 我刚刚为她烧了些纸钱，你说，这燃起的火，为何总向人脸上漂。我无论走哪里去，那火偏偏跟我，烫的我生疼。

original_en: comfort him.
context: 安慰他。

original_en: She misses like fire, even if Yin and Yang are separated, she still wants to chase you. It's just that this world doesn't allow her to let this unforgettable love fall on you, and it's so hot that it hurts.
context: 她思念如火，即使阴阳两隔，也要寻你追你。只是这人间不许，使这铭心之爱，落在你身上，烫的生疼。

original_en: Missing is like fire, separated by yin and yang. Hahahaha, you are right. I have no need for these things, so I will give them to you. Haha, thank you for the wine. Farewell. See you again.
context: 思念如火，阴阳两隔。哈哈哈哈，你说的有理。这些东西，我已经用不到了，便送你了。哈哈，多谢你的美酒，告辞，后会无期。

original_en: In the evening, the jackdaws are full of sorrow\\nThe new green of the willow pond is gentle\\nIf you teach that there is no hatred in your eyes\\nI don't believe there are white heads in the world
context: 晚日寒鸦一片愁\\n柳塘新绿却温柔\\n若教眼底无离恨\\n不信人间有白头

original_en: The advent of what love is.....
context: 问世间情为何物.....

original_en: Wait...you!
If nothing else, I will leave.
context: 若无他事，我便离开了。

original_en: Thank you for the good wine, there will be no date, so farewell.
context: 多谢你的美酒，后会无期，告辞了。

original_en: I didn't bring any alcohol with me.
context: 随身没有带酒。

original_en: No? Oh, thank you.
context: 没有吗？呵，多谢你。

original_en: Watch him leave...
context: 目送离去....

original_en: You see this person's expression is in a trance, and his breath is like a thread, you think he won't live long.
context: 你见此人神情恍惚，气若游丝，想是活不长了。

original_en: Dreams have been broken for forty years\\nThe old willows in the Shenyuan do not blow cotton\\nThis body is like a mountain and soil\\nThere is still a trace of hanging
context: 梦断香消四十年\\n沈园柳老不吹绵\\n此身行作稽山土\\n犹吊遗踪一泫然

original_en: Give him a jar of monkey wine.
context: 给他一坛猴儿酒。

original_en: The aroma of the wine is clear, with a little fruity sweetness. This wine is not bad, but it's a pity that it can't be intoxicating.
context: 酒香清冽，带着些许果甜味，这酒不错，可惜不能醉人。

original_en: Your Excellency seems to have something on his mind. The things in the cup are just for fun and can't relieve your sorrow.
context: 阁下似有心事，杯中物只是玩味，解不了忧愁。

original_en: If she has knowledge in the spring, I don't know how she will feel when she sees you so depressed.
context: 若她泉下有知，见你如此消沉，不知要作何感想。

original_en: She has already gone, leaving me to live alone. Although this world is big, there is no room for me.
context: 她已经去了，留我独活，这江湖虽大，却无我容身之处了。

original_en: The word love is the most heroic thing to kill...
context: 情之一字，最叫英雄消磨....

original_en: Besides, now that I have no desires or desires, what reason do I have to survive in this body?
context: 况且如今，我以无欲无求，还有什么理由苟存此身呢？

original_en: You still owe me a pot of monkey wine.
context: 你还欠我一壶猴儿酒。

original_en: Huh? It's just a pot of monkey wine. I'll find it and return it to you.
context: 恩？不过一壶猴儿酒而已，我去寻来，还你便是。

original_en: I don't want wine.
context: 我不要酒。

original_en: So how are you doing?
context: 那你待如何？

original_en: Why don't you follow me first, and I'll tell you when I think it over.
context: 不如先跟着我吧，等我想好了，再告诉你。

original_en: Hahaha, this is the first time I've seen people persuaded in this way. Ha, what you said makes sense. If she knew something under the spring, she wouldn't want to see me like this. Well, I'll stay with you for a while.
context: 哈哈哈，用这种方法劝人，我倒是头一次见。呵，你说的也算有些道理，若她在泉下有知，自不愿见我如此。罢了，我便先跟你一段时间。

original_en: Don't worry, if I want to ask, I won't force you to stay.
context: 放心，若我想要要求，定不会强留你。

original_en: Leave him alone.
context: 不去管他。

original_en: Wandering dust covers empty seats\\nLonely tents cover empty beds\\nEverything is endless\\nIt only hurts the survivors
context: 游尘掩虚座\\n孤帐覆空床\\n万事无不尽\\n徒令存者伤

original_en: You saw a man come to you in a daze.
context: 你见到一人失魂落魄的来到你的面前。

original_en: This world is dangerous, let's stop killing people. You have killed so much, what will you do if their family members come to seek revenge?
context: 这江湖凶险，杀人人杀收手吧。你已经滥杀至此，若他们的家人寻仇过来你又待如何？

original_en: Come one, kill one. Come two, kill a pair!
context: 来一个，杀一个。来两个，杀一双！

original_en: You are bloodthirsty, and they are looking for you to seek revenge, so you are naturally not afraid. What if they find me? Don't you worry?
context: 你嗜杀成性，他们找你寻仇，你自然不怕。若是找到我呢？你也不担心吗？

original_en: Kill them all and no one will seek revenge.
context: 杀光他们，就没人寻仇了。

original_en: You... well, you and I may not be suitable. When I'm not around in the future, you can do it yourself.
context: 你....唉，你我可能并不合适。日后我不在的时候，你好自为之吧。

original_en: If you don't agree with my idea, let's break the law.
context: 你若不赞同我的想法，我们就恩断义绝吧。

original_en: well.....
You don't have to be so decisive, I will definitely change it in the future.
context: 话不必如此决绝，日后我定当改过。

original_en: If you can really do this, it will be the blessing of martial arts, and also my blessing.
context: 你若真能如此，将是武林之福，也是我的福气。

original_en: I will definitely do less murder in the future.
context: 日后我定当稍少造杀孽。

original_en: You are my true love, how could I not worry about you.
context: 你是我的挚爱，我怎会不担心你。

original_en: If you really love me, you will have to forgive and forgive others in the future, so don't do more evil.
context: 你若是真的爱我，日后便得饶人处且饶人，少造些杀孽吧。

original_en: You are right, I will commit less murderous crimes in the future.
context: 你说得对，日后我定当少造杀孽。

original_en: That's all you're afraid of?
context: 只有这样就怕了？

original_en: You... well, that's all I have to say, so do it for yourself.
context: 你....唉，我言尽于此，你好自为之吧。

original_en: baffling.
context: 莫名其妙。

original_en: You are right. I did kill too much.
context: 你说的有理，我确实杀孽太重。

original_en: You and I are my best friends. There are some things that I have seen through my eyes, and I have to say them now.
context: 你我至交，有些事我看在眼里，时至今日已经不得不说了。

original_en: You and I are close friends, why can't we just say it?
context: 你我乃是至交，有什么不能直说呢？

original_en: There is a widespread rumor in the world that you are a murderer who kills innocent people indiscriminately. Many people with lofty ideals even want to get rid of you. If you continue to act like this, your life will be in danger.
context: 这江湖上如今盛传你是杀人狂魔，滥杀无辜。不少仁人志士甚至要将你除之而后快。你若继续如此行事，只怕性命堪忧。

original_en: My magical power is so great that these swarms of insects are nothing to worry about.
context: 我神功盖世，这群虫豸不足为虑。

original_en: It's easy to dodge an open spear, but it's hard to guard against a hidden arrow. Even if you are invincible, can you still prevent poisoning and assassination? Alas, I'll stop here. Just take care of yourself.
context: 明枪易躲，暗箭难防。你纵是天下无敌又能防得住下毒暗害吗？唉，我言尽于此，你好自为之吧。

original_en: Repeat it again, I am invincible.
context: 再重复一遍，我天下无敌。

original_en: You're right, I did kill too many people.
context: 你说得对，我确实杀孽过重。

original_en: You can think so. As your friend, I am very happy.
context: 你能如此想，作为你的朋友，我十分欢喜。

original_en: If it's hard to speak, then don't say it.
context: 既然难以开口，那就不要说了。

original_en: Well, then you can do it yourself.
context: 唉，那你好自为之吧。

original_en: You and I are blood relatives. Seeing you killing so much, I can't help but worry about you.
context: 你我是骨肉血亲，见你杀戮至此，不由得为你担心。

original_en: Well? We are close relatives, so why can't we just talk about it?
context: 恩？我们是骨肉至亲，有什么不能直说呢。

original_en: I don't know since when, you have repeatedly committed crimes. I often hear people talk about you killing innocent people indiscriminately. In my memory, you should not be such a person...
context: 不知从何时起，你屡造杀孽，我时常听人说起你滥杀无辜。在我的记忆中你不该是这样的人......

original_en: I have become like this...
context: 我竟变成如此模样.....

original_en: I heard that many people with lofty ideals in the world are eager to take a chance on you and want to kill you to make your name famous. As your closest flesh and blood relative,
context: 闻说江湖上不少仁人志士，都要对你跃跃欲试，想要杀你扬名。我作为你的血肉至亲，

original_en: Although I was at fault, they dared to plot to kill me! Damn it!
context: 我虽有过错，但他们竟敢谋划杀我！真是该死！

original_en: Oh, just a word from me has made you murderous again, that's all, just take care of yourself.
context: 唉，只是我的一句话，你就又起了杀心，罢了，你好自为之吧。

original_en: Am I wrong? They deserve to die!
context: 难道我说的不对吗？他们真是该死！

original_en: I just wish I could turn around now, in time.
context: 只希望我此刻回头，还算及时。

original_en: You can think so. As your blood relative, I am very happy.
context: 你能如此想，作为你的血亲，我十分欢喜。

original_en: You misremembered, that's how I am!
context: 是你记错了，我就是这样！

original_en: Even if you are a close relative, please do not point fingers at my behavior.
context: 即使是骨肉至亲，也不要对我的行为指手画脚。

original_en: Recently I heard that there is a murderer in the world who kills innocent people indiscriminately and is a bloodthirsty maniac. Is that you?
context: 最近听闻江湖上出了一个滥杀无辜嗜血成性的杀人狂，那人就是你么？

original_en: What if it is? What if it isn't?
context: 是有如何？不是又如何？

original_en: Recently, people with lofty ideals in the world, everyone wants to kill you and then hurry up. Although everyone says that you kill innocent people indiscriminately, I feel that there is no end to the sea of suffering. If you can stop killing now, you can also accumulate some blessings for the future.
context: 最近江湖上的仁人志士，人人欲杀你而后快。虽然大家都说你滥杀无辜，但我觉得苦海无涯回头是岸，你若是能此刻停下杀手，也能为将来积累几份福缘。

original_en: It's a joke. This world is a killing ground. You kill me and I kill you. How can you be innocent?
context: 笑话，这江湖本就是杀场，你杀我，我杀你，哪来的无辜？

original_en: Hey, you're stubborn, so take care of yourself.
context: 唉，冥顽不灵，那你好自为之吧。

original_en: What you said makes sense. I will do my best to kill as little as possible in the future.
context: 你说的倒有几分道理，我日后便尽量少作杀孽吧。

original_en: It is a blessing for the world and the common people that you can think so.
context: 你能如此想，是江湖之幸，苍生之幸。

original_en: There was a person in front of me who was walking in a hurry and accidentally bumped into you.
context: 前方一人行路匆忙，一不小心撞在你身上。

original_en: Sorry, sorry, I was walking in a hurry and accidentally bumped into you.
context: 抱歉抱歉，我走的匆忙，一不小心撞到你身上。

original_en: Don't you have eyes when you walk? (Reprimand)
context: 走路不长眼睛吗？（训斥）

original_en: I'm really sorry. I'll pay you the 500 yuan.
context: 实在抱歉，这500钱算我赔给你的。

original_en: That's pretty much it. Please be more careful in the future. (Take the money)
context: 这还差不多，以后注意点。（收下钱）

original_en: I still have something important to do, so I'll leave first and talk about it later when we have a chance.
context: 在下尚有要事，先行离开，有缘再叙。

original_en: Is this money just like a waste of money? (Asking for more compensation)
context: 这点钱就像打发我？（要求更多赔偿）

original_en: Well, let's add 500 more and compensate you 1,000. How about that?
context: 这，好吧，再加500，赔你1000钱，如此可好？

original_en: That's pretty much it!
context: 这还差不多！

original_en: Forget it, you'd better hand over all the money!
context: 算了，你还是把钱全都交出来吧！

original_en: Well, I didn't want to bump into a strong man! Come on, I want to see how many tricks you have to rob me.
context: 这，不想竟撞了一个强人！来来来，我倒要看看你有多少手段，能劫我的道。

original_en: Let's take action.
context: 出手吧。

original_en: Smile slightly to show it's okay. (Friendly)
context: 微微一笑，表示没关系。（友善）

original_en: Recently, a martial arts master was explaining the essence of martial arts. I went out late, so I was faster, and accidentally bumped into you, knight. This money is my apology, and I hope you will include it.
context: 最近有一位武林高手正在讲解武学精要，我出门晚些，故而速度快些，不小心撞到侠士你。这些钱是我的赔礼，万望包含。

original_en: I accepted it with a happy smile, which means it's a trivial matter.
context: 欣然笑纳，表示小事一桩。

original_en: It's just a trivial matter, why give me money? Just go and do it.
context: 区区小事，何必给钱，赶紧去吧。

original_en: There are many knights, but I still have something urgent to do. Let's talk about it later when we have time.
context: 侠士大人大量，在下尚有急事，有缘再叙。

original_en: I heard someone say that you have some poisonous insects on your hands. I wonder if you would be willing to part with them and sell them to me?
context: 我听人说，你手头有些蛊虫，不知你可愿割爱，将它卖我？

original_en: It's useless anyway. If you want to buy it, I'll sell it to you.
context: 反正无用，你愿买便卖给你了。

original_en: That's very good. I wonder if you have those Gu insects that you can sell to me.
context: 如此甚好，不知你有那些蛊虫可以卖我。

original_en: Lampbug.
context: 灯虫。

original_en: Oh! This is the lampworm! I'm willing to give you 500 yuan for this insect.
context: 哦哦！这就是灯虫没错！这只虫我愿给你500钱。

original_en: Reasonable price.
context: 价格公道。

original_en: You buy and I sell, it's just a transaction.
context: 你买我卖，交易而已。

original_en: The deal is done, we'll see you later.
context: 买卖已成，后会有期。

original_en: I see that you are also interested in Gu Insects. If you want to use Gu Insects, you must cooperate with the corresponding martial arts. If you are interested in the way of Gu Insects, you can go to Longji Mountain to have a look. Farewell.
context: 我见你似乎也对蛊虫感兴趣，想要使用蛊虫必须要配合对应的武功才行。你若是对蛊虫之道感兴趣，可以去龙脊山看看。告辞。

original_en: I don't want to sell it.
context: 不愿卖了。

original_en: Love bug.
context: 情虫。
