original_en: Oh! This is a love bug! I'm willing to give you 500 dollars for this bug.
context: 哦哦！这就是情虫没错！这只虫我愿给你500钱。

original_en: Bloodworm.
context: 血虫。

original_en: Oh! This is indeed a blood worm! I am willing to give you 500 yuan for this worm.
context: 哦哦！这就是血虫没错！这只虫我愿给你500钱。

original_en: Extinct insect.
context: 绝虫。

original_en: Oh! This is the absolute insect! I am willing to give you 500 yuan for this insect.
context: 哦哦！这就是绝虫没错！这只虫我愿给你500钱。

original_en: I need these Gu worms too.
context: 我也需要这些蛊虫。

original_en: In that case, I won't force you.
context: 既然如此，在下也不强求。

original_en: If you don't want to sell, just let it go. See you later. Goodbye.
context: 不愿意卖就算了，后会有期，告辞。

original_en: Sir, do you know where there is a City God's Temple nearby?
context: 这位侠士，你可知这附近哪里有城隍庙？

original_en: What are you looking for at the City God's Temple?
context: 你要找城隍庙作甚？

original_en: To be honest, things have not been going well for me recently, and I seem to be suffering from bad luck. So I plan to go to the Chenghuang Temple to worship the gods and see if I can get better luck.
context: 实不相瞒，我最近诸事不顺，似乎沾染了厄运。所以打算找个城隍庙拜拜神仙，看看能否转运。

original_en: So that's it.
context: 原来是这样。

original_en: It feels like it must be the people from Jiulang Cave. Forget it, it's useless to say more. I'll continue to look for the City God's Temple.
context: 感觉肯定是九狼窟那些人做的，算了，多说无益，我继续去找城隍庙了。

original_en: Don't believe it, I heard that there is a Nine Wolf Cave, and the sect stationed there specializes in this kind of Kung Fu. Maybe I was manipulated by them. You have to be careful too. I won't say anymore, I will go find it first. It’s the City God’s Temple.
context: 你别不信，听说有个九狼窟，驻扎在那里面的门派就专门钻研这种功夫。我说不定就是被他们动了手脚。你也要小心呀。不说了，我先去寻城隍庙了。

original_en: Misfortune? Is there any skill in this world that can control luck?
context: 厄运？这世上竟有能掌控运势的功夫吗？

original_en: I don't know. Goodbye.
context: 不知道，告辞。

original_en: Alas, there is no Chenghuang Temple.
context: 唉，到底哪有城隍庙呀。

original_en: Singing loudly and wildly after drinking,\\nDon't think about the business in front of the door.\\nIt's as if the head of the small household wakes up first,\\nDon't stay in the drunken country for a long time.
context: 酒后高歌且放狂，\\n门前闲事莫思量。\\n犹嫌小户长先醒，\\n不得多时住醉乡。

original_en: Hahaha, drink, come again, burp~~have another drink!
context: 哈哈哈，喝喝，再来，嗝~~再来一杯！

original_en: Your Excellency drank too much.
context: 阁下喝的太多了。

original_en: I don't know who said that to me. You and I are all of the same philosophy. Even if you know how to drink wine, don't dissuade the person who raised the glass, hahaha.
context: 我道是谁说我，你我都是同道中人，即知酒中意，莫劝举杯人呀哈哈哈。

original_en: Your Excellency seems to know a lot about wine.
context: 阁下似乎对酒了解颇深。

original_en: Hahaha, since you know the location of Zuixian Lake, you naturally understand why I drink and sing wildly. This wine is given to you, and you and I have known each other. If there is a chance in the future, we will talk about it over a cup. Please.
context: 哈哈哈，你既然知道醉仙湖所在，自然了解我为何痛饮狂歌，这坛酒送你，你我就算认识了。日后若有机会，杯中再叙。请了。

original_en: Hahaha, you don't know something. There is a Drunk Immortal Lake in this world. The lake is full of drunks, and they have learned a set of martial arts from it, which is extremely powerful. If you are interested, you can go and have a look.
context: 哈哈哈，你有所不知，这世上有座醉仙湖，湖边满是醉客，更从中习得一套武学，威力不凡。你若有兴趣，可前往一观。

original_en: Taking wine into martial arts is really cool and heroic.
context: 以酒入武，真是潇洒豪迈。

original_en: Alas, there is no Chenghuang Temple. Where are you from, drunkard? Go away, go away.
context: 哪来的酒鬼，快滚快滚。

original_en: Raise a glass to invite the bright moon, burp, and form three pairs of shadows.
context: 举杯邀明月，嗝，对影成三人。

original_en: Raise a glass to invite the bright moon, burp, and form three pairs of shadows. Unexpectedly, a cold light shot out of the window, and you quickly grabbed a stone on the ground and threw it out. With a crack, the stone shattered, and the cold light hit you three feet in front of you.
context: 冷不防一道寒芒从窗外激射而来，你赶忙抓起地上一个石子甩手丢出，只听噼啪一响，石子破碎，而那道袭来的寒光正巧落在你身前三尺之处。

original_en: Hidden weapon?! Who is it? Come out sneakily!
context: 暗器？！是谁，偷偷摸摸，出来！

original_en: You exclaimed and looked around, seeing a mysterious black shadow flashing in the distance.
context: 你惊呼一声，环视四周，远处神秘黑影一闪即逝。

original_en: Is there a note on this?
context: 这上面有张纸条？

original_en: Open the note.
context: 打开纸条。

original_en: You picked up the note and unfolded it. All you saw was a dense collection of small words. You were dazzled by it, so you folded it and planned to throw it away. But after folding, these small words actually formed a new text.
context: 你捡起纸条，舒展开来。只见上书密密麻麻一片小字，你看的眼花，便随手一折打算丢掉。可折叠过后，这些小字竟组成了新的文字。

original_en: Come and talk about Zhuxiangtan...
context: 来竹香潭一叙....

original_en: Turn over the folded paper, and you will see a map made of small characters. The location pointed on the map is Zhuxiangtan.
context: 再将折叠后的纸条翻面，赫然是一张由小字构成的地图。而地图上指引的位置，正是竹香潭。

original_en: If you send out an invitation in this way, is it worthy of being said to be a sect that uses hidden weapons?
context: 用这种方式发出邀请，该说不愧是使用暗器的门派吗？

original_en: Hmm? People from Zhuxiangtan? There must be some fraud!
context: 恩？竹香潭之人？必定有诈！

original_en: You didn't touch the note. After three breaths, the paper spontaneously ignited without fire, and the concealed weapon that was sent with it burned into a ball of ashes.
context: 你没有触碰那张纸条，三息之后，那纸竟无火自燃，连带着送它来的暗器一起，烧成了一团灰烬。

original_en: The roads in Jianghu are dangerous and cannot be guarded against.
context: 江湖路险，防不胜防呀。

original_en: You're walking so fast! Damn it! (Exit Event)
context: 走的好快！可恶！（退出事件）

original_en: You look livid, why are you infected with poisonous miasma?
context: 面色铁青，你怎么染了一身毒瘴？

original_en: Accidentally contracted a poisonous miasma.
context: 不小心染上毒瘴。

original_en: If you have nothing important to do, you should quickly find some antidote pills to prevent this miasma from entering your body and leaving hidden illnesses. I still have something important to do, and I will see you later.
context: 你若无要事，便赶紧寻些解毒丹药，免得被这瘴气入体，留下隐疾。我尚有要事，后会有期。

original_en: Thank you, see you later.
context: 多谢，后会有期。

original_en: If you have nothing important to do, quickly find some antidote pills to prevent this miasma from entering your body and leaving behind hidden diseases. I heard that there is a place in the rivers and lakes called Netherworld Valley, where there is a way to avoid poison and use it. You If you are interested, you can go and have a look.
context: 你若无要事，便赶紧寻些解毒丹药，免得被这瘴气入体，留下隐疾。我听闻这江湖上有一处名叫幽冥谷的所在，其中有避毒用毒的法门，你若有兴趣，可前往一探。

original_en: I have something important going on, so I can't say more.
context: 有要事在身，不便多说。

original_en: In this case, I can't take care of it. Please be more careful. I have important things to do. I'll see you later.
context: 既然如此，那我也不便多管。你多加小心，我尚有要事，后会有期了。

original_en: I have something important to attend to. I will leave first and see you later.
context: 我尚有要事，先行离去，后会有期。

original_en: I have something important to attend to. I will leave first and see you later. I heard that you have recently acquired a divine weapon and have nothing to do recently. I brought some wine to celebrate for you. Come on, come on, don't come back until you're drunk today!
context: 听闻你最近得了一件神兵利器，近日正巧无事，带了些酒来，为你庆祝。来来来，今日不醉不归！

original_en: It's rare to meet friends, so I'll have a big drink with you today.
context: 难得朋友相会，今日便与你痛饮一番。

original_en: Hahaha, okay, okay, cheers, cheers!
context: 哈哈哈，好好好，干杯，干杯！

original_en: Get drunk before you rest.
context: 一醉方休。

original_en: You had a hearty drink with your close friends and had a great conversation. After the excitement is over, bow your hand and leave.
context: 你与至交好友痛饮一番，相谈甚欢。待兴尽之后，拱手而别。

original_en: Farewell for now, I'll see you later.
context: 暂且别过，后会有期。

original_en: I have something important to attend to. I will take note of this meal for now and drink it in my spare time.
context: 我尚有要事，这顿酒暂且记下，闲暇之时再饮。

original_en: Oh, it's a pity that it should be like this. Take this jar of wine with you, even if you and I have drunk it.
context: 唉，竟然如此，那实在可惜。这坛酒你拿去带上，就算是你我饮过了。

original_en: If there is a chance, I will definitely get drunk with you.
context: 若有机会，定要与你一醉方休。

original_en: Why are you lying here. . .
context: 怎么倒在这里了。。。

original_en: I am incapacitated, and a kind passerby, {0}{1}, brought me to the clinic.
context: 我失去了行为能力，路过的好心人{0}{1}可怜我，送我去医馆。

original_en: Haha, another unlucky guy! !
context: 嘿嘿，又一个倒霉蛋！！

original_en: I am incapacitated, and {0}{1} took advantage of the situation and looted me.
context: 我失去了行为能力，{0}{1}竟然趁机搜刮我。

original_en: This Xiashi, I have long heard the rumors of your chivalrous name circulating among the people in the Jianghu. Today, I realized that the rumors are true.
context: 这位侠士，早就听江湖同道盛传你的侠名，今日一见方知传言不虚。

original_en: Friend, why are you here?
context: 朋友此来，所为何事？

original_en: To be honest, in recent days, there has been a vicious thief in the Jianghu who has destroyed humanity. I originally intended to eliminate harm to the people, but I didn't want my skills to be inferior to my passion, and instead, I was hurt by him. At the moment of distress, upon hearing your chivalrous name, I spared no effort to come and search for it.
context: 实不相瞒，近些日子江湖上出了一名灭绝人性的恶贼。我本想为民除害，却不想技不如热， 反被他所伤。正苦恼之际听得阁下之侠名，便不辞辛苦前来找寻。

original_en: If this person seriously commits many evil deeds, I will definitely eliminate harm for the people.
context: 此人若当真作恶多端，我定会为民除害。

original_en: This person is making waves in the Jianghu and does all kinds of evil. If I have a half empty sentence, begging heaven and man to kill together, I will not pass away.
context: 此人在江湖上兴风作浪，无恶不为。我若有半句虚言，乞请天人共戮，不得往生。

original_en: Since that is the case, it is incumbent on our heroes.
context: 既然如此，我辈侠士义不容辞。

original_en: This person has excellent martial arts skills, and you should be extremely careful. This money is a token of my gratitude. Please accept it.
context: 此人武艺高强，阁下要万万小心。这些钱算是我的一点心意，请阁下务必收下。

original_en: {0}{1}Tell me that there has been a wicked person in the Jianghu who has destroyed humanity. Upon hearing this, I decided to go and eliminate harm for the people.
context: {0}{1}告诉我江湖上出了个灭绝人性的恶人，我听闻此事便决定前往为民除害。

original_en: Accepted the task of Wen Min's pest control.
context: 接受了文敏除害的任务。

original_en: I'll go too.
context: 我去也。

original_en: Seeing is believing, hearing is believing. If I encounter you, it's not too late to start again.
context: 眼见为实，耳听为虚，若被我遇见再动手不迟。

original_en: Alas, I don't know when we can eliminate such a great disaster in the Jianghu.
context: 唉，如此江湖大害，不知何时才能清除。

original_en: I have no intention of getting involved in the grudges of the Jianghu.
context: 江湖恩怨，我实在无意涉足。

original_en: Oh, in that case, I can only think of another way. Farewell.
context: 唉，既然如此，在下只能另想办法了。告辞。

original_en: There is still something important to attend to, so we cannot accompany you. Don't take it amiss.
context: 尚有要事在身，不能奉陪，切勿见怪。

original_en: I must have gone to uphold chivalry and righteousness, truly worthy of my chivalrous reputation.
context: 定是要行侠仗义去了，当真不愧侠名呀。

original_en: The master's decree is given; kneel in submission, [Cultivator].
context: 主人有命，【耕夫】跪迎。

original_en: ? ? ? Who are you? Master? Cultivator? ! !
context: ？？？你们是谁？主人？！耕夫？！！

original_en: Hum? Forget your identity and fail to recognize us. Master is right. Something is amiss.
context: 嗯？忘却身份，不认得我等元神附体，看来主人所料不错，它确实出了问题。

original_en: How did this happen? I've lost control of my body. . . ! ! !
context: 怎么会？！身体不受控制了。。。！！！

original_en: Master's decree still stands. [Cultivator], kneel and accept it.
context: 主人法旨依旧有效，【耕夫】跪拜接旨吧。

original_en: [Master? ? ? What's wrong with my body? !]
context: 【主人？？？我的身体到底怎么了？！】

original_en: Order has been established, and the higher power approves it.
context: 乾坤有序，上主钦之。

original_en: [What's happening? I've lost control of my body, and their intentions... The pressure is unbearable, and I can't escape! ]
context: 【究竟发生何事？！身体不受控制，他们究竟要做什么，恐怖的压力，挣脱不开！】

original_en: Let me go!
context: 放...放开..放开我！

original_en: He dares not kneel and accept the Master's decree. Clearly, something has gone awry. Enough! The Dao is extinguished and severed from the realm of immortals. Rejecting the decree thrice incurs punishment. All beings must submit.
context: 主人法旨都敢不静心跪迎，看来当真是坏了。罢了！一敕不降,道灭于无，二敕不降，道绝于仙，三敕不降，斩首献天，上主号令，众生降服。

original_en: [Ahhhhhh! ! ! Ow! ! ! ]
context: 【啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊~~！！！好痛！！！】

original_en: Ahh! Ahh!
[Cultivator], obey!
context: 【耕夫】听令！

original_en: [Why does my body feel so filled with fear? What's happening? Ah! My body, out of control... Who are they? ]
context: 【为何，身体似乎在恐惧！这，究竟，啊啊！身体，不受控制，这，他们究竟是谁！】

original_en: Oh... Yes... I obey!
As per the code, [Cultivator] has erred. The higher power bestows grace, offering minor punishment for a major lesson. If this happens again, this realm will cease to exist.
context: 奉法典，【耕夫】行错，上主垂恩，开海眼净世，小惩大诫。如若再犯，此界不存。

original_en: [! ! ! My body won't stop trembling... Fear... Higher power... These words weigh on me like an unbearable burden, as if my bones are about to break. ]
context: 【！！！身体止不住的颤抖~~！恐惧，上主，仅仅是这两个字就让我的身体如临重压，骨骼都要碎裂。】

original_en: Humph! [Cultivator], your actions led to our Master's anger. Consider yourself spared for now, or your soul will face eternal silence. Hah, this Cage Formation is just the start. All you possess will be cleansed in this downpour, and you'd better reflect on your mistakes as oblivion draws near. After a century, forget everything and start anew.
context: 哼！小小【耕夫】竟敢越矩行事，引得我等被主人怪罪，若非你还有用处，定要让你万世沉沦，神魂永寂。呵，这天罗地网樊笼法阵，只是开始，你的一切都将再这雨中被冲刷干净，于逐渐到来的遗忘之中好好忏悔你的错误，待百年之后，忘记一切，再度“耕耘”吧！

original_en: [What is happening? What foul sorcery is this? !]
context: 【这到底是怎么了？这是什么邪法！！】

original_en: I... I will follow the decree.
context: 谨..谨遵法旨。

original_en: For millennia, [Cultivator] never strayed from the path. I'm not sure why it suddenly went out of control. Well, let's wait another century. It'll still serve its purpose as a valuable 'tool.'
context: 千万年来【耕夫】从未出过偏差，不知它为何突然脱离掌控。罢了，不过再等百年而已，百年之后，它依旧是一个好用的“工具”。

original_en: Farewell, Venerables.
context: 恭送尊者

original_en: The oppressive aura is gone. Have they left? !
context: 压迫的气息消失了，他们走了吗？！

original_en: Cultivator, Master, Venerables, the Cage formation...
context: 耕夫，主人，尊者，天罗地网樊笼法阵.....

original_en: I had just become the Champion, believing I could unravel all its mysteries. Then, two Venerables emerged, throwing everything into chaos.
context: 刚刚成为武林盟主，本以为可以揭开一切迷雾，却不想两位自称“尊者”的怪人出现，又将事情拉向一个失去控制的深渊。

original_en: Hum? The weather has changed? !
context: 嗯？！天色变了？！

original_en: I have heard that you are a master of apricot trees, and today I see that you are extraordinary.
context: 早闻阁下是杏林高手，今日一见神采不凡。

original_en: People do not say hidden words, I have not been healed by a famous doctor earlier, and now the illness has become hidden disease, I wonder if you can show a good hand to treat the hidden disease in the next meridian. If he can help, there will be a good reward.
context: 明人不说暗话，我早前暗伤未有名医治愈，如今沉疴变为隐疾，不知阁下能否一展妙手，治疗在下经脉中的隐疾。若能施救，定有厚报。

original_en: Try your best.
context: 尽力一试。

original_en: Guiding the true Qi, healing.
context: 引导真气，进行治疗。

original_en: You feel a burning sensation in the other person's meridians, which is clearly a fire poison entering the body.
context: 你感受到对方经脉之中有灼热之感，显然是火毒入体。

original_en: Jinpin Du Gong, guide Qi and blood, eliminate fire poison!
context: 金针渡穴功，引导气血，消除火毒！

original_en: You move the inner strength, the golden needle crosses the point, and within a few breaths you fill the big points of your body with gold needles. The excited blood, like a millstone, completely dissipates the poison of the fire.
context: 你运起内劲，金针渡穴，几个呼吸之间便以金针刺满其周身大穴。被激发的血气恍若磨盘，将那火毒彻底消磨干净。

original_en: Good fortune does not disgrace fate.
context: 幸不辱命。

original_en: Saving a life is like remaking it, and your healer graciously obeys me.
context: 救命之恩，如同再造，阁下医者仁心情受我一拜。

original_en: Get up quickly!
context: 快快请起！

original_en: I remember your grace in my heart. Please do accept these things.
context: 阁下之恩，在下铭记于心。这些东西请您务必收下。

original_en: The disease is gone, and the whole body is free and unrestrained!
context: 一身隐疾已去，浑身畅快再不受拘束了！

original_en: What happened to the good news?
context: 说好的厚报呢？

original_en: Easy tendons by pushing tendons to change pulse, discharge fire poison!
context: 易筋经推筋改脉，排出火毒！

original_en: You move the inner strength, easy muscle Jingtang Huangzhuang is the internal force of the flow of its body, the hidden fire poison along your guidance, all the way to the fingertips, you gently stroke, the fingertips break a small mouth, with the hot black blood dripping to the ground, the fire poison has been all you cleared. With the removal of the fire poison your internal forces have improved.
context: 你运起内劲，易筋经堂皇庄正之内力流转其身，那隐疾火毒顺着你的导引，一路来到指尖，你轻轻一划，将其指尖破开一个小口，随着炙热的黑血滴落在地，火毒已经被你全部清除了。随着火毒的清除没你的内力也有所提升。

original_en: Dark fire jacking heart work operation, absorb fire strength!
context: 玄火劫心功运转，吸纳火劲！

original_en: The deep fire is aroused by you, the same origin force like whales and beasts into the sea, siphon heaven and earth, and the fire poison is absorbed and assimilated by you in an instant, but it enhances your internal force cultivation.
context: 玄火劫心功被你催发 出来，同源之力如鲸兽入海，虹吸天地，那火毒不过顷刻之间就被你吸收同化，反而增进了你的内力修为。

original_en: Ice formula with cold fire, clean fire poison.
context: 寒冰诀以寒克火，涤净火毒。

original_en: Feel the little heat in its meridians, the ice formula in your body runs up with your idea, and the cool feeling flows into its whole body meridians, and the ignition poison cannot compete with your true gas, and it disappears in a flash. You feel your internal forces rise.
context: 感受到其经脉中的点点热力，你体内的寒冰诀随你一个念头运转起来，丝丝凉意流入其周身经脉之中，那一点火毒根本无法与你的真气抗衡，转瞬之间消弭于无。你感受到你的内力有所提升。

original_en: No intention to rescue.
context: 无意施救。

original_en: Alas, I do not know when this disease will be cured.
context: 可惜，我这隐疾不知何时才能治愈。

original_en: I see that you are full of anger, blood fury naturally, but it is different from killing, and it is very similar to the legendary people who practice the extinction of the sword.
context: 我观阁下一身戾气，血煞之意自然而发，却又不同于杀气，到是与传说之中修习灭绝剑法之人十分相像。

original_en: It is the extermination of the sword. What do you think?
context: 正是灭绝剑法，不知阁下有何见教？

original_en: To practice this method of destroying the sword, you need to have unfeeling and unrighteousness, and you need to nourish the sword with hatred. If this continues, it will surely bite you back.
context: 修习这灭绝剑法，需得绝情断义，又要以恨意养剑，长此以往，必将受其反噬。

original_en: Your Excellency seems to hate to know about the exterminating sword.
context: 阁下似乎恨了解灭绝剑剑法。

original_en: Alas, at that time, there was a peerless sword, since the number of seven feelings sword, sword skill is almost superior to the Tao. But one day I crossed the sea in the merchant ship, and never came back, leaving only a book of seven feelings sword.
context: 唉，当年有一位绝代剑者，自号七情剑子，剑艺高超几近于道。却有一日乘那商船渡海而去，再没回来，仅留下一本七情剑谱流传江湖。

original_en: The sword of Seven Emotions? ! Is it true?
context: 七情剑谱？！莫非？

original_en: Yes, your practice of exterminating the sword is one of them, another name is the sword of hatred among the seven emotions.
context: 不错，你修习的灭绝剑法，便是其中的一支，别号绝剑，乃是七情之中的恨绝之剑。

original_en: The absolute sword? What are the other six swords?
context: 绝剑吗？另外六种剑法是什么？

original_en: When the sword son took the boat and went away, the rivers and lakes set off a lot of waves for the sword spectrum. They turn on each other, they turn on each other, they start a bloody war. Five of the seven swords are missing in the battle, and only the sword of love is spread.
context: 当年剑子乘舟而去，江湖之上为夺剑谱掀起了不少风波。亲朋反目，手足相残，造下一场血劫。七情剑中有五剑在争夺之中下落不明，唯有情剑绝剑流传江湖。

original_en: What happened after that?
context: 之后的事情呢？

original_en: In that year, after the blood robbery in the river and lake, the sword was obtained by a beggar son, the man lost his mother and was humiliated by the high door, and after the chance to get the sword, he realized the secret of it in just a few days, and one sword will not leave the chickens and dogs killed by the high door who humiliated him.
context: 当年那场江湖血劫之后，绝剑被一乞儿所得，那人自幼丧母又被高门羞辱，机缘之下得了那绝剑之后竟短短数日便明了其中关窍，一人一剑将羞辱他的高门大户杀的鸡犬不留。

original_en: Really good kill!
context: 当真杀的痛快！

original_en: If that's all there is to it, there is still room for him, but he's obsessed with the art of swordplay, killing demons, and where he goes, there's a new bloodbath.
context: 若只是如此，江湖尚有他容身之所，但他痴迷剑艺，弑杀成魔，所行之处尸横遍野，再起一场血雨腥风。

original_en: Have you been affected by kung Fu?
context: 竟被一门功夫影响了心性吗？

original_en: You have learned a swordsmanship, and if you want to kill creatures and keep swords, as time goes on, you will kill like grass, if it has no effect on your mind, how can it be possible?
context: 你学了一门剑法，要你杀生养剑，日子长了，你杀人如草芥，若说对心性无所影响，怎有可能。

original_en: And then what happened?
context: 那后来呢？

original_en: The sword of seven emotions was invincible in the world at that time, and the sword that was left was also a peerless and matchless move. original_en: Although you have good efforts, I am not a small door and small households in Zhuxiangtan.
context: 阁下虽然功夫不错，但我竹香潭也不是小门小户，阁下莫要自误。

original_en: Come to the lingering and go, don't give some compensation to the past? (Call for compensation)
context: 召之即来挥之即去，不给些补偿说得过去？（索取补偿）

original_en: My Zhuxiangtan ....
context: 我竹香潭....

original_en: That person still wants to say again, sweeping your cold eyebrows, shivering in a moment, and then stretched his hands into the cuffs.
context: 那人还欲再说，被你冷眉一扫，霎时打了个寒颤，随后将手伸进袖口摸索起来。

original_en: Today's matter, give some money, and forgive you.
context: 今日之事，给些钱财，便饶了你。

original_en: With your request, the man touched it for a long time and handed it up what you needed.
context: 得了你的要求，那人这才窸窸窣窣摸了半天，将你所需要的东西递了上来。

original_en: This person's strength was so horrible that he really looked away.
context: 此人实力竟恐怖如斯，当真是看走了眼。

original_en: Oh, it's interesting, roll it.
context: 呵，还算识趣，滚吧。

original_en: Money is useless to me, take some elixir out.
context: 金钱于我无用，拿些丹药出来吧。

original_en: This time it is just a lesson, and I will mess with me next time, and you want you to look good. (Just leave here)
context: 这次只是教训，下次再惹到我头上，要你好看。（就此离开）

original_en: What I want to do is for the idea of the thought. (Sad it)
context: 我所想所做，是为念头通达。（将其打晕）

original_en: If you dare to do it, Zhuxiangtan will definitely not let you go!
context: 你若敢肆意妄为，竹香潭定然不会放过你！

original_en: Hum, the dog's eyes look low, this time is just a lesson, leave.
context: 哼，狗眼看人低，这次只是个教训，告辞。

original_en: Quickly report this matter, and some people sprinkle the wild in Zhuxiangtan!
context: 速将此事禀报掌门，竟有人在我竹香潭撒野！

original_en: Oh, a great tone before, it turned out to be a gun head.
context: 呵，之前好大的口气，原来是个镴枪头。

original_en: It's not an opponent.
context: 竟然不是对手。

original_en: Interrupted your legs just a small punishment! Fast rolling, it has not stained the Feng Shui of Zhuxiangtan.
context: 打断你的腿只是小小惩戒！快滚快滚，莫污了我竹香潭的风水。

original_en: Abominable, write down this revenge, report it later!
context: 可恶，此仇暂且记下，容后再报！

original_en: The three -day period has arrived. I wonder how you investigate?
context: 三日期限已经到了，不知你调查的如何？

original_en: Indeed.
context: 确实有所收获。

original_en: That person is a man or a woman, can there be information?
context: 那人是男是女，可有情报？

original_en: It's a man, wearing night clothes.
context: 是个男子，穿夜行衣出没。

original_en: What is that person's figure, fat or thin?
context: 那人身形如何，是胖是瘦？

original_en: Say it is obese, but the movement is convenient.
context: 说是身材肥胖，但动作灵便。

original_en: What is that person's means? Can you evaluate its strength?
context: 那人手段如何？对其实力可有评估？

original_en: Listening to others, at least a disciple of inner door, it can be not bad.
context: 听人所说，至少是个内门弟子，能为不差。

original_en: The above information, thank you for informing. This money is rewarded, and you accept it. If there are follow -up, I will notify you again.
context: 以上情报，多谢告知。这些钱算是报酬，你且收下。若有后续，我会再通知你。

original_en: It's very clumsy, you should just get started.
context: 无比笨拙，应该刚刚入门。（编造消息，欺瞒对方）

original_en: Answer truthfully, there is no news.
context: 如实回答，没有消息。

original_en: The body is weak and tall, and the movement is slow. (Taking a message, deceiving the other party)
context: 身材纤弱高挑，动作迟缓。（编造消息，欺瞒对方）

original_en: Yes, the woman is handsome. (Bullying the other party)
context: 是的女的，容貌俊美。（欺瞒对方）

original_en: Yes, the woman is handsome. (Broken news, bully the other party)
context: 是的女的，容貌俊美。（编造消息，欺瞒对方）

original_en: Nothing ...
context: 一无所获.....

original_en: Time is urgent, you don't know much about the cause and consequences, and you are expected to have nothing. You can get this money, which is a compensation for your hard work. Say.
context: 时间紧迫，你对前因后果了解不多，一无所获也在预料之内。这些钱你拿去，算是对你这段时间辛苦的补偿。告辞了。

original_en: You sleep together with your pet, but its large body clearly doesn't fit well on a human bed. You find yourself squeezed into a corner, struggling to fall asleep.
context: 你与你的宠物睡在一起，显然它庞大的身躯不太适合人类的床铺。你被挤在了一个角落，勉强入眠。

original_en: I'll make do.
context: 将就一下吧。

original_en: It seems happy by your side. Your bond is strengthened.
context: 有你的陪伴，它显得十分开心，与你的牵绊也加深了。

original_en: This companionship can be a little challenging.
context: 这样的陪伴，稍微有些辛苦。

original_en: Cuddling your pet in bed, you drift off into sleep.
context: 你抱着你的宠物躺到床上，相拥而眠。

original_en: You had a good night's sleep.
context: 一夜好眠。

original_en: Time to get up.
context: 如此便好，该起床了。

original_en: Gazing at the person next to you, you're lost in a daze.
context: 一夜之后，看着枕边人，你的神情一阵恍惚。

original_en: Last night, I... (Shared an intimate night)
I've shamed myself with this forbidden tryst.
context: 人伦有悖，耻于江湖。

original_en: What have I done? !
context: 我，怎能如此？！

original_en: What have you done to me? How can I face others now?
context: 你竟对我做下这等事来，让我如何出去见人。

original_en: Ahh! Ahhhhhh! ! !
context: 啊啊啊！！啊啊啊啊啊啊啊！！！

original_en: Nothing happened last night. You had a good night's sleep.
context: 昨夜无事发生，一夜好眠。

original_en: In the past there were flourishing youths, Anling and Longyang. \\nLike peach and plum blossoms, vivid and radiant. \\nJoyful as fresh spring, delicate as autumn frost. \\nElegance sparkles in bright eyes, fragrance blooms in sweet words. \\nHand in hand we join in love, sharing the same quilt. \\nMay we be birds flying wing to wing, soaring the skies together. \\nVows of love written in cinnabar, never to be forgotten.
context: 昔日繁华子，安陵与龙阳。\\n夭夭桃李花，灼灼有辉光。\\n悦怿若九春，磬折似秋霜。\\n明眸发姿媚，言笑吐芬芳。\\n携手等欢爱，夙昔同衾裳。\\n愿为双飞鸟，比翼共翱翔。\\n丹青著明誓，永世不相忘。

original_en: As scenes from last night flood back, thoughts race through your mind.
context: 恍惚过后，昨夜一切接踵而来，你看着眼前一切，心中思绪万千。

original_en: How could I have done this? !
context: 我怎能这样？！

original_en: How could I have fallen so low? I must get up and leave right away.
context: 我怎么堕落如此！赶快起身离开吧。

original_en: Not daring to take responsibility. You're not a true man.
context: 敢做不敢当，不算大丈夫。

original_en: Their Despise toward you has grown.
context: 对方对你产生了些许鄙视的情绪。

original_en: You get up hastily.
context: 赶忙起身。

original_en: That's how I am!
context: 我就喜欢这样！

original_en: Pushing aside your bedmate, you slowly get up. But in your clumsiness, you rip your sleeve.
context: 你推开枕边人缓缓起身，但终究有些笨拙，不小心扯断了袖子。

original_en: Time to get up.
context: 该起床了。

original_en: A thousand thoughts for an inch of love.\\nMy heart stirs, promising a sweet secret tryst. \\nIs there true love in the world? \\nOne who never longs,\\nOnly in longing,\\nKnows longing's pangs.
context: 一寸相思千万绪，\\n动心处，半夕清欢芳心暗许。\\n人间可有真情在？\\n不会相思，\\n才会相思，\\n便害相思。

original_en: I shouldn't have fallen so low.
context: 我不该如此堕落，唉。

original_en: They say men are heartless, but, you too? Why must you do this to me?
context: 世人都说郎薄情，可你对我，为何也是如此？

original_en: Your bedmate's eyes flutter open, meeting your gaze with a smile.
context: 枕边人微微睁开双眼，与你目光对上，相视一笑。

original_en: A chance encounter's worth more than countless mundane meetings.
context: 金风玉露一相逢，便胜却人间无数。

original_en: Say loving words to your husband.
context: 与夫君说些情话。

original_en: Ivory tiles and red beans - do you know my deepest thoughts?
context: 玲珑骰子安红豆，入骨相思知不知。

original_en: Love at first sight, gives me no regrets. For you I'm mad, for you I'm enthralled.
context: 一见倾心爱无悔，为卿痴狂为卿醉。

original_en: Your bond has deepened.
context: 情侣间的感情加深了。

original_en: I shall love you, to the end of time! Till mountains crumble, streams run dry, thunder rumbles in winter, snow falls in summer, and the earth mingles with the sky - Not till then will I cease to love you!
context: 我欲与君相知，长命无绝衰。山无陵，江水为竭，冬雷阵阵，夏雨雪，天地合，乃敢与君绝！

original_en: You and I, bonded this life. In dreams we drift, a love so sweet.
context: 一生一世一双人，半醒半梦半浮生。

original_en: Trees live on mountains and branches live on trees. My heart lives for you - know this to be true.
context: 山有木兮木有枝，心悦君兮君当知。

original_en: There is a lady fair. I can’t forget, I swear. Not seen a single day, she makes my mind go stray.
context: 有美人兮，见之不忘。一日不见兮，思之若狂。

original_en: Too much sweet talk gets trite. I'd better not continue.
context: 情话说的太多，难免肉麻，还是算了。

original_en: Bear offspring.
context: 繁育子嗣。

original_en: To nurture the family line - a task fraught with hardship, yet foundational to human bonds. Am I truly ready to become a mother?
context: 父母乃人伦之始，无比艰辛之任务。我真的做好心理准备，成为人母了吗？

original_en: The ancients say: A mother is good and kind. So will I be. (Bear new life)
context: 前人言：母氏圣善。我亦如是。（繁育新生命）

original_en: Life comes with felicity,\\nPeace in auspicious times. \\nYin and yang unite,\\nAs rain and dew nourish.
context: 生育宜佳气，\\n平安似昔年。\\n阴阳和一会，\\n雨露均涵濡。

original_en: You feel a clear, spiritual energy descend from the heavens, as a nebulous essence rises from below. \\nAs these two extraordinary forces fuse within you, you feel your bloodlines connect. A pulse resonates - a new soul conceived. \\nAs you gaze at the babe, an invisible thread binds you. \\nNameless, yet profound - the thread of fate, the bond of blood.
context: 你只感觉九霄天上清灵元神之气垂下，下九泉里晦明渺渺氤氲而上。\\n两股奇力在你体内会流交融，随之一股血脉联结之感豁然而来，你能清晰的感觉到，一个独立的性灵由你孕育而生。\\n看着眼前的小家伙，一根看不见的丝线将你们连接在一起。\\n这线或无可名，或可强名之，曰缘，乃为血亲之缘。

original_en: The fruits of love, the continuation of life. Now, my responsibility grows.
context: 情感的结晶，性命的延续。从此之后，肩上又多了一份使命。

original_en: I'm not ready for motherhood. (You won't bear new life)
context: 尚未做好为人母的准备。（不会繁育新生命）

original_en: Don't worry, darling - children are heaven's will. Let's do good deeds together, and surely we'll be blessed with a full house someday.
context: 哎~亲爱的不必太过忧心，有无子嗣此乃天定，我们只需多行善事积累功德，你我福泽绵长一定会子孙满堂的。

original_en: Time to visit the City Guardian Temple.
context: 看来要去城隍庙走一趟了。

original_en: Time to get up!
context: 该起床了！

original_en: Say loving words to your wife.
context: 与娘子说些情话。

original_en: Lone smoke rises over endless sands, we'll stay true across distant lands.
context: 孤烟无垠万里沙，长情相伴共天涯。

original_en: A simple life with a cup of tea - All joy comes from you.
context: 白茶清欢无别事，清欢都是你。

original_en: Glory and splendor I promise you, a carefree life forever more.
context: 许你凤冠霞帔一世无忧，此生清风明月长伴天涯。

original_en: The world was so vast before I met you - now you are my world entire.
context: 普天之大，自识君，则为之君。

original_en: Though roots run shallow, feelings run deep. As strings echo, why do flutes refrain?
context: 向来缘浅，奈何情深。既然琴瑟起，何以笙箫默。

original_en: Strangers we met, like intimate souls reunited. A new moon rises, thoughts of you consume me.
context: 与君初相识，犹如故人归。天涯明月新，朝暮最相思。

original_en: To nurture the family line - a task fraught with hardship, yet foundational to human bonds. Am I truly ready to become a father?
context: 父母乃人伦之始，无比艰辛之任务。我真的做好心理准备，成为人父了吗？

original_en: Parents are the root of humanity. (Bear new life)
context: 父母者，人之本也（繁育新生命）

original_en: You feel a clear, spiritual energy descend from the heavens, as a nebulous essence rises from below. \\nThe two extraordinary forces fuse within your wife, and you feel your bloodlines connect. \\nA cry shatters the quiet as a babe enters the world.\\nAs you gaze at the babe, an invisible thread binds you. \\nNameless, yet profound - the thread of fate, the bond of blood.
context: 你只感觉九霄天上清灵元神之气垂下，下九泉里晦明渺渺氤氲而上。\\n两股奇力在你娘子的体内会流交融，随之一股血脉联结之感豁然而来。\\n一声啼哭将静寂的氛围撕破，\\n看着眼前的小家伙，一根看不见的丝线将你们连接在一起。\\n这线或无可名，或可强名之，曰缘，血亲之缘。

original_en: I'm not ready for fatherhood. (You won't bear new life)
context: 尚未做好为人父的准备。（不会繁育新生命）

original_en: Don't lose heart, darling, children are heaven's will. Let's do good deeds together, and surely we'll be blessed with a full house someday.
context: 哎~亲爱的不必气馁，有无子嗣此乃天定，我们只需多行善事积累功德，你我福泽绵长一定会子孙满堂的。

original_en: The spark has faded between you two. Back to back, you spent the night in silence.
context: 你与伴侣已经不再志趣相投，你俩相顾无言，背靠背睡了一夜。

original_en: Ah, how people change.
context: 唉，人都会变。

original_en: It's been so long since I spent time with Mother. Time runs swift, leaving its mark. I hope to stay by her side, leaving no regrets.
context: 许久没有陪伴在母亲身边，时间过得太快，岁月总会留下痕迹，愿能常伴左右，免留遗憾。

original_en: I wish time would slow down.
context: 时间还是慢些吧。

original_en: I slept well last night.
context: 恩，昨夜睡得不错。

original_en: A night well spent conversing with Father. I hope our time together lasts.
context: 与父亲相谈一夜，十分欢欣。希望时间慢些，能让人长久陪伴。

original_en: Don't know how many days I've left to spend with my child.
context: 不知还能有多少日子，陪伴在自己的孩子身边。

original_en: The family spend a pleasant day together, talking through the night.
context: 血亲家人难得聚在一起，相谈一夜，甚是欢欣。

original_en: We siblings should get together more often.
context: 兄弟姐妹们时常聚聚就好了。

original_en: You sleep next to your close friend, chatting about everything from your adventures to daily trifles. You're happy.
context: 亲朋挚友抵足而眠，畅谈江湖趣事，生活琐碎，不亦乐乎。

original_en: It's understanding that makes friends, and it's sincerity that makes true understanding.
context: 人之相识,贵在相知,人之相知,贵在知心。

original_en: True friends know no distances. Miles apart, our hearts are still close.
context: 相知无远近，万里尚为邻。

original_en: Nothing better than time with kindred souls, conversing with hearts understood.
context: 合意友来情不厌，知心人至话投机。

original_en: The greatest joy is in friendship, the greatest friendship in conversation.
context: 天下快意之事莫若友，快友之事莫若谈。

original_en: You talk about everything under the sun. What joy!
context: 谈天说地，不亦说乎。

original_en: You had a pleasant conversation and a good night's sleep. Your affection toward your friend grew.
context: 一夜好眠，言谈甚欢。你和朋友的感情增进了不少。

original_en: Grudges, hatred, warring intentions. You lie back to back, an uneasy night spent in silence.
context: 恩义仇，怨憎恨，别样心思的两人，背靠着背，一夜无眠。

original_en: Can't shake this chill down my spine...
context: 总感觉背后有一股冷气。

original_en: Hey! Don't crowd me. Move over.
context: 喂？你挤到我了，往边上一点。

original_en: (They spring up. Seeing you asleep, they lie back down hesitantly. )
context: （猛地起身，见你还在安睡，又将信将疑的躺了下去。）

original_en: You won't stab me at night, right?
context: 你不会半夜突然给我一刀吧？

original_en: Why must I sleep beside you? Damn!
context: 为什么我要跟你睡在一起，真是可恶。

original_en: A sleepless night, nerves taut.
context: 殚精竭虑，一夜无眠。

original_en: Never again. Too dangerous sharing a bed with an Enmity.
context: 你绝不想再有这么一夜，和结怨之人睡在一起，实在危险。

original_en: We put aside petty qualms. No need for pretense among fellow disciples. You get a good night's rest.
context: 江湖儿女不计小节，同门之谊自不必多说，两人安分守己，一夜安眠。

original_en: We put aside petty qualms.
context: 江湖儿女，不计小节。

original_en: All is calm. Dawn comes without event.
context: 平静无波，直到天明。

original_en: Master and servant sleep peacefully through the night.
context: 你们主仆二人，相伴好眠，直至天明。

original_en: Two men in one bed...Cramped, of course, but there's no other choice.
context: 两个大男人 睡一张床，显然拥挤了些，但也只能如此了。

original_en: Your neck feels stiff.
context: 感觉脖子有点不舒服。

original_en: Two ladies fit perfectly in the bed. A tranquil night, unperturbed by dreams.
context: 两名女子一人一边，恰好睡下。一夜清新，无风无梦。

original_en: A new day dawns.
context: 又是新的一天。

original_en: You look at each other awkwardly. Eventually, you pass the night, sitting back to back in silence.
context: 你们两人尴尬的看了看对方，最终静坐了一夜。

original_en: Better find a place to get a good night's sleep.
context: 还是得寻个地方好好睡一觉。

original_en: Everyone steers clear of trouble in the martial world, buddy. Yet you're sticking your nose where it doesn't belong. Now that you're in a pickle, you've got only yourself to blame.
context: 朋友，江湖风雨不小，人人避而不及，你偏偏多管闲事，如今惹火上身怪不得人。

original_en: You're the traitor that ambushed the Master of Bamboo Pond?
context: 你便是竹香潭偷袭掌门的叛徒？

original_en: Traitor? Hahaha! I served Bamboo Pond loyally for years. Now I'm branded a traitor. How dare you frame me like that, outsider? Damn you!
context: 叛徒？哈哈哈，我在竹香潭兢兢业业，这么多年却不想落了个叛徒的名头，你一个外人竟如此害我！当真该死！

original_en: I'm not framing you. I'm simply doing my job, entrusted by someone else.
context: 我受人之托，忠人之事，何来陷害一说。

original_en: Haha! Of all people, why did they come to you? And the moment you arrive, you accused me of being the night assailant! You don't dare own up to what you did?
context: 哈哈哈，他别人不找，偏偏找你，你一来便指认说我是夜间袭击之人，敢做，却不敢当吗！

original_en: Huh? I merely provided some clues. It's different from what you're saying.
context: 恩？我只是回报了一些线索而已，与你所说，有些不同。

original_en: Still trying to argue? Come on, let's settle it with our fists.
context: 还在狡辩，来来来，江湖事江湖了，出手吧。

original_en: Touch me, and you'll lose everything.
context: 对我动手，你将会失去一切。

original_en: Ha! I've been exiled from Bamboo Pond, and men hunt me as we speak. You think it's fun jeering at me?
context: 呵，我已经被竹香潭逐出，此刻还在被追杀，你在说什么风凉话！

original_en: You're still alive, for now. Waste time with me, and you'll be done for when your pursuers arrive.
context: 你如今尚有命在，若在我这里浪费时间，只怕追兵一到，你命休矣。

original_en: Hahaha, if I'm dying, I'm taking you with me!
context: 哈哈哈，老子死前，也要先拖你垫背！

original_en: Seems like I must teach you a lesson.
context: 看来要叫你看看我的手段。

original_en: Something's not quite right about this.
context: 此事可能有些蹊跷。

original_en: An outsider, willingly volunteering help with the investigation? I'd say you're the one most suspicious!
context: 一个外人，竟然主动前来协助调查，蹊跷，这里面最大的蹊跷就是你！

original_en: It appears you'll only listen to force.
context: 看来不动手，没办法让你好好听话。

original_en: In that case - let's fight.
context: 既然如此，动手吧。

original_en: Cut the nonsense. Show your moves.
context: 废话少说，出招吧。

original_en: Heh, you can't take my life so easily.
context: 呵，我的性命你还取不走。

original_en: How dare a lame cur bark at me.
context: 一只断脊之犬，怎敢在我面前狂吠。

original_en: Damn you!
context: 你真该死！

original_en: You're the one who's damned. Come on!
context: 该死的，是你。出招吧！

original_en: I see you're carrying a heavy load. If you have things to trade, I'm an experienced merchant.
context: 看你负重前行，看来囊中饱满，有不需要的可以和我交易啊，我可是个大商人。

original_en: Agree to trade
context: 同意交易

original_en: Haha! How invigorating, crossing blades.
context: 哈哈哈，以武会友大有所益。

original_en: Indeed, sparring with you is most rewarding.
context: 然也，与你切磋，确实有所助益。

original_en: You're a worthy opponent. Here's an Inner Kungfu - you're the perfect one to learn it. May you become stronger when we meet again.
context: 你是一个好对手，我这有一门内功，今日正好传授于你，期待日后再见，你能变得更强。

original_en: Thank you so much!
context: 万分感谢。

original_en: How invigorating, crossing blades.
context: 以武会友，大有所益。

original_en: Exchanging blows with you is most rewarding. Your skills run deep, your Inner Kungfu profound. I don't have much to offer, so please take this gold. May we meet again on our paths to Kungfu.
context: 与你一决对我大有所益。你修为精深，内功不凡，我也没什么可以送给你的，这些钱请你手收下，日后与我相互印证武道之路。

original_en: Ah, my friend, I didn't mean to intrude. I'm in dire straits and need 2,000 coins urgently. But I walked the Wilds for a long time, and couldn't borrow any. In my desperation, I heard your name from others. Out of all other options, I had to come seek your aid.
context: 唉，朋友，我不是故意前来打扰。实在是我有一些难处，急需要2000钱，但可惜在这大荒走了许久，都没能借到。困顿之际，从旁人口中听得你的名号，我实在走投无路，只能来此寻你相助。

original_en: Since you've come to me, you won't leave empty-handed.
context: 你既然求到我这里，自然不会白来一趟。

original_en: Here, take these 3,000 coins. Better to have more than not enough.
context: 这3000你且拿去，多与你一些免得不够。

original_en: Your kindness is beyond repayment. Once I get things sorted, I'll be back to repay you. Farewell!
context: 您的恩情，在下万死不足以报，待我了解事情，定会前来报答。告辞！

original_en: Hurry, now.
context: 快些去吧。

original_en: My love! You're saved!
context: 有救了，你有救了！

original_en: Here, take these 2,000 coins. Seek me again if you need anything else.
context: 这2000你且拿去，若有事，可再来寻我。

original_en: A million thanks. I'll never forget your kindness. Once I get things sorted, I'll be back to repay you. Farewell!
context: 多谢多谢，大恩大德在下没齿难忘。待在下了结事情之后，定会前来报答。告辞！

original_en: I've changed my mind. Seek someone else.
context: 我改主意了，你去找别人吧。

original_en: Alright, until later.
context: 唉，后会有期。

original_en: I can't help every person in the world.
context: 我也没办法帮助这江湖上的所有人。

original_en: What do your troubles have to do with me?
context: 你的难处，与我何干？

original_en: Alas. Where can I get those 2,000 coins?
context: 唉，这2000钱，要到哪里去搞呢。

original_en: Thank you. I needed that cash for my ailing wife. The doctor asked a towering fee. Without you, I really don't know what I could have done. Here's what you lent me. Please count it.
context: 多谢你，实不相瞒，当初那一笔钱乃是我爱人生了重病，医生要价极高，若非有你，我还真不知道该怎么办呢。这是你当初借给我的，你数数看。

original_en: The man hands you a parcel.
context: 男子说着，将一个包裹递了过来。

original_en: There's no need to check. I trust you.
context: 不必点了，你的人品我信得过。

original_en: Till we meet again, good sir!
context: 恩公，后会有期！

original_en: Return what you borrowed on time, you may borrow again next time.
context: 有借有还，再借不难。

original_en: Your wife's just recovered. Please keep the money.
context: 你们爱人大病初愈，这些钱你还是留下吧。

original_en: You beat me fair and square. Do as you please. One more whimper, and I'm a coward.
context: 技不如人，要杀要剐随你开心。我但凡多吭一声，便是孬种。

original_en: You sense the person's clearly injured. His story differs from what you heard at Bamboo Pond. Something seems amiss.
context: 你明显能感觉到面前这人有伤在身。他口中所说也与你日前在竹香潭的见闻有所出入。事情好像有些蹊跷。

original_en: Now will you listen to me?
context: 现在，可以好好听我说话了吧。

original_en: Heh. What's the show for?
context: 呵，假惺惺的，要给谁看。

original_en: What were you doing there that day?
context: 你那日究竟在做什么？

original_en: I'll tell you then. I saw a shadow slip past my bed, so I gave chase, and ended up outside the Master's hall. A concealed weapon barely missed me, just before the Master stepped out the door. We bumped right into each other.
context: 告诉你也无妨，那日我见到一个黑影从我床前滑过，便追了出去一路到了掌门大殿之外。而后一道暗器袭来，我将将闪过之后，便见得掌门推门而出，与我正好撞了一个照面。

original_en: If what you said is true, the culprit deliberately lured you out to frame you.
context: 如果你所言不虚，这是那贼人要嫁祸于你，故意引你出来。

original_en: You're saying they're only seeking me to investigate this?
context: 你说他们只找我了我调查此事？

original_en: Haha! Why else would I seek you out? His palm struck hard, and he thought he succeeded. So he spoke your name. But he didn't expect me to escape and find you.
context: 呵，不然我为何来此寻你？那一掌打的结实，他自以为的手，便将你说了出来，却想不到我竟能逃跑出来，寻你麻烦。

original_en: I don't know who attacked you, but why not kill you with weapons?
context: 我不知击伤你的人是谁，但既有机会，为何不用兵刃杀你？

original_en: What's more, if he truly wanted to clean house, there was no need to name me at all.
context: 更何况，他若是真为了清理门户根本没有将我说出的必要。

original_en: You see his expression change, clearly persuaded by your words.
context: 你见他表情有些变化，显然是认可了你的说法，被你说动了。

original_en: Letting you go intentionally to pit us against each other...What a wicked plot!
context: 故意放你离开，让你与我厮杀，让他们坐收渔利，好毒的心思。

original_en: How did you get away?
context: 你是如何逃出来的？

original_en: When I went out today, a fellow disciple sought me out and said the Master summoned me to the Hall. But halfway there, he suddenly struck me from behind with his palm. I used that force to fly back and barely escaped.
context: 我今日出门，便有同门寻我，说掌门有事让我去大大殿一趟。可行至中途，那位同门突然一掌打在我的后心，我借力飞退，这才逃脱。

original_en: Looks like he's your equal in skill. After injuring you, he could only let you flee.
context: 看来那人与你实力相仿，故而受伤之后，只能逃走。

original_en: But if you're evenly matched, why not give chase when you fled?
context: 但若是与你实力相仿，见你逃走为何不追？

original_en: Well...
You were injured. Even if you have supreme Qinggong, he should have relentlessly chased you down. Why would he let you go?
context: 你有伤在身，就算轻功高绝，此刻他也应该穷追不舍，怎么轻易放你走脱。

original_en: Looks like we were both played for fools.
context: 看来，你我都被人耍了。

original_en: Do you mean...? !
context: 这，难道？！

original_en: Indeed, there's something amiss about the affair at Bamboo Pond. I, the borrowed knife. You, the scapegoat.
context: 不错，看来竹香潭之事另有蹊跷，我是借来的刀，你是替罪的羊。

original_en: If that's the case, this is a conspiracy that targets not just the Master, but also the entire Bamboo Pond! Framing me as a traitor and expelling me will put the sect at ease, lowering their guard!
context: 若是如此，此事只怕不仅针对掌门，而是针对整个竹香潭的阴谋！将我定做叛徒逐出师门，便会让门派众人以为揪出了叛徒放松警惕！

original_en: Exactly. Looks like you're not stupid after all.
context: 然也，看来你脑子也不算太笨。

original_en: What should we do now?
context: 那现在怎么办？

original_en: The first option is to return to Bamboo Pond, find the clues, and confront the mastermind. Stand tall! The second option is to let it pass. The conspirators clearly are scheming against the Bamboo Pond. If we run far enough, never to set step into Bamboo Pond again, we'll probably leave unscathed. Lie low!
context: 第一条路，便是再回竹香潭，寻得那些蛛丝马迹，抓出幕后之人与他对峙。提气！第二条路，则是高高挂起，这群阴谋者显然是对竹香潭有所图谋，你我只要跑的够远，今生不再入竹香潭一步，便有可能无事。漏气！

original_en: There two options before us.
context: 两条路摆在你我面前。

original_en: We're in the same boat. If it hadn't been for you, I would have still been fooled. I trust your judgment.
context: 你我现在是一根绳上的蚂蚱，若没有你，我还被蒙在鼓里。我相信你的选择。

original_en: ... (What should I do? )
context: ......（究竟该如何做呢？）

original_en: The first choice. I'm no man's pawn. This isn't over yet.
context: 第一条路，我非是任人愚弄之人，这件事，不会完。

original_en: What should we do? I'll follow your lead.
context: 究竟要如何做，我听你的。

original_en: If I return, the conspirator will only react in two ways. One - he thinks you're dead. By eliminating me, he can tie up all loose ends.
context: 阴谋者见我回去，只会有两种反应。一便是觉得你已经死了，他只要除掉我，这一系列的栽赃陷害，便死无对证查无可查了。

original_en: I'll go back alone.
context: 我独自回去。

original_en: Two - they think you're still alive. You haven't sought me out yet, or haven't confronted me for other reasons. In this case, he'll be more cautious, as he doesn't know what's up with you.
context: 第二种反应，便是以为你还没死，没找上我，亦或者因为其他原因未能与我照面。这样一来，他不知你的消息定会投鼠忌器，行事更加小心。

original_en: What do you mean by that?
context: 你的意思是？

original_en: I'll need to borrow your head.
context: 需要借你人头一用！

original_en: What? !

We'll just spread fabricated news! He won't take our word for it, but he'll send men to verify the intel. Give me something of yours as proof. Let him see for himself. It'll be more convincing than the rumors we spread.
context: 不过是捏造一个消息，虽然他不会尽信，但就会派人验证，你有什么随身 东西且交予我，待阴谋者自己验证之后，比我们自己传播更让他信服。

original_en: Relax. I don't really want you dead!
context: 放心放心，不是真要你死。

original_en: In that case, he'll come after you for sure.
context: 如此一来！他必将对你动手！

original_en: We'll strike together and take him down. Then, we'll expose everything.
context: 到时只要你我一齐出手，将他拿下，一切便能真相大白。

original_en: What if the conspirator bites back?
context: 阴谋者若是反咬一口又该如何？

original_en: You're a disciple of Bamboo Pond. Do your Master a favor and toss a concealed weapon at his room.
context: 你也是竹香潭弟子，辛苦一下你们的掌门，你在向他屋子里丢出一枚暗器便是。

original_en: Brilliant! When do we make our move?
context: 妙哉！何时动手？

original_en: Give me the item. When I go to Bamboo Pond, the conspirator will have his eyes on me. You stay hidden and wait for the right moment to act.
context: 先将东西交我，我去竹香潭之后，阴谋者必然对我关注。你在暗处盯着，见机行事。

original_en: Understood. Take care.
context: 如此，万事小心。

original_en: Leave it to me.
context: 放心吧。

original_en: ? ? ? Broken Bowl? ? ?
I grew up an orphan. Without this broken bowl, I wouldn't have lived to become the old Master's disciple.
context: 我自由父母双亡，若没有这破碗我可活不到被老掌门收为弟子的时候呀。

original_en: ...Alright. A unique token, I suppose.
context: .....好吧，这也算是一个独特的信物了。

original_en: The second option is to escape. The Kungfu world is perilous. We can steer clear of trouble, somewhere far away.
context: 第二条路，远走高飞，江湖凶险，你我还是远遁而去，省得麻烦。

original_en: But where?
context: 走，走哪里去？

original_en: The world is a vast place. Wherever we go, we can find home. Come with me. What do you say?
context: 江湖广阔，四海为家，如何？跟我一起走吧。

original_en: Now that we're both caught up in this, we're in the same boat. I'll follow you, wherever you go.
context: 你我沾染此事，如今已经是一条绳上的蚂蚱，你去哪里，我跟你走。

original_en: I'm used to journeying alone. A long road lies ahead - until we meet again.
context: 我一人独行惯了，江湖路远，后会有期。

original_en: What? But then...
Alas. What lies ahead for me?
context: 唉，将未来该何去何从。

original_en: Farewell!
context: 告辞！

original_en: Well, safety in numbers, I guess. I just hope the conspirators won't track us down.
context: 也罢，多个人也算照应。只希望这阴谋者别这么不长眼睛，寻你我的麻烦。

original_en: Let's look out for each other then.
context: 那以后，就请你多多关照了。

original_en: Come with me.
context: 随我同行吧。

original_en: Well, there's a third option. Step in there and muddy the waters!
context: 其实还有第三条路，乱入其中，浑水摸鱼！

original_en: Transfiguration Route. Block first.
context: 易容线，先屏蔽

original_en: Bamboo Pond's traitor. Death is too light a sentence.
context: 竹香潭的叛徒，死不足惜。

original_en: Hahaha. How long do you think you'll last, aiding evil? !
context: 哈哈哈哈，助纣为虐，你以为你还能活多久？！

original_en: In any case, I'll outlast you, for sure.
context: 无论如何，性命定是比你长些。

original_en: Hmph! In defeat you still dare speak, scum?
context: 哼，你这小人，如今败在我手，可还有话说？

original_en: The man loathes you. Now that you've lost to him, things look bleak.
context: 眼前之人对你饱含恨意，如今你败于他手，只怕此事难以善了。

original_en: I have nothing to do with your affairs.
context: 你的事情，与我无关。

original_en: Still trying to talk your way out? Despicable.
context: 事到临头，还在狡辩。到底是个 真小人。

original_en: There's no grudge between us. Why would I frame you?
context: 你我无冤无仇，我为何要陷害与你？

original_en: That's my line! There's no grudge between us. Why are you framing me?
context: 这句话该是我问你！你我无冤无仇，何故陷害我？

original_en: (Recount events)
context: （将之前的事说与他听）

original_en: You're saying that I'm the one who wronged you?
context: 听你所说，难道还能是我冤枉了你不成？

original_en: Exactly! (Assert firmly)
context: 就是如此！（直接表达）

original_en: I'm not deceived by your smooth tongue. I'm blinding you today, so you won't trifle with me again, scum!
context: 任你巧舌如簧，如何蒙的了我？你这小贼，今日我便废了你这双招子，省得你有眼无珠，江湖弄险搞到老子身上！

original_en: Don't let me see you again!
context: 别再让老子见到你！

original_en: Endure for now. Vengeance will come.
context: 暂且忍下，此仇来日再报。

original_en: That's about what happened. (Speak tactfully)
context: 事情如此。（委婉表达）

original_en: Hmph! Words are empty without proof. Do you have any evidence?
context: 呵，空口无凭，可有证据？

original_en: Give me three days. I promise I'll get to the bottom of this.
context: 此事交我，三日后，必定给你一个说法。

original_en: Huh, interesting. And what if after three days you still have nothing?
context: 呵，有点意思，若是三日之后，你不能给我一个说法又当如何？

original_en: Then you have my life at your disposal.
context: 到时要杀要剐，悉听尊便。

original_en: Very well, you have three days. By then, we'll have this settled. Farewell.
context: 好，便给你三日，三日之后，我再来与你计较。告辞。

original_en: He's the forthright sort. I have three days. Looks like the key remains within Bamboo Pond.
context: 倒是个磊落人，三日，看来关键还是在竹香潭之内。

original_en: I'll do what I can, and let fate run its course.
context: 尽人事，听天命。

original_en: Hmph. Very well. Three days it is. We meet in three days' time. Farewell.
context: 呵，好，三日便三日，三日后，你我再会。告辞。

original_en: You still won't believe me? What a dimwit!
context: 这样你都不相信我？当真是个狗脑子！

original_en: You have my life at your disposal.
context: 要杀要剐，悉听尊便。

original_en: Huh. At least you're not a coward. I'll cripple your limbs today, and we're even. Stay away, or I won't be lenient.
context: 呵，还算是条汉子。今日我废你双手双脚，你我就算扯平了。以后滚得远些，莫要再让我见到你。

original_en: Have some mercy. Spare me this once, and I'll repay you someday.
context: 得饶人处且饶人，放我一马，日后有报。

original_en: Absurd! Did you ever think it would come down to this when you first framed me?
context: 笑话，你当初诬陷我之时，可曾想过今日？

original_en: Three days have passed. Time to give me an explanation!
context: 三日已到，你该给我一个说法了！

original_en: I've got some information that might be useful to you.
context: 我得到一些消息，或许对你有用。

original_en: Oh? Tell me about it.
context: 哦？你说说看。

original_en: Tell him about what you found.
context: 将调查之事告知。

original_en: I'll look into what you've said. Once I verify the facts, we'll meet again.
context: 你话中所说，我自会调查。待我验证真伪之后，你我再见。

original_en: To think they brought in an outsider to frame me! Just who could it be...
context: 竟是引来外人陷害于我，究竟是谁......

original_en: Every one of my words is true. Until we meet again.
context: 我所说句句属实，后会有期。

original_en: I didn't get any clues. So do as you will.
context: 没有得到消息，要杀要剐，悉听尊便。

original_en: Huh. You promised an explanation in three days, but you strung me along.
context: 呵，说是三天给我一个说法，想不到竟是诓我！

original_en: Enough talk. Show what you've got!
context: 废话少说，出手吧！

original_en: It's not like that...
context: 并非如此....

original_en: Secret intelligence: A group of people who are resentment with you, formed an alliance to be unfavorable to you !!! Be careful !!
context: 秘密情报：一群对你怨愤之人，结成同盟准备对你不利！！千万当心！！

original_en: You are already the enemy of Wulin! Today, I waited for the alliance, and you have a limit, and you have to capture if you don't get your hands !!
context: 你已经是武林公敌！今日我等结成同盟，你大限已至，还不束手就擒！！

original_en: Futtering and resistance!
context: 拼死反抗！

original_en: {0} {1} and other people who complained to me formed an alliance and came to attack me!! I decided to fight!
context: {0}{1}等多个对我怨愤之人结成同盟，前来袭击我！！我决定殊死一搏！

original_en: Pretend to be fainted, maybe there is a front -line life ...
context: 假装晕倒，也许还有一线生机...

original_en: {0} {1} and other people who complained to me formed an alliance and came to attack me!! I pretended to faint and hoped to avoid a robbery.
context: {0}{1}等多个对我怨愤之人组成联盟，前来袭击我！！我假装晕倒，期望能躲过一劫。

original_en: {0}, you are welcome to join the door. I will take you to practice the room. You can ask me to ask me in this master, and to practice the foundation in the practice house.
context: {0}，欢迎你加入本门，我奉掌门之命带你去练功房，你可以先向我请教本门绝学流派，在练功房木人练习本门基础绝学。

original_en: Alright

original_en: Your presence is inspiring, leaving me no choice but to admire.
context: 这位侠士神采飞扬，让人情不自禁心生向往。

original_en: Your presence is inspiring, leaving me no choice but to admire.

original_en: Nothing, sorry to bother you...

original_en: Attempt to resolve grievances.
context: 尝试化解恩怨

original_en: It's wise to resolve enmity rather than harbor it.
context: 讲道理，冤家宜解不宜结

original_en: I'm not the type to hold petty grievances. Let's move on.
context: 如今结缘不深，我也不是小肚鸡肠之人，这点恩怨就此作罢了。

original_en: {0}, we hold deep-seated enmity. Don't think for a moment you can easily resolve it! !
context: {0}，我与你不共戴天之仇，你想如此轻易了解恩怨简直痴心妄想！！

original_en: You make a point. But thinking it can be resolved so easily underestimates me.
context: 你说的也有几分道理，不过就想如此轻易了结，也太小看在下了。

original_en: Mediate through your connections
context: 通过人脉关系，从旁劝解

original_en: We share a common friend, and the other party's attitude has softened.
context: 双方拥有共同的正面关系人，对方态度有所缓和

original_en: We share a common enemy, and the other party's attitude has softened.
context: 双方拥有共同的结怨之人，对方态度有所缓和

original_en: We don't have any mutual acquaintances, stop pretending we're familiar. How ridiculous!
context: 你我没有什么相熟之人，还妄想套近乎！可笑可笑，哈哈哈

original_en: Use your connections to exert pressure
context: 利用江湖人脉，以势压人

original_en: The Champion has spoken, and I'm willing to settle our grudge. I hope I didn't offend you.
context: 既然盟主开了金口，在下愿意化解恩怨，希望盟主不计前嫌。

original_en: Well, let's put our grievances aside for now. But using a show of force to intimidate is unwise.
context: 好，恩怨暂且搁下，但你仗着人多以势压人，殊不知水能载舟亦能覆舟...

original_en: Humph! More people? Do you think I'm afraid of you?
context: 哼！比人多？我岂会怕你！

original_en: Using material incentives
context: 以利诱之

original_en: Give me 8,000 coins, and we'll consider this grudge settled.
context: 凭我的实力，给我8000钱，这段恩怨从此一笔勾销。

original_en: Deal! From this day forward, we'll shake hands and let bygones be bygones.
context: 好！从今往后你我握手言和，两不相欠。

original_en: Give me 5,000 coins, and we'll consider this grudge settled.
context: 凭我的实力，给我5000钱，这段恩怨从此一笔勾销。

original_en: Give me 2,000 coins, and we'll consider this grudge settled.
context: 凭我的实力，给我2000钱，这段恩怨从此一笔勾销。

original_en: I've earned some renown in the martial world! Don't even think about buying me with money! !

original_en: Exploit their vulnerabilities to coerce
context: 利用对方弱点进行胁迫

original_en: Humph! I've always been fair and honest. What leverage could you possibly have? ?

original_en: Force them into agreement

original_en: Do you believe someone like me would cower in the face of your threats?  Ridiculous! !

original_en: I can put our differences aside, but bullying the weak doesn't befit a gentleman.

original_en: My network extends far and wide. You dare to act recklessly! ! !

original_en: *Sigh* I spend my days idly wandering, just a traveler. When will I be free from my worries?
context: 哎~整日无所事事闲逛，我不过是这人世间一个过客，来日方长路远，何时才能了无牵挂。

original_en: I manage the station, providing a rest stop for travelers and selling groceries.
context: 我每日就是看管驿站，迎来送往，卖一些杂货。

original_en: I run the hot spring, offering a place for travelers to unwind.
context: 守着温泉，给江湖中人一个小息片刻的场所。

original_en: Come to me if you need mechanical devices and facilities crafted.
context: 有什么机关设施都可以找我来制作。

original_en: I entertain with music, serve fine wines, and provide amusement for travelers.
context: 演奏乐曲，提供美酒，给江湖侠客们提供娱乐的场所。

original_en: I brew wines, prepare delicious meals, and listen to exciting anecdotes travelers share.
context: 酿造美酒，烹饪美食，每日还能听到一些江湖上的趣闻。

original_en: I craft and sell weapons, striving for extraordinary armaments.
context: 每日锻造和贩卖兵器和暗器，毕生的追求就是可以打造出神兵利器。

original_en: I make medicines and treat ailments. I give free treatment to my friends.
context: 炼制丹药，治疗各种疑难杂症，和我关系好的人，我还会免费治疗。

original_en: I weave all kinds of clothes and want everyone to be able to wear the clothes I make.
context: 织造各种服装，我希望江湖上人人都能穿我织造的衣裳。

original_en: Haha, work is out of the question, my role is to handle wealth.
context: 哈哈哈，工作是不可能工作的，我这身份就是财富的搬运工。

original_en: I make a living by chopping wood, hoping for a fortuitous encounter someday.
context: 每日就是砍柴为生，期望有一天我也能有奇遇。

original_en: A cottage, a small field, a carefree existence, simply seeking a peaceful life.
context: 一间茅屋，一片小田，无忧无虑，只求一世平安。

original_en: I gather and sell ores. My job can be dangerous, as rare ores are often found in hazardous places.
context: 收集贩卖矿石，这个工作还是很危险的，险恶之地才能找到稀有矿石。

original_en: I hunt daily, capturing animals that can be tamed and raised.
context: 每日就是打猎，抓一些可以驯化的动物圈养起来。

original_en: Catch fish, sell fish, catch fish, sell fish... my hands are almost worn out. . .
context: 抓鱼~~卖鱼~~抓鱼~~卖鱼~~我手都快泡烂了。。。

original_en: I possess some martial skills. Anyone in need can hire me at a reasonable rate.
context: 在下有一些武艺，谁有麻烦都可以雇佣我，很便宜的。

original_en: I can teach you secret skills. Just pay the tuition, and I'll impart everything.
context: 传授一些家传的绝学，只要学费给够，倾囊相授。

original_en: Lacking support, I rely on the kindness of others for sustenance.
context: 无依无靠，祈求好心人施舍一些，得过且过吧。

original_en: I undertake various assigned tasks, aspiring to become an indoor disciple soon.
context: 门派有什么杂事都会吩咐我们去做，希望能尽快成为内门弟子。

original_en: I protect buildings, gather resources, and practice martial arts. That's all.
context: 也就是守卫一些建筑，收集物资充实库房，练习门派武功，大概就这些吧。

original_en: As second in command, I can lead disciples and earn a higher salary.
context: 在门派中地位仅次于掌门，可以命令弟子执行任务，月例也多得多。

original_en: I issue sect commands, set rules, and steer our sect's growth.
context: 发布门派命令，制定门规，组织规划门派的发展方向，将本门发扬光大。

original_en: All sects respect my counsel. I mediate key events in the martial world.
context: 各门各派都会尊敬我的意见，江湖上有什么重大事件都会请我居中调节。

original_en: I oversee the cultivators, maintain world stability, and collect refining materials.
context: 监察耕父行为，维护小世界安稳，收集熔炼世界物资。

original_en: Da Nei Forbidden Guards follow the life of the emperor and integrate the order of the rivers and lakes. For the sake of the rivers and lakes, it is a way to make a thunder.

original_en: Request for promotion
context: 请求晋升职务

original_en: Your Prestige is sufficient for a promotion. Keep up the good work and make even more contributions to the sect.
context: 你的声望已经足够，立即提升你的职务，希望你再接再厉，为门派做出更多贡献。

original_en: Thank you, Master!

original_en: I've been promoted to an Indoor Disciple.

original_en: I've been promoted to an Elder.

original_en: Your Prestige has risen so quickly. It seems it's time for me to step down. The hopes of the sect now rest on you.
context: 你这么快声望就达到如此之高了，看来我是时候退位让贤了，门派的希望就靠你了。

original_en: Thank you. I'll do my best to bring honor to the sect.
context: 多谢，我会将门派发扬光大的。

original_en: As the former master steps aside, I take the reins as the new Master.

original_en: Your sect Prestige is not yet sufficient for a promotion. Please continue to help the sect with various tasks.

context: 恩？你问日前掌门遇袭一事？那夜我出门小解，见到一名男子在掌门大殿之外鬼鬼祟祟，不知在做些什么。

original_en: The head of the head is attacking? On that day, I practiced Wu Hui, and saw a fat black shadow sneaky. The head of the head may be related to him.
context: 掌门遇袭之事？那日我练武回的玩些，见到一个胖胖的黑影鬼鬼祟祟，掌门之事可能与他有关。

original_en: What happened a few days ago is related to the head? Oh! I saw a dark shadow passing by the outer wall that day, and my skills were extraordinary, at least a disciple.
context: 前些日子的事情，与掌门有关？哦！那天我看到一道黑影越过外墙向大殿而去，身手修为不凡，至少是个内门弟子才行。

original_en: About the matter you entrusted me with the other day...

original_en: Oh? Time isn't up, and you've made discoveries?
context: 哦？时间未至，你已经有了发现？

original_en: Indeed, I've made some headway. (Everything must be submitted at once. Multiple submissions are not accepted. )

Consider it?
